40001001	Abrahamichi bushoonaa Daawitichi bushoona tunati Yesuus Kiristoosichi shiijee yoodo ebine.
40001002	Abrahami Yiisaaqin shiyiye; Yiisaaqi Yaaqoobin shiyiye; Yaaqoobi Yihudinaa bi maneena'onon shiyiye;
40001003	Yihudi Tamaar waanee Fereesinaa Yeraahinon shiyiye; Fereesi Hesiroonin shiyiye; Hesirooni Raamin shiyiye;
40001004	Raami Aminadaabin shiyiye; Aminadaabi Nahishoonin shiyiye; Nahishooni Salimoonin shiyiye;
40001005	Salimooni Raab waanee Bo'aazin shiyiye; Bo'eezi Ruut waanee Obeedin shiyiye; Obeedi Iseyin shiyiye;
40001006	Iseyi Taatoo Daawitin shiyiye. Taatoo Daawiti shiichiqqa Uriyaahichi mechee tunati waanee Solomoonin shiyiye;
40001007	Solomooni Rehoboaamin shiyiye; Rehoboaami Abiyaahin shiyiye; Abiyaahi Asaafin shiyiye;
40001008	Asaafi Yehoshafaaxin shiyiye; Yehoshafaaxi Yooraamin shiyiye; Yooraami Uziyaahin shiyiye;
40001009	Uziyaahi Yotaamin shiyiye; Yotaami Akaazin shiyiye; Akaazi Hiziqiyaasin shiyiye;
40001010	Hiziqiyaasi Minaasin shiyiye; Minaasi Amoosin shiyiye; Amoosi Yosiyaasin shiyiye;
40001011	Yihudee Shawee asheena'o Baabiloonee Shawooch boonoshi kecee hammiyooba, Yosiyaasi Yekooniyaasinaa bi maneena'onon shiyiye.
40001012	Yihudee Shawee asheena'o Baabiloonee Shawooch boonoshi kecceetoyee gub, Yekooniyaasi Salaatiyaasin shiyiye; Salaatiyaasi Zerubabeelin shiyiye;
40001013	Zerubabeeli Abiyoodin shiyiye; Abiyoodi Eliyaaqin shiyiye; Eliyaaqi Azaarin shiyiye;
40001014	Azaari Saadooqin shiyiye; Saadooqi Akiimin shiyiye; Akiimi Eliyaadin shiyiye;
40001015	Eliyaadi Elaazaarin shiyiye; Elazaari Mataanin shiyiye; Mataani Yaaqoobin shiyiye;
40001016	Yaaqoobi Yooseefin shiyiye; Yooseefi Kiristoosi gettee beeti Yesuusin shiyati Maariyamin shaagga maakkiiti uroone.
40001017	Illa hini shiijaroo bulli, Abrahamichi shiijoochee tiijiqqi Daawitichi shiijarooch beddaahee, aaraa awudda shiijaroone; Daawitichi shiijoochee tiijiqqi Yihudee Shawee asheena'o Baabiloonee Shawooch boonoshi kecceemmi wottoon, aaraa awudda shiijaroone; Yihudee asheena'o Baabiloonee Shawooch keceetoochee tiijiqqi Kiristoosichi shiijooch beddaahee, aaraa awudda shiijaroone.
40001018	Yesuus Kiristoosichi shiijo ebine:- bi indee Maariyami Yooseefich maakkeeqqa shaaggeyaano beebee, Yaafa Ayaanoona yeqqafahan; bi yeqqafoo arichahe.
40001019	Biin maakkiiti Yooseefi cadiqa uro bi tunatoyich, Maariyaminoo ashi aafooch yeelliyoon qaawoo bi qajitoyich, aashoona shaagoon echiiya gabiye.
40001020	Yooseefi ebin gabii bi beetee, Doono Yeerichi maraakoo gumona danaqqi biich ishichiye:- "Daawitichi bushoo Yooseefo! Shaaga ne maakkiiti Maariyami yeqqafato, Yaafa Ayaanoonaniye; ebich shattaahine! Shaage!
40001021	Anaami bushoon shiyemmine; aroo bi asheena'on boonoshi axaaxoochee wodiiyemmo bi tunatoyich, bi shigoon 'Yesuusi' getiree shigiiyemmo neene" iye.
40001022	Ebi bulli tunato, Doono Yeeri keemachochi noonoona, "Ebiyoche! Gidiiree (giddiidee) yeqqafemmine; anaami bushoonoo shiyemmine; bi shigoo 'Amaaneeli' getee ceeggeeyemmone" iqqi bi gettito, ceennemmoyichiye. "Amaaneeli" geto, "Yeeri noonna tookkiiniye" getone.
40001024	Ebiyee gub, Yooseefi tokkatoochee tiyiqqi, Doono Yeerichi maraakoo gettitoomon tuniihe; shaagga bi maakkiiti Maariyamin daammiye.
40001025	Bi qaabba bushoon bi shiyammi wottoon, bi achooch shagaanoone. Yooseefiyoo shiijati bushoon "Yesuusi" iqqi shigiihe.
40002001	Heroodisi Yihudee Shawooch taataqqi bi beetee, ara shawooch beeti Beet Lehemi Katamooch Yesuusi shiijahe. Arooba xojanee Hiddachina'o aabi keyoochee Yerusalem waaqqi,
40002002	"Katinoon shiijati Ayihudeena'ochi taatoo aabiichiye? Bi xojanoon aabi keyoochaa beeggaqqa, biich goyinniya waato noone" iyeete.
40002003	Taatoo Heroodisi ishin waayaqqi keqqiye; wotta Yerusalem beetina'o bulliyoo keqqiyeete.
40002004	Aroochee Heroodisi qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa Muusichi callee dojachina'onon kiciqqi, " 'Kiristoosi shiijemmone' getteeto, aabiichiye? iqqi echahe.
40002005	Boonoshiyoo ishichiyeete:- "Yihudee Shawooch beeti Beet Lehemiye; 'Hini Yihudee Shawooch beeti Beet Lehemi asheena'ote; ta asheena'o Isra'eeleena'on quyemmi woraafo ittoshi daggoochee kechemmone; ebich Yihudee Shawooch beeti katameena'oyee ittoshi katamo cir shapaachemmone' iqqi Yeeri gettiton keemacho kooritone" iyeete.
40002007	Ebiyee gub, Heroodisi xojanee Hiddachina'on aashoona ceeggiiqqi xojano bekkati aaboon boonoshi waanee manjii echaa waayahe.
40002008	Aroochee boonoshin Beet Lehem ishichiqqi daachiihe:- "Hamiree bushoo beeti xaa'oon nibboona qaawibote! Ittoshi dana gaata, waaree taach getote! Tawoo hamiree biich goyinnemmo taane" iye.
40002009	Boonoshiyoo ishin taatoo waanee boonoshi waayatoyee gub, tiyiqqi hammiyeete. Ebiyee aaf aabi keyoochaa boonoshi beeggiti xojanoon wochinnoon beeggiqqi oogichii emiriyeete; boonoshich bekkaabee gaggaroo beeti xaa'ooch waa bi neexammi wottoon boonoshin yaabii beehe.
40002011	Ara kexooch giyiqqi bi indee Maariyaminna tookkii beeti gaggara bushoon beeggiyeete. Yittiqqinoo biich goyinnaheete; boonoshi gilgiloon qechiqqi aachoon, ixaanoonaa haraboonon kichii immiyeete.
40002012	Ebiyee gub, Yeeri gumona "Wottaree Heroodis waan hammaahotine!" iqqi bi gettitoyich, bara gommona boonoshi shawooch wottaqqi hammiyeete.
40002013	Xojanee Hiddachina'o boonoshi hammitoyee gub, Doono Yeerichi maraakoo gumona danaqqi, Yooseefin "Heroodisi hini gaggara bushoon wuxiyoyich bi ginachina'ona qaawiiya ii beetone; ebich tiyiree gaggaroonaa bi indeenon yeshiree, Gibicee Shawooch maxxabe! Neech wochiqqa ta gettammi wottoon, arooch kotabe!" iye.
40002014	Ebina Yooseefi tiyii gaggaroonaa bi indeenon yechiqqi, xumoona Gibicee Shawooch maxxahe;
40002015	Heroodisi qitimmi wottoon arooch kotahe. Ebi tunato, Doono Yeeri keemachochi noonoona, "Ta Bushoon Gibicee Shawoochee ceeggahoye" iqqi bi gettito ceennemmoyichiye.
40002016	Yooseefi hammitoyee gub, Heroodisi xojanee Hiddachina'o biin dachoon ariiqqi oogichii kaarahe; xojanee Hiddachina'on manjii bi echaa waayati aaboon shalligiqqi, "Beet Lehemi Katamoonaa bi katinoonooch shiijati, gutta natonaa gutta natoyee deshina tunati gaggara anaami bushiisheena'on wuxibote!" iqqi bi ginachina'on daachiihe. Hini ara ginachina'o hammiqqi, anaami bushiisheena'o bullin wuxiyeete.
40002017	Arooba Yeeri keemachi Erimiyaasina "Eefonaa wodda bunnee qaaroona Raami Katamooch waayeehe; Raaheeli bi bushiishoyich eepahane; Bi bushiisheena'o qititoyich, goggoon hakkaaneene" iqqi bi gettito ceenniye.
40002019	Heroodisi qititoyee gub, Doono Yeerichi maraakoo Gibicee Shawoochaa gumona Yooseefina danaqqi,
40002020	"Bushoon wuxiya qaawitina'o qititina'one. Ebich tibe! Bushoonaa bi indeenon yeshiree Isra'eelee Shawooch wottaree hambe!" iye.
40002021	Ebich Yooseefi tiyii bushoonaa bi indeenon yechiqqi Isra'eelee Shawooch wottaa hammiye.
40002022	Arikiloosi bi nihoo Heroodisichi keroon Yihudee Shawooch bi taatoon waayaqqi, arooch hamon shattiye; "Yihudee Shawooch hammahine!" immi gumon beeggiqqi Galiilee Shawooch hammii,
40002023	Naazireeti katamooch kotahe. Ebich Yeeri keemachina'ona "Kiristoosi Naazireetacho getteeyemmone" iqqi bi gettito ceenniye.
40003001	Ebiyee gub, Aacona Afaallachi Yowannisi Yihudee Barahooch waaqqi, "Shimaaji taatittinee ittoshi kellooch shaggatine; ebich axaaxee gommoochee Yeer waan wottabote!" iqqi getooch giyiye.
40003003	Keemachi Isiyaasina " 'Doonochi gommon qanniibote! Bi woratoonoo kaachi qaxabote!' iibee barahoochaa cookii beeti ashi qaaro" getteeto hinine.
40003004	Yowannisi gaallechi eexoochee shipeeti tahoon tahaa beehe; wotta gooqqoochee shuuneeti shachoon cuyaa beehe; bi maayoo gechoonaa bobbiyee eeyonaniye.
40003005	Arooba Yerusaleminaa Yihudee Shawoonooch, Yooridanoosi Aachi guudoona beeti shawoochoo beetina'o bulli bi waan conjiqqi waa beeheete;
40003006	Boonoshi axaaxoon boonoshi aannee, Yooridanoosi Aacoochaa boonoshin Yowannisi afaallii beehe.
40003007	Tunaballi Fariseena'onaa Saduqeena'onochi daggoochee meeti asheena'o aacona afaalleyoyich bi waan boonoshi womon Yowannisi beeggiqqi, boonoshich ishichiye:- "Hini xekarechi bushiisheena'ote! Yeer waanee kindemmi kaaree shiixxoochee ittoshi wokkemmoyich, konine ittoshich gettito?
40003008	Illa axaaxee gommoochee Yeer waan ittoshi wottoon bekkii beeti shuunoon shuunabote!
40003009	Wotta ittoshinaa ittoshina 'Abrahamichi bushiishoo noone' getiree yebaniyaahotine! Ittoshich getana; hini shawee toommooch beeti xaqqeena'oochee Yeeri Abrahamich bushiishoon halloon hakkiye.
40003010	Andoo asho gonda mixon cammona waaxxii bi aalliyoomon, Yeeri biich de'a getaaneena'on waaxiree aalliiya qannitone. Illa asho de'a aafoon aafataani mixo bullin kuxxiqqi qaaqqee daggooch bi dufoomon, Yeeriyoo boonoshin ebiyoomon dupemmone.
40003011	"Tawoo axaaxee gommoochee Yeerichi gommooch ittoshi wottoon bekkiyoyich, ittoshin aacona afaallii beeto taane; tunaballi bi caammoonolla shaagoyich ta beddaano ta hillooch waa beeto, tayee beshi kupphoone; aroo Yaafa Ayaanoonaa qaaqqoona ittoshin afaallemmone.
40003012	Maayoon yoopii beeti yoopo bi kishoochiye; maayo bullin yoopiree xalliiyemmone; ara yoopee xallati teepphoon bi gotooch giddemmone; tunaballi echati guudo bullin tahaani qaaqqoona michemmone" iye.
40003013	Arooba Yesuusi Yowannisina aacona afaalleyoyich, Galiilee Shawoochee Yooridanoosi Aacooch waahe.
40003014	Tunaballi Yowannisi "Neenna afaalleyoo taach qaawiihalli, aabichiqqa taanna afaalleeya ta waan ne waane?" iqqi bajiye.
40003015	Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi, "And qaje gettaaye! Ebin tuniyoona Yeerichi aafooch kaamo tunato bullin shuuno nooch qaawiihe" iye. Arooba Yowannisi "Tunabe" iye.
40003016	Yesuusi aacona bi afaalleetoyee gub, aacoochee bekkach bi kechiyee, shimaayoo [biichoo] qecheehe; aroochee Yeerichi Ayaano bi ashittinee hallo uggeechoomon tunaqqi, bi toommooch kindii kotoon beeggiye.
40003017	Wotta shimaayoochee "Biinna ta emiriti, ta shuni bushoo hinine" ii beeti qaaro waayeehe.
40004001	Yesuusi aacona bi afaalleetoyee gub, Daabiloosi Yesuusin gondoon shuuniiya bi qiiccemmoyich, Yaafa Ayaano barahooch biin daammiye.
40004002	Aroochaa aabaa xumaa aabba qemon bi coomitoyee gub shaacahe.
40004003	Arooba Daabiloosi giddaqqi, "Yeerichi Bushoo ne gaata, hini xaqqeena'on 'Koshon tunabote!' gete!" iye.
40004004	Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi, " 'Asho Yeerichi noonoochee kechii beeti qaaro bullinalli, kosho ikketona beetaachemmone' getee Yaafa Macaafooch kooreetone" iye.
40004005	Ebiyee gub, Daabiloosi Yesuusin yaafee katamoo Yerusalem daammii, Yaafee Kechi guummooch kichii neechiqqi ishichiye:-
40004006	" 'Yeeri neen boonoshi quyemmoyich bi maraakeena'on ne waan deejemmone; ne baatoonolla xaqqo bi yexaachemmoyich, boonoshi kishoona neen tiijemmina'one' getee Yaafa Macaafooch kooreetone. Ebich Yeerichi Bushoo ne gaata, eke, hiniichee dugulla awureeree kindibe!" iye.
40004007	Yesuusiyoo "Wotta 'Asho bulli "Eke, Doono Yeeri taan bi wodiyoon beegana" getiree gondoon shuunaaye' getee Yaafa Macaafooch kooreetone" iye.
40004008	Aroochee Daabiloosi Yesuusin genja guudi toommooch daammiye; shawee toommooch beeti aagateena'o bullinaa boonoshi oogee yiiroonon bekkiiqqi,
40004009	"Taach yittaqqa ne goyinna gaata, eboshi bullin neech immemmo taane" iye.
40004010	Arooba Yesuusi Daabiloosin "Hini Sheexaanoocho! Ta aafoochee wohe! 'Ne Doono Yeerich goyinnabe! Bi ikketoyich baach maddibe (madaabe)!' getee Yaafa Macaafooch kooreetone" iye.
40004011	Aree gaata Daabiloosi Yesuusin qajii hammiye. Aroochee maraakeena'o giddaqqi Yesuusin deggiyeete.
40004012	Yesuusi Yowannisi yeshee cucheyoon waayaqqi Galiilee Shawooch tiyii hammiye.
40004013	Nazareti Katamoon qajiqqi Zebuloonee Shawoonaa Nifitaalemee Shawee daggoonooch Galiilee Baharee gashooch beeti Qifirinaahi Katamooch hammii kotahe.
40004014	Ebi tunato, Yeeri keemachi Isiyaasi noonoona gettito ceennemmoyichiye; ebiyoo
40004015	"Hini Zebuloonee Shawoonaa Nifitaalemee Shawoonooch, Qaabba Baharee gashooch beeti shawooch, Yooridanoosi Aacoyee beqach beeti shawooch, Wotta Galiilee Shawoochoo beeti aagateena'ote!
40004016	Mandarooch kotati ittoshi oogati bekkoon beeggito ittoshine; qitee yiiroo beeti shawooch kotati ittoshich bekko bekkatone" ii beetone.
40004017	Aroobee yemeenoochee tiijiqqi Yesuusi "Shimaaji taatittinee ittoshi kellooch shaggatine; ebich axaaxee gommoochee Yeer waan wottabote!" iibee getooch giyiye.
40004018	Yesuusi Galiilee baharee gashoona bi beshahee, gutta maneena'o Pheexiroosi gettee beeti Simooninaa Indiriyaasinon ciinniye; boonoshi shuunoo haashee yesho bi tunatoyich dabboon baharooch dupii beeheete.
40004019	Biyoo "Ta hillooch wobote! Haashoon hashiqqi ittoshi yeshoomon ashoon yeshiree ta waan ittoshi deebemmoyich tuniiyemmo taanee" iye.
40004020	Boonoshiyoo bekkach dabboon dupiichii biin dabbiqqi hammiyeete.
40004021	Aroochee Yesuusi beshaqqi bareena'o Yabidoosichi bushiishoo tunati gutta maneena'o Yaaqoobinaa Yowannisina boonoshi nihoo Yabidoosina tookkii marikabee toommoochaa dabboon boonoshi shipii beetee ciinniye; boonoshinoo ceeggiye.
40004022	Boonoshiyoo bekkach marikaboon, wotta boonoshi nihoonoo arooch dupiichii Yesuusin dabbii hammiyeete.
40004023	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi Ayihudeena'o kicee beeti kexoochaa asheena'oyich dojiibee, Yeerichi taatittinee mishiraachee qaaroon gettiibee, biiyo bulliichee asheena'on wodiibee, Galiilee Shawoo bullina guuddii beehe.
40004024	Arooba bi mooyo Sooriyee Shawoo bulliich waayeehe. Ebich asheena'o bari bara biiyoonaa xuuxoona xuuxaqqi beetina'o bullin, yinno boonoshi toommooch beetina'on, dupii beeti biiyachina'on, boonoshi ashittino qititina'on eboshi bullin bi waan deebiyeete; boonoshinoo Yesuusi wodiihe.
40004025	Arooba Galiilee Shawoochee, Aashira Katamee Shawoochee, Yerusalemee, Yihudee Shawoochee, Yooridanoosi Aacoyee beqachee waati dofee asheena'o biin dabbiyeete.
40005001	Yesuusi dofee asheena'on beeggiqqi gepooch kechii kotahe. Arooba bi dabbeena'o bi waan giddaheete.
40005002	Ishichiqqi boonoshinaa bara asheena'onoyich dojiye.
40005003	"Ayaanoona giracho boonoshi tunoon ariiqqi, Yeerichi aafooch giddaa beetina'o diireetina'one; Shimaaji taatittinee boonoshichine.
40005004	"Tuummii beetina'o diireetina'one; Yeeri boonoshin goggiiyemmone.
40005005	"Ga'i de'eena'o diireetina'one; Yeeri bi gibanikkito bullin boonoshich immemmone.
40005006	"Yeerichi aafooch cadiqoon tunoyich, oogichii qaatii beetina'o diireetina'one; Yeeri boonoshi qaatiton ceechemmone.
40005007	"Bareena'oyich ariqqaa beetina'o diireetina'one; Yeeri boonoshich ariqqemmone.
40005008	"Mulli xalleena'o diireetina'one; Yeerin boonoshi aafoona beeggemmina'one.
40005009	Kaaratina'on shunii beetina'o diireetina'one; 'Yeerichi Bushiisheena'one' getee ceeggeeyemmina'one.
40005010	"Yeerichi aafooch cadiqo tunati shuunoon boonoshi shuunatoyich Asheena'o boonoshin du'ii beetina'o diireetina'one; Shimaaji taatittine boonoshichine.
40005011	"Ta naboyich ittoshin boonoshi naagateenoo, boonoshi du'iiteenoo, gonda mooyon ittoshi toommooch koottiqqi boonoshi yibbaatateenoo diireeto ittoshine.
40005012	Ittoshiyee aaf beeti keemachina'on ebiyoomon du'iitina'one. Ebich hini ara keemachina'ona tookkii ooga wojoon shimaayoochaa Yeeri ittoshich immemmo bi tunatoyich, emiribote! Emiroona wucwucote!" iye.
40005013	"Shawee toommooch beeti asheena'o bullich ittoshi kiihoomo ittoshine. Tunaballi kiiho noocon bi qayi gaata, amoona noociiyeheete? Maaxooch kichi boonoshi dufee, baatoona neexxeeyehalli, gubbich amoonolla gaacaache.
40005014	"Shawee toommooch beetina'o bullich ittoshi bekko ittoshine. Gepee toommooch beeti Katamoo aashoon hakkaache.
40005015	Wotta ceechoon ceechiqqi bi toommooch gafatoon guupemmo koniyolla aalloone; tunaballi kechi daggooch beetina'o bullich bi bekkemmoyich, bekkooch kotiiheete.
40005016	Ebiyoomon asheena'o ittoshi de'a shuunoon beegiree shimaayooch beeti ittoshi Nihoo Yeerin boonoshi gallatemmoyich, bekkoochoomon asho bullich bekkabote!" iye.
40005017	Wotta Yesuusi ishcichiye:- "Ta waato Muusichi calloonaa keemachina'o dojiti mooyonon echiyoyich ittoshich shaahaaye; ceechiyalli echiyoyich waataano taane.
40005018	Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; shawoonaa shimaayoona beshammi wottoon Muusichi calloo bulli ceenaanoon napeyoomi mooyiyolla shawooch hollaachemmine.
40005019	Illa Yeeri 'Tuniibote!' iqqi bi gettiti hini calleena'oochee ikka giishacheeyicholla 'De'a getaache' iqqi bareena'onoo 'De'a gettaahotine!' iqqi dojii beeti asho koniyolla shimaaji taatittineechaa bulliyee desho tunemmone; tunatee de'a ii beetonaa bareena'on 'De'a getote!' iqqi dojii beetona koniyolla shimaaji taatittineechaa oogo tunammone.
40005020	Andoo ellabote! Yeerichi aafooch ittoshi cadiqittino Muusichi callee dojachina'onaa Fariseena'onochi cadiqittinoyee beshoo bi qayi gaata, shimaaji taatittineech ciroona giyaachemmo ittoshine" iye.
40005021	"Ebiyee aaf beeti no qaabbachina'oyich 'Wuxiyaahotine! Wuxito bullichi toommooch gonda nalloo kindemmone' getteeton waayato ittoshine.
40005022	Tunaballi and ta waanee waayabote! Bi manoon kaaraa beeto bulli nallee gabbarooch giddemmone; bi manoon 'Ulloocho!' iqqi naaggiyo bulli nallee iitee aafoochaa bi toommooch nalleyemmone; 'Mullaalli ongoocho!' iqqi naaggiyo bulli 'Shiwaree qaaqqooch dupabe' getee bi toommooch nalleeyemmone.
40005023	"Illa ne deejoon deejee gudee toommooch Yeerich giddiyoyich qanniibee, ne manoo neenna ayiniti mooyo beemon ne gabi gaata,
40005024	ara deejee gudee aafooch deejoon geddiichi shiichi hamiree biinna tookki shunabe! Ebiyee gub wottaree ne deejoon Yeerich giddiibe!
40005025	"Ne kaaracho ukkuroo waan neen bi daami gaata, kaataree gommoochaa shunabe! Ebi tuno qayi gaata, ukkuroyich neen beshii immemmone; ukkuroo bi ginee naayoyich immemmone; ginee naayoo cuyee kexooch neen giijemmone.
40005026	Ibaroon neech gettoye; ciireexi duudinolla ne qocammi wottoon ciroona aroochee keyaachemmo neene" iye.
40005027	Daakkiqqi Yesuusi ishichiye:- " 'Shunoon maayaahine!' getteeton waayato ittoshine.
40005028	Tunaballi and ta waanee waayabote! Maacheen ciinniqqi qaatito bulli bi mulloona biinna tookkii shunoon maatone.
40005029	Ebich ne qanna aafo neen yexi dichemmi xugo bi tuna gaata, kichiree dufe! Ne ashittino bulli shiwaree qaaqqooch bi dupeyoyee ne ashittinoochee ikkoo shapi gaata gaawiye.
40005030	Ne qanna kisho neen yexi dichemmi xugo bi tuna gaata, kuxiree dufe! Ne ashittino bulli shiwaree qaaqqooch dupeyoyee ne ashittinoochee ikkoo shapi gaata gaawiye" iye.
40005031	" 'Bi mecheen gawukkii beeto bulli bi gawukkee woraqatoon biich imbe' getteetone.
40005032	Tunaballi and ta waanee waayabote! Shunoon maataani bi mecheen gawukkii beeto bulli baroo waan hamiree shunoon bi maayemmoyich tuniitone; gawukkeetinoo shaaggii beeto shunoon maatone" iye.
40005033	"Wotta ebiyee aaf beeti no qaabbachina'oyich 'Wogaqqa Yeerich ne mookkaton ceechiballi shapiyaahine!' getteeton waayato ittoshine.
40005034	Tunaballi and ta waanee waayabote! Ne mookkoon wogoona cir mookkiyaahine! 'Shimaayoona!' getiree wogiyaahine! Yeerichi taatittinee xaa'oone.
40005035	'Shawoona!' getiree wogiyaahine! Yeerichi baatoo neexxii beeti xaa'oone. 'Yerusalemina!' getiree wogiyaahine! Bulliyee beshi taatoo Yeerichi katamoone.
40005036	Ne qelloona wogiyaahine! Ikka eexin naccee oohee aa'i tuniyoon hakkaachine.
40005037	Tunaballi tunemmon 'Tunabe' tunataachemmon 'Tunataache' gete! Ebiyee baroon ne yibbaata gaata, aroo gondoochi nihoo waaneeniye" iye.
40005038	Yesuusi daakkiqqi ishichiye:- " 'Koniyolla bara ashi aafoon bi dookki gaata, bi aafo dookkeebe; ebiyoomon ashi gashoon bi tiishi gaat, bi gasho tiichabe' getteeton waayato ittoshine.
40005039	Tunaballi and ta waanee waayabote! Ittoshi toommooch gondoon shuunaa beetochi toommooch nichoon kichiyaahotine! Tunaballi ne qanna gaakkoon tapammoyich yoochoon bajaahine!
40005040	Wotta ukkuroochi toommooch neen taggaqqi, 'Ne kootoon taach imbe!' iyoyich ne kutoon daakkiree imbe!
40005041	Wotta ginachina'ochi daggoochee ikkoo 'Ikka kiilee metiree wottoon ta qiicoon shaage!' iqqi neen bi yeshi gaata, hachee ikkoon daakkiree hambe!
40005042	Neen qollaa beetoyich imbe! ne waanee erattiya qaawii beetoyich bajaahine!" iye.
40005043	" 'Neenoomi ne manoon shune! Wotta ne shixachon shixe!' getteeton waayato ittoshine.
40005044	Tunaballi and ta waanee waayabote! Shimaayooch beeti ittoshi nihoo Yeeri bi halliti aabeen de'eena'onaa gondeena'onoyich aabii beetone; kaameena'onaa xummeena'onoyich tachiqqi amiyon dichii beetone. Ebich biin shaahiree ittoshi shixachina'on shunote! Ittoshin du'ii beetina'oyich corootibote!
40005046	Ittoshin shunnii beetina'on baach ittoshi shuni gaata, Yeeri waanee amee wojoon danehotine? Gabiyee guudeena'o ebin tuniyaacheeta?
40005047	Ittoshi maneena'on baach diggii beeto ittoshi tuna gaata, bareena'oyee amoona beshehotine? Yeerin ariyaaneena'olla ebin tunii beetina'one.
40005048	Illa shamaayeexi ittoshi nihoo Yeeri de'o bi tunatoomon, ittoshiyoo wotta de'oon tunabote!" iye.
40006001	"Yeerich ittoshi shuunaa beeti de'a shuunoon ashi be'anoyich ittoshi shuunataachemmoyich, ittoshi qelloon quyabote! Shimaayooch beeti ittoshi nihoo Yeer waanee wojoon cir danataachemmo ittoshine.
40006002	" 'Ebich iriteeti ashich ne immaa bee gaata, boonoshi maacoon xalloo shaahii beetina'on shaahiyaahine! Boonoshiyoo ashi waanee gallatee danoyich Ayihudeena'o kicee beeti kexonaa gommonoochaa iriteetina'oyich immii beetina'one. Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; areena'o ashi waanee gallatoon danatina'one; Yeer waanee amoonolla danataachemmina'one.
40006003	Tunatee iriteeti ashich ne immaa bee gaata, ne katinooch beeti asholla beeggaaye.
40006004	Aachiree imebe! Arooba aashoona ne tunii beeton beeggii beeti ne nihoo Yeeri neech wojemmone" iye.
40006005	"Ittoshi corootii bee gaata, boonoshi maacoon xalloo shaahii beeti asheena'ochoomon tuniyaahotine! Boonoshiyoo 'Asheena'o noon beegeete' iqqi Ayihudeena'o kicee beeti kexonaa gommi keeja kaattoonooch neexaachii corootoon shunnii beetina'one. Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; areena'o boonoshi shuunoon deqqitina'one.
40006006	Tunatee ne corootii bee gaata, ne gatooch giyiree ne gifoon hiciichi bekkataani ne nihoo Yeerich corootibe! Arooba aashoona ne tunii beeton beeggii beeti ne nihoo Yeeri neech wojemmone.
40006007	"Yeerin ariyaani asheena'o boonoshi yibbaatee genjoona Yeeri waayaa beeto boonoshich shaahii beetone. Tunatee ittoshi corootii bee gaata, boonoshichoomon aafaalli yibbaatoon yibbaatiyaahotine!
40006008	Ittoshi nihoo Yeeri ittoshi qollataan beetee, ittoshich qaawii beeton arii beetone; ebich ittoshi boonoshin shaahiyaahotine!
40006009	"Illa ittoshi ishichiree corootibote! 'Shimaayooch beeti no Nihoocho! Yaafa ne shigo oogabe;
40006010	Ne taatittino bullichi toommooch bede; shimaayooch beetina'o ne getoon boonoshi waayoomon, ebiyoomon shawooch beetina'o waayabeete;
40006011	Heeyi koshon hanaach nooch imbe!
40006012	No wotta noon xuqqitina'on no maaroomon, no gondoon nooch maaribe!
40006013	Gondoochi nihoo kishoochee noon quyaballi, bi dachooch noon geddaahine! [Taatittino, giidoo, oogee yiiroo bulli yemeenoon neechone; tookkona.]
40006014	"Ebiyoomon asheena'ochi xu'oon ittoshi maari gaata, shimaayeexi ittoshi nihoo Yeeri ittoshi gondoon maaremmone;
40006015	Tunaballi ittoshin xuqqitina'on ittoshi maaroo qayi gaata, ittoshi nihoo Yeeri ittoshi gondoon maaraachemmone" iye.
40006016	Daakkiqqi Yesuusi ishichiye:- "Ittoshi coomii bee gaata, boonoshi maacoon xalloo shaahii beeti asheena'ochoomon muushaniyaahotine! Boonoshiyoo coomacho boonoshi tunoon asheena'o beeggemmoyich boonoshi achoon shiimataaneena'one. Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; boonoshi shuunoon deqqitina'one.
40006017	"Tunatee ne coomii bee gaata, coomacho ne tuno arichataachemmoyich ne aafoon machabe! Ne qellooch huutabe! Arooba bekkataani ne nihoo Yeeri ikketo baach arii beetone; ebichi aashoona ne tunii beeton beeggii beeti ne nihoo Yeeri neech wojemmone" iye.
40006019	Daakkiqqi Yesuusi ishichiye:- "Piloonaa osharoona aalliiyemmi, gaayeena'o iiyiree gaajemmi shawee toommooch ittoshi gijoon kiciyaahotine!
40006020	Tunaballi piloonaa osharoona aalliyaachemmooch, gaayeena'o iiyiree gaayaachemmi shimaaji kexooch ittoshi gijoon kicibote!
40006021	Ne gijoo beetooch ne mullo tunemmone" iye.
40006022	Daakkiqqi ishichiye:- "Ashittinee ceechoo geto aafoone. Illa ne aafo iiwoo tuna gaata, ne ashittino bulli biremmone.
40006023	Tunatee ne aafo biiyi gaata, ne ashittino bulli mandaremmone. Illa ne waan beeti ashittinee ceechoo tahi gaata, mandarochi am shaaha magga mandaroo tunehe?" iye.
40006024	" 'Asho taane' ito gutta Doonoyich hajeyoon hakkaache. Ikkoon shuno baroon shixo, oohee ikkoon oogiyoo baroon hoxoone. Ebich gijoyich hajee beeti uro Yeerich hajeyoon, wotta Yeerich hajee beeti uro gijoyich hajeyoon hakkaache.
40006025	"Ebich ittoshich gettoye; 'Amoon maayehone? Amoon ucehone? Amoon tahehone?' getiree ittoshich qaawii beeti mooyoyich xuuxiyaahotine! Kasho maayoye, ashittinoo tahoyee beshaacha?
40006026	Eke shimaayoona yoobbii beeti kafeena'on ciinote! Shoohaacheete; qecaacheete; gotooch gedaacheete. Tunatee shimaayeexi ittoshi nihoo Yeeri boonoshich maanjii beetone. Ittoshi boonoshiyee oogichii beshaachotina?
40006027	Ittoshi daggoochee xuuxaree bi neexooch ikka hiroon daakkoon hakkemmo konine?
40006028	"Tahoyich akkiya xuuxaa beetotine? Eke gaddeexi mocee bungeena'o aabichiqqi boonoshi diccii beeto gaata, manjiiree ciinote! Yullataacheete; huttoon yokkataacheete.
40006029	Tunatee ittoshich gettoye; Taatoo Solomooniyolla ebi wodda bi oogee daggooch ikka mocee bungechoomon tahataanoone.
40006030	Illa hanaach bekkaqqi tiyi yaach gudee qaaggooch dufee mccii beeti gaddeexi mocoon Yeeri eechii tajii beeto bi tuna gaata, ittoshin aabichiree beshoon tajoo qajehe? Ittoshi mulloon Yeerichi toommooch amoyich too'iyaachotine?
40006031	Ebich 'Amoon maayehone? Amoon ucehone? Amoon tahehone?' getiree xuuxiyaahotine!
40006032	Eboshi bullin aagateena'o qaawii beetina'one. Ebi bulli ittoshich qaawii beeto bi tunoon shimaayeexi ittoshi nihoo Yeeri arii beetone.
40006033	Tunaballi shiichi Yeerichi taatittineen, bi cadiqoonoo qaawibote! Arooba ebi bullin bi ittoshich daakkemmone.
40006034	Illa, yaach ittoshi toommooch woyemmi xuuxoyich yaach xuuxemmo ittoshine; ebich yaachich xuuxiyaahotine! Hanaachi xuuxo hanaachich beddiye" iye.
40007001	Wotta Yesuusi ishichiye:- "Ashi gondoon ne haddii beetoomon Yeeri ne gondoon haddemmone; ashich ne qeellaa (Shafarii) beetoomon Yeeri wochiree neech qeellemmone. Ebich Yeeri ne gondoon bi haddaachemmoyich, ashi gondoon haddiyaahine!
40007003	Ne aafooch giyiti ooga giimboon shalligaanoon amoyich ne manoochi aafooch giyati giishacha guudeen ciinnaa beetine?
40007004	Wotta ne aafooch giyiti ooga giimboo beetee, aabichiqqa ne manoon 'Eke ne aafeexi guudeen kichibana' inne?
40007005	Hini ne maacoon xalloo shaahii beeti uroocho! shiichiree ne aafeexi ooga giimboon kichibe! Ebiyee gub ne manoochi aafeexi guudeen kichoyich manjiiree ciinnemmo neene.
40007006	"Shiixxi wottaree ittoshin boonoshi shacaachemmoyich, yaafeeton kunaaneena'oyich immaahotine! Wotta gudinina'o boonoshi baatoona boonoshi neexaachemmoyich, ittoshi aax qiicoon boonoshi aafooch dupaahotine!" iye.
40007007	"Yeerin qollabote! Ittoshich immemmone. Yeer waanee qaawibote! Danemmo ittoshine. Bi kelloonoo qofote! Ittoshich qechemmone.
40007008	Yeeri biin qollaa beeto bullich immemmone; qaawii beeto bulliyoo bi waanee danemmone; bi kelloon qopii beeto bullichoo qechemmone.
40007009	"Ittoshi daggoochee nihoo tunaachi koshon bi bushoo qollatee, xaqqoon tiijiree immeha?
40007010	Haashoonoo bi qollatee, dingaroon immeha?
40007011	Gondo ittoshi tunateenolla ittoshi bushiisheena'oyich de'a mooyon imon arii beeto ittoshine. Illa shimaayooch beeti ittoshi nihoo Yeeri biin qollaa beetina'oyich am shaaha beshaa beshiti de'a mooyon immehe?
40007012	Ebich 'Asho taach tuniibe' iqqi ittoshi shunnii beeto bullin, ittoshiyoo wotta ebiyoomon bara ashyich tuniibote! Ebin tuniyoona Muusichi calloonaa keemachina'ona dojiton ceechemmo ittoshine" iye.
40007013	Yesuusi daakkiqqi ishichiye:- "Xebba kelloona gibote! Shiwaree qaaqqooch bechii beeti kello gabino, gommoo naqqoone; ara kelloona giyii beeti asheena'o meetina'one.
40007014	Tunatee kashee kexooch bechii beeti kello xebboo, gommoo gepoone. Ara gommon danaa beetina'o giishacheena'one" iye.
40007015	"Koota keemachina'o waanee ittoshi qelloon quyabote! Boonoshi noonoona bagoochoomon duuroo shaahibee ittoshi waan woyemmina'one; tunaballi boonoshi mullo kuxxii maa beeti okaroomone.
40007016	Boonoshin ittoshi ariiyemmo boonoshi shuunoonaniye. Ebiyoomon asheena'o angixoochee woyinee aafoon, guccinoochee balasee michi aafoon maceheeta?
40007017	Ebiyoo de'a mixo bulli de'a aafoon aafahe; gonda mixo gonda aafoon aafahe.
40007018	De'a mixo gonda aafoon aafo, gonda mixo de'a aafoon aafo hakkaache.
40007019	De'a aafoon aafataani mixo bullin kuxxii qaaqqooch dupiyeete.
40007020	Ebich koota keemachina'on ittoshi ariiyemmo boonoshi shuunoonaniye" iye.
40007021	"Shimaayooch beeti ta nihoo Yeerichi daaggoon ceechii beetoalli, baad taan 'Ta Doonocho! Ta Doonocho!' ii beeto bulli shimaaji taatittineech giyemmo toonoone.
40007022	Nallaa gallooba meetina'o taan 'Ta Doonocho! Ta Doonocho! Ne shigoona keemoon keemaano noonna? Ne shigoona yinnoon ashi toommoochee yoohaano noona? Ne shigoona gaakkachi mooyon shuunataano noona?' gettemmina'one.
40007023	Arooba 'Hini hukkachina'ote! ta waanee wohote! Ittoshin cir ariyaano taane' getiree boonoshich xalla gettemmo taane" iye.
40007024	"Illa hini ta qaaroon waayaqqi ceechi beeto bulli, bi kexon manja xaqqee nashee toommooch haggiti mullachi uroomone.
40007025	Amiyo kindiye; ambamboo tiyiye; yongo yongahe; ara kexon xuqqiye. Tunatee manja xaqqee nashee toommooch bi haggatoyich, dihaanoone.
40007026	Wotta hini ta qaaroon waayaqqi ceechano bulli, bi kexon qacee toommooch haggiti yeexara uroomone.
40007027	Amiyo kindiye; ambamboo tiyiye; yongo yongahe; ara kexon xuqqiye; bekkach ara kexo gugumimmiqqi dihiye" iye.
40007028	Yesuusi hini yibbaatoon yibbaataqqi bi ciichiyona, asheena'o bi dojiti doyoona woriganaheete.
40007029	Boonoshich bi dojito calloon immii beeti taatoochoomonalli, Muusichi callee dojachina'o dojii beetoomon toonoone.
40008001	Yesuusi gepoochee bi kindiyee, dofee asheena'o biin dabbiyeete.
40008002	Arooba qeddee shaddee biiyachi ikka uro bi waan giddaqqi, "Ta Doonocho! Ne daaggi gaata, taan wodiyoon hakkihine" iibee goyinnahe.
40008003	Yesuusiyoo bi kishoon hini ara uroochi toommooch kotiiqqi, "Daaggiyoye; wodibe!" iye. Ishichii bi iyona, uro bekkach qeddee shaddee biiyoochee wodiye.
40008004	Yesuusiyoo "Ebi ne wodoon konicholla gettaahine! Ne qelloon ariibe! Tunaballi and hamiree ne ashittinoon qeeshoyich bekkiibe! Ne wodoon asheena'o bulli xiishemmoyich, Muusi bi callooch 'deejibote!' iqqi bi kooriti deejoon Yeerichi deejibe!" iqqi daachiihe.
40008005	Yesuusi Qifirnaahi Katamooch bi shaggiyee, balla ginee iraashoo bi waan waaqqi,
40008006	"Ta Doonocho! Ta wochee bushoo ashittinoon wuxii beeti biiyoona biiyaa qaaqqaqqi beerooch qeyitone" iqqi qollahe.
40008007	Yesuusi "Ta hamiree wodiiyemmo taane" iye.
40008008	Hini ara balla ginee iraashoo wochiqqi, "Ta Doonocho! Ta kexooch ne giyi beddammi uro toono taane; tunaballi ikka qaaroon baach gete! Ta aafee bushoo wodemmone.
40008009	Ta wotta tayee dambeena'oyich hajee beeto taane; tayee desh beeti ginee naayina'o wotta taach hajee beetina'one. Ikkoon 'Hambe!' ta geti gaata, hammii beetone; baroon 'Wobe!' ta geti gaata, waa beetone; ta aafee bushoon 'Ebin tuniibe!' ta geti gaata, tunii beetone" iye.
40008010	Yesuusi ishin waayaqqi woriganahe; biin dabbii beeti asheena'oyichoo ishichiye:- "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; Isra'eelee Shawooch beeti Ayihudeena'ochi daggoochee koninolla ebiyoomon bi mulloon ta toommooch too'iiti ashoon danataano taane.
40008011	Ellabote! Aagateena'o aabi keyonaa aabi gimonoochee woyemmina'one; Abrahami, Yisaaqinaa Yaaqoobina tookki shimaaji taatittineech gifiree maayoon maaya kotemmina'one;
40008012	Tunatee 'Shimaaji taatittine noochine' ii beetina'o maach mandarooch kichee dupeeyemmina'one; aroochaa eefonaa gashee qaayona boonoshich tunemmone" iye.
40008013	Wotta Yesuusi balla ginee iraashoyich "Hambe! 'Ta aafee bushoon wodiiyemmone' iqqa ne mulloon ta toommooch ne too'iitoomon neech tunabe" iye. Bi aafee bushoo bekkach aree gaata wodiye.
40008014	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi Pheexiroosichi kexooch giyiqqi bi amaatee achee gaamee biiyoona biiyaqqa beerooch qeyaa beetin beeggiye;
40008015	Tiyiqqi bi kishoon yechiye; urechi achee gaamoo bekkach aqqahe; beeroochee tiyaqqa maayoon qanniiqqa Yesuusich giddiihan.
40008016	Shawoo xumatee yinno boonoshi toommooch beeti meeti asheena'on Yesuus waan deebiyeete. Yinneena'on noggaqqi asheena'ochi toommoochee yookkiye; biiyatina'o bullinoo wodiihe. Ebich arooba keemachi Isiyaasi "No maraateshon maraatahe; no biiyeshon biiyahe" bi ito ceenniye.
40008018	Yesuusi dofee asheena'o bi guudoona giishon beeggiqqi bi dabbeena'on "Baharoyee beqach kimbone" iye.
40008019	Aree hillooch ikka Muusichi callee dojacho waaqqi, "Dojachocho! Ne hammammo bulliich neen dabbemmo taane" iye.
40008020	Yesuusiyoo "Boqqalleena'oyich opo, shimaaji kafeena'oyichoo kexo beetone; ebi tunahona ashi bushoo taach giyi ta qeyemmi xaa'oo aalloone" iye.
40008021	Biin dabbii beetina'ochi daggoochee ikka bara uro "Ta Doonocho! Neen dabbemmo taane; shiich wottaree hami ta nihoon ta duukkemmoyich taan daaggibe!" iye.
40008022	Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Kashoon danataani qiteena'o boonoshi xibeena'on duuheete; tunatee ne taan dabbibe!" iye.
40008023	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi marikabooch kechii kotaqqi bi dabbeena'ona tookkii hammiye.
40008024	Diqqoona aachi aayo tiyiqqi, marikaboon aaco qerimmi wottoon baharo oogichii shuuriye; tunatee Yesuusi tokkatatone.
40008025	Bi dabbeena'oo giddaqqi, "No Doonocho! Noon wodiibe! Aallato noone!" iibee tokkatoochee Yesuusin tiijiyeete.
40008026	Biyoo "Hini ittoshi mulloon ta toommooch too'iyaaneena'ote! Amoyich shattii beetotine?" iye. Ebiyee gub, tiyiqqi yongoonaa baharee aachi aayonon noggahe; bekkach baharo shashawumiye.
40008027	Asheena'o "Yongoonaa baharoonolla biich de'a ii beeti hini uro am shaaha ashoone?" iibee woriganaheete.
40008028	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi baharoyee beqach kimmiqqi Geraashee asheena'ochi shawooch bi shaggiyee, yinno boonoshi toommooch beeti gutta asheena'o maasho beetoochee kechiqqi biinna danaheete. Areena'o boonoshi beeti gommonolla beshoon asho shatammi wottoon sharachina'one.
40008029	Boonoshiyoo bekkach bunnaqqi, "Yeerichi Bushoocho! No mooyooch neen amo geddiye? Nallaa galloo waataan beetee noon xuuxiiya hiniich waanne?" iibee cookiyeete.
40008030	Arooba boonoshi beetoochee wokkiqqi beeti xaa'ooch dofee gudinina'o mocoon maa beeheete.
40008031	Yinneena'o "Noon ne yookkemmo gaata, gudinina'ochi toommooch hami kotabone; daaggibe!" iqqi qollaheete.
40008032	"Hamiree kotabote!" iye. Bekkach yinneena'o asheena'ochi toommoochee tiyiqqi hammii gudinina'ochi toommooch kotaheete. Aroochee gudinina'o bulli giidachi qaa'ooch guufaa kindii baharee gejoona manjaheete.
40008033	Gudinon qiddaa beetina'o wocaa katamooch hammiqqi tunati mooyonaa yinno boonoshi toommooch beeti asheena'ochi mooyo bullinon asheena'oyich gettiyeete.
40008034	Ebich katameexi asheena'o bulli Yesuusina danoyich waaheete; biin boonoshi beeggitoyee gub "No shawoochee keyiree hambe!" iqqi qollaheete.
40009001	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi marikabooch giyii baharoon kimmiqqi aaf bi beeti Qifirinaahi Katamooch wottaa waahe.
40009002	Arooba bi ashittino qititi ikka uroon shaa'oona shaagaqqi bi waan deebiyeete. Yesuusiyoo "Wodiiyemmone" iqqi boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch boonoshi too'iyoon beeggiqqi, bi ashittino qititi uroon "Ta bushoocho! Kupphabe! Ne axaaxoyich maaroon danato neene" iye.
40009003	Aree gaata Muusichi callee dojachina'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o boonoshi mulloona "Ebi Yeerin naagone" iyeete.
40009004	Yesuusiyoo boonoshi shalligoon ariiqqi ishichiye:- "Ittoshi mulloona gonda mooyon amoyich gabiyotine?
40009005	'Ne axaaxoyich maaroon danato neene' getonaa 'Tiyiree hambe!' getonoochee kettoo aabine?
40009006	Tunatee ashi bushoo ta hini shawee toommoochaa ashi axaaxoon maaroyich, damba Yeer waanee daaggeeto ta tunoon ittoshi ariiyemmoyich ..." iqqi tiyii bi ashittino qititi uroon "Hini uroocho! And tibe! Ne shaa'oon shaagiree ne kexooch hambe!" iye.
40009007	Bi ashittino qititi uroo bekkach tiyiqqi bi kexooch hammiye.
40009008	Ebin dofee asheena'o beeggiqqi shataheete; ebiyoomi doonjittinoon ashich bi immitoyich Yeerin oogiiheete.
40009009	Yesuusi aroochee beshaqqi hammiibee Maatiyoosi gettee beeti ikka uro qaraxo kuxxee beeti gabbarooch kotaa bi beetee ciinniqqi, "Taan dabbibe!" iye. Aroo tiyiqqi biin dabbiye.
40009010	Aroyee gub, Yesuusi Maatiyoosichi kexooch giyiqqi maayo giddatee madee toommooch bi beetee, meeti gabiyee guudeena'onaa axaaxachina'ona waaqqi Yesuusinaa bi dabbeena'ona tookkii kotaheete.
40009011	Ikkikka Fariseena'o ebin beeggiqqi bi dabbeena'on "Ittoshi dojacho gabiyee guudeena'onaa axaaxachina'ona tookkii ikkooch bi maa beeto amoyichiye?" iqqi echaheete.
40009012	Yesuusi ishin waayaqqi ishichiye:- "Biiyachina'oyichalli wodeena'oyich atti kuxxacho qaawiyaache.
40009013	Hambote! Yeeri 'Taach ittoshi deejii beeti deejoyee bareena'oyich ittoshi ariqqooniye ta shunnaa beeto' bi ito ama geto gaata ariibote! 'Axaaxoon shuunataano noone; axaaxee gommoochee Yeer waan wotto nooch qaawiyaache' ii beeti cadiqo shaahii beetina'on ceegoyich waataano taane" iye.
40009014	Arooba Yowannisichi dabbeena'o Yesuus waan waaqqi, "Noonnaa Fariseena'ona [meeti araddoon] coomii beeto noone; tunatee ne dabbeena'o amoyich coomaacheete?" iqqi echaheete.
40009015	Yesuusiyoo ishichiqqi wochiye; "Wo'ee keno boonoshina tookkii beetee, miyaateena'o muushaneheeta? Tunaballi wo'ee keno boonoshi waanee baremmi aabo woyemmone; arooba coomemmina'one.
40009016	"Ebiyoo geena tahooch andra xefoon xefaa beeto aalloone; bi xefa gaata, andra xefo geenoon kushi yeshiree beshoon keexxemmone.
40009017	Ebiyee wotta geena mollaxxooch gaara woyinee uyoon kotiyaacheete. Boonoshi kotii gaata, mollaxxoon gaakkemmone; uyo ufemmone; mollaxxoo duubemmone. Tunaballi gaara woyinee uyoon andra mollaxxooch kotiiheete; gutteena'oo duubataanoon beeyemmina'one" iye.
40009018	Yesuusi ishichiqqi gettii bi beetee, ikka Ayihudeena'ochi ukkuroo waaqqi, "Ta bushee and qititine; tunaballi waaree ne kishoon bi shimbooch kotiibe! Bi kashoo wottemmone" ii qollaqqi goyinnahe.
40009019	Yesuusiyoo bi kotatoochee tiyiqqi bi dabbeena'ona tookkii uroon dabbiqqi hammiye.
40009020	Hammii boonoshi beetee, aaraa gutta naton damoo ufaa beeti ure Yesuusichi gubbaa hammaqqa bi qoraddee caapoon yechahan.
40009021	Eechii bi ito, bi mulloona "Bi qoraddoon baach ta yeshi gaata, wodemmi taane" iqqa bi gibanatoyichiye.
40009022	Yesuusiyoo guuddii wottaa ciinniqqi tiyii, "Ta busheene! Kupphabe! 'Wodiiyemmone' iqqa ne mulloon ta toommooch ne too'iyoo neen wodiitone" iye. Ureyoo bekkach wodiyan.
40009023	Yesuusi Ayihudeena'ochi ukkuroo kexooch bi shaggiyee, eepi tiimboon huggachina'onaa cangachaa beeti asheena'onon beeggiqqi,
40009024	"Bushee tokkataanalli bi ito, qitaaneene. Eke kexoochee keyote!" iye. Asheena'o oogichii biin coonaabee miicaheete.
40009025	Tunatee asheena'on kexoochee bi kichitoyee gub, bushee qeyaa beeti gatooch giyiqqi bushechi kishoona yechiye; busheyoo bekkach motakkimii tiyahan.
40009026	Hini mooyo ara shawoo bulliich waayeehe.
40009027	Yesuusi aroochee tiyiqqi bi hammii beetee, aaf dooga gutta asheena'o "Daawiti bushoocho! Nooch ariqqabe!" iqqi cookiibee biin dabbiyeete.
40009028	Yesuusi kexooch bi giyitoyee gub ara aaf doogeena'o bi waan giddaheete. Yesuusiyoo "Ittoshi aafoon wodiyee ta hakkoon ibariihotina?" iqqi echahe. "Eeha, no Doonocho!" iqqi wochiyeete.
40009029	Arooba Yesuusi " 'Wodiiyemmone' iqqa ittoshi mulloon ta toommooch ittoshi too'itoomon ittoshich tunabe" iqqi boonoshi aafoon yechiye.
40009030	Boonoshi aafoo qecheetee ciinniyeete. Yesuusi "Konicholla gettaahotine!" iqqi manjiiqqi gettiye.
40009031	Tunatee boonoshi kechiqqi ara shawoo bulliich woriyeete.
40009032	Hini ara boonoshi aafo woditi asheena'o hammii boonoshi beetee, asheena'o yinno bi toommooch beeti ikka noona miima uroon Yesuus waan deebiyeete.
40009033	Yinnoon bi yookkitoyee gub noona miimo yibbaatahe. Asheena'o bulli "Ebiyoomi mooyon Isra'eelee Shawoochee beeggaa ariyaano noone" iibee woriganaheete.
40009034	Tunatee Fariseena'o "Yinnee taatoochi giidoonaniye yinnoon asheena'ochi toommoochee bi yookkii beeto" iyeete.
40009035	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi Ayihudeena'o kicee beeti kexoochaa dojiibee, Yeerichi taatittinee mishiraachee qaaroon gettiibee, asheena'ochi toommooch beeti biiyo bullin wodiibee, katamoonaa gafoo bullinooch guuddii beehe.
40009036	Dofee asheena'o qiddaalli bagoochoomon dego muccaqqi boonoshi iriteyoon beeggiqqi bi maacoona mccii ayiniye.
40009037	Arooba bi dabbeena'on "Qecceeyemmi maayo woddoone; tunaballi qecii kicachina'o giishacheena'one.
40009038	Illa maayi Doono Yeeri qecceeyemmi maayo beetooch qeciree kicemmina'on bi deejemmoyich qollabote!" iye.
40010001	Yesuusi aaraa gutta bi dabbeena'on bi waan ceeggiqqi, yinneena'on asheena'ochi toommoochee boonoshi yookkemmoyich, biiyatina'o bullinoo boonoshi wodiiyemmoyich ukkurittinoon boonoshich immiye.
40010002	Hini ara aaraa gutta mishiraachachina'ochi shigo, batti bat "Pheexiroosi" iqqi bi shigiiti Simooni, bi manoo Indiriyaasi, Yabidoosichi bushiisheena'o Yaaqoobinaa Yowannisina,
40010003	Filipphoosi, Baritelemoosi, Toomaasi, gabiyee guudo Maatiyoosi, Ilfoosichi bushoo Yaaqoobi, Taadiyoosi,
40010004	Bi aagatoyich qanaataa beeti Simooni, Yesuusin beshiiqqi immiti Asqorotachi Yihudi eboshine.
40010005	Arooba Yesuusi hini ara aaraa gutteena'on wochahe; ishichiqqinoo boonoshich gettiye:- "Aagateena'ochi shawee gommona hammaahotine! Shamaari Katamoochoo giyaahotine!
40010006	Tunaballi bago aalloomon aallati Isra'eeleena'o waan hambote!
40010007	Hamibee, 'Shimaaji taatittine ittoshi kellooch shaggatine' getiree getote!
40010008	Biiyatina'on wodiibote! Qititina'on tiijibote! Qeddee shaddee biiyachina'on wodiibote! Yinnoon asheena'ochi toommoochee yoohote! Gatiyaalloon Yeer waanee deqqito ittoshine; ebich ittoshiyoo gatiyaalloon asheena'oyich imbote!
40010009	Amee gijoonolla ittoshi burooch yechahotine!
40010010	Gommoyich shohee kojoon, oohee gutta tahoon, oohee ittoshi baatooch ittoshi gedditoyee bara caammoon, oohee gumboon yechahotine! Ebiyoo shuunacho biin shuuniito waanee shohoon maayi bi bedditoyichiye.
40010011	"Ittoshi giyimmi katamooch tunabe, gafooch arooch beeti asheena'on 'Noon iibbiiyemmi gaawa asho aabine?' getiree echabote! Ara gafoon gawukkiqqi ittoshi hammimmi wottoon ara kexooch kotabote!
40010012	Ara kexooch ittoshi giyi gaata, diggoo getote!
40010013	Kechi Doono ittoshin bi iibbii gaata, ittoshi diggiyoo biich diiroo tunabe; iibbiyoo bi qayi gaata, ittoshi diggiyoo biich diiroo tunaaye.
40010014	Ittoshin iibbiyaano oohee ittoshi qaaroon waayataani uro bi dana gaata, ara kexon oohee ara katamoon gawukkiree keyibee ittoshi baateexi quttoon tebbabote!
40010015	Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; nallaa gallooba ara katameexi asheena'oyee Sodoomi Katameexi asheena'onaa Gamoori Katameexi asheena'onoyich gaawiye" iye.
40010016	Daakkiqqi Yesuusi ishichiye:- "Ellabote! Bagoochoomon okareena'ochi daggooch ittoshin wochemmo taane. Ebich dingaroochoomon accacho, uggeechoomon duuroo tunabote!
40010017	Tunaballi nallachina'oyich ittoshin beshiiree immemmina'one; Ayihudeena'o kicee beeti kexoochaa arangoona xoobbeeyemmo ittoshine; ebich ashi waanee ittoshi qelloon quyabote!
40010018	Ta naboyich iraasheena'onaa taateena'onochi aafooch ittoshin neechemmina'one; ebi bi tunemmo boonoshinaa aagateena'onoyich miixoo ittoshi tunemmoyichiye.
40010019	Asheena'o ittoshin beshii imiyooba 'Aabichiree gettehone?' oohee 'Ama gettehone?' getiree xuuxiyaahotine! Aree gaata ittoshi gettemmon Yeeri ittoshich immemmone.
40010020	Ittoshi gettemmi qaaro ittoshi waanee toonoone; tunatee ittoshi nihoo Yeeri wochati Yaafa Ayaano ittoshi gettemmi qaaroon ittoshich immemmone.
40010021	"Arooba manoo bi manoon, nihoo bi bushoon wuxemmoyich beshiiree immemmone; wotta bushiisheena'o boonoshi niheena'onaa indeena'onochi toommooch tiyiree wuxiiyemmina'one.
40010022	Asheena'o bulli ta naboyich ittoshin shixxemmina'one; tunatee ciirooch beddaahee manjiqqi kupphammo wodemmone.
40010023	Arooba ikka katamoochaa ittoshin boonoshi du'ii gaata, bara katamooch maxxabote! Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; ashi bushoo ta waammi wottoon Isra'eelee Shaweexi katamoo bulliich bedaachemmo ittoshine.
40010024	"Dabbito biin dabbiitoyee, wocheeto biin wochati bi doonoyee beshaanoone.
40010025	Dabbito biin dabbiitochoomon, wocheeto biin wochatochoomon tun beddiye. Kechi doonon 'Beelzebuli' iqqi boonoshi gettitoyee, bi kechi ashoon am shaahoon beshiiree getteeheete!" iye.
40010026	"Illa asheena'oyich shattaahotine! Qereeto bulli gaxxeyoo, aacheeto bulliyoo aricho echataani mooyone.
40010027	Qeroochaa ta gettaa beeton bullich xalla kichiree getote! Shaashikkoona ittoshi waayaton asheena'o bullich cookiree getote!
40010028	Meenon wuxoyee damba kashoon wuxoo hakkaaneena'oyich shattaahotine! Tunatee meenonaa kashoonon shiwaree qaaqqoona aalliyoon hakkimmi Yeerich shatote!
40010029	Gutta gaashi kafeena'o ikka duudina kechee beetaacheeta? Tunaballi ittoshi nihoo Yeeri daaggaanoon boonoshi daggoochee ikkeyolla qitaachemmine.
40010030	Ebiyoomon Yeeri ittoshi qelleexi eexo bullinolla haddiqqi ariitone.
40010031	Illa shattaahotine! Meeti gaashi kafeena'oyee beshoo ittoshine" iye.
40010032	"Ashi aafoochaa taacho bi tunoon miixammo bullich ta wotta shimaayooch beeti ta nihoochi aafoochaa 'Taachone' getiree miixemmo taane;
40010033	Ashi aafoochaa taacho bi tunoon nookkammo bullin ta wotta shimaayooch beeti ta nihoochi aafoochaa 'Taacho toonoone' getiree nookkemmo taane" iye.
40010034	"Shawee toommooch beeti kaaroon wokkiyoyich waato taan shaahiyaahotine! Ginee tiijoyichalli kaaroon wokkiyoyich waataano taane.
40010035	Bushoon nihoona, busheen indeena, amaateen naamacheena tookki kaariyoyich waato taane.
40010036	Ashich bi kechi asho gino tunemmone.
40010037	"Tayee beshiiqqi bi nihoon oohee bi indeen shunnii beeto taacho tun bedaache; ebiyoomon tayee beshiiqqi bi bushoon oohee bi busheen shunnii beeto taacho tun bedaache;
40010038	ta yooddeeyemmi masqaloon ta shaaggemmoomon, bi yooddeeyemmi masqaloon shaagiree taan dabbaachemmo taacho tun bedaache.
40010039	Bi meechi kasheen qitoochee wodii beeto, aallataani kashoon muccemmone; tunaballi bi meechi kasheen taacha iqqi muccaa beeto, aallataani kashoon danemmone" iye.
40010040	"Ittoshin shunnii beeto taan shunnii beetone; taanoo shunnii beeto taan deejiti Yeerin shunnii beetone.
40010041	Keemachon, keemacho bi tunatoyich shunnii beeto, keemachona tookki tatee wojoon danemmone; cadiqoon, cadiqo bi tunatoyich shunnii beeto, tatee wojoon danemmone.
40010042	Koniyolla hini gishiisheena'oochee ikkoo ta dabboo bi tunatoyich gara aaconolla immii beeto, ibaroon ittoshich gettoye, wojoon muccataachemmone" iye.
40011001	Yesuusi ebin aaraa gutta bi dabbeena'oyich gettiqqi bi ciichitoyee gub, ara xaa'oochee tiyiqqi dojoonaa Yeerichi qaaroon getonoyich bara katameena'ooch hammiye.
40011002	Yowannisi cuyee kexooch beebee Kiristoosichi shuunoon waayahe; ebich bi dabbeena'oochee ikkikkeena'on Yesuus waan wochaa daachiihe.
40011003	Wocheetina'oo bi waan hammiqqi, " 'Woyemmone' getteeti Kiristoosi neenashi, oohee baroon quyabona?" iqqi echaheete.
40011004	Yesuusi wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Hamiree ittoshi waamona ittoshi waayaton, ittoshi aafoona ittoshi ciinnitonoo Yowannisich getote!
40011005	Aaf doogeena'o ciinnii beetina'one; baata yesheena'oo sha'aa beetina'one; qeddee shaddee biiyoona biiyatina'oo wodii beetina'one; ulleena'oo waayaa beetina'one; qititina'oo wodii beetina'one; girachina'oyichoo Yeerichi mishiraachee qaaro gettee beetone.
40011006	Ta shuunoo biich xugo tunataani asho bulli diireetone" iye.
40011007	Yowannis waanee wocheetina'o wottaqqi boonoshi hammii beetee, Yesuusi Yowannisichi mooyon dofee asheena'oyich getooch giyiye; boonoshichoo ishichiye:- "Amoon beegga barahooch hammiyotine? Yongoona koho shuuroomon shuurii beeti ashoon beegga hammiyotinashi
40011008	oohee amoon beegga hammiyotine? De'a tahoon tahati uroon beegga hammiyotina? De'a tahoon tahati asho taateena'ochi kexoochiye bi beeto.
40011009	Oohee amoon beegga hammiyotine? Keemachoniya? Eeha, ittoshich gettoye; keemacho bulliyee beshoon beegganiye ittoshi hammito.
40011010	" 'Yeeriyoo "Ne gommon qaxxemmi ta wocheyachon neyee shiichiree daachiiyemmo taane" itone' getee kooreeto ebine.
40011011	Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; shawee toommooch shiijatina'ochi daggoochee Aacona Afaallachi Yowannisiyee beshi asho danataanoone; tunaballi shimaaji taatittineechaa bulliyee desho tunato biyee beshemmone.
40011012	Aacona Afaallachi Yowannisichi yemeenoochee tiijiqqi hanaach beddaahee boggachina'o giidachi koyoona shimaaji taatittineen kochitina'one; biin bogga tiyitina'one.
40011013	Keemachina'onaa Muusichi calloona Yowannisichi yemeenooch beddaahee keemoon keemmii beeheete.
40011014	Illa boonoshi gettiton de'oyich ittoshi shuni gaata, ara 'Woyemmone' getteeti Eliyaasi, ebiyoche! Yowannisine.
40011015	Illa waayaa beeti waajacho waayabe.
40011016	"Tunaballi hini yemeenooch beeti asheena'on amoona shaahiiyehote? Gabiyee godooch kotaa beeti bushiisheena'oniye boonoshi shaahii beeto; boonoshinaa boonoshina ceegeebee,
40011017	'Emiree shumburoon ittoshich huggahone; tunatee ittoshi duubaachotine; muushanee shooshoon shooshahone; tunatee ittoshi eefataachotine' ii beeti bushiishoomina'one.
40011018	Yowannisi maataanoon, uyaanoon bi waatee, boonoshi 'Hini yinnachone!' iyeete.
40011019	Ashi bushoo ta maabee, uchaabee ta waatee, boonoshi 'Hini maayoonaa uyoonochi buujoone; wotta gabiyee guudeena'onaa axaaxachina'onochi shunachone' iyeete. Tunatee Yeerichi ariyoo tata shuunoona arichatone" iye.
40011020	Arooba Yesuusi meeti gaakkachi shuunoon bi bekkiiti katamee asheena'o axaaxee gommoochee Yeer waan wottoon boonoshi qajitoyich, oogichii boonoshin ittibatahe; boonoshichoo ishichiye:-
40011021	"Hini Kuraaji Katameexi asheena'ote! Ittoshich woowo! Wotta hini Betashayidi Katameexi asheena'ote! Ittoshich woowo! Ittoshich ta bekkiiti gaakkachi shuunoon Xiroosi Katameexi asheena'onaa Sidooni Katameexi asheena'onoyich ta bekkiito gaata, ebiyee aaf muushanee qoraddoon taharee, axaaxee gommoochee Yeer waan wotteshina'one.
40011022	Tunaballi ittoshich gettoye; nallaa gallooba ittoshiyee Xiroosinaa Sidooninochi Katameexi asheena'onoyich gaawiye.
40011023	Hini Qifirinaahi Katameexi asheena'ote! Shimaayooch beddaahee ciixato ittoshine; Yeeri ittoshin kindiiree qititina'o kiceeti hoonooch dupemmone. Ittoshich ta bekkiiti gaakkachi shuunoon Sodoomi asheena'oyich ta bekkiito gaata, hanaach beddaahee ara katamoo beeyeshone.
40011024	Tunaballi ittoshich gettoye; nallaa gallooba ittoshiyee Sodoomi asheena'oyich gaawiye" iye.
40011025	Arooba Yesuusi ishichiye:- "Shawoonaa shimaayoonochi Doono tunati ta nihoocho! Ebin ariyachina'onaa shalligachina'ona ariyaachemmoyich ne aachitoyich, tuusheena'oyichoo ne bekkiitoyich neen gallatahoye.
40011026	Ibaroone, ta nihoocho! Ebin tuniyoyich gaawati ne daaggo tunatone" iye.
40011027	Wotta Yesuusi asheena'oyich "Ta nihoo bulli mooyon taach immitone; nihoo Yeeriyee damba Yeerichi Bushoo taan arii beeto aalloone; Yeerichi Bushoo tayee damba, wotta Yeerichi Bushoo ta biich bekkiiya ta daaggiti ashoyee damba, nihoo Yeerin arii beeto aalloone.
40011028	"Hini maraatatina'onaa shaago maggatina'onote! Ta waan wobote! Tawoo ittoshin kashiiyemmo taane.
40011029	Tawoo ga'i de'oonaa ta qelloon giishii beetona ta tunatoyich, ta waanjeen shaagote! Ta waaneenoo doyibote! Arooba ittoshi taanna kashemmo ittoshine.
40011030	Ittoshi toommooch ta haxxemmi waanjee ga'i de'eene; ittoshich ta shaaggiiyemmi shaageyoo ketteene" iye.
40012001	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi Shambatee aabooba teepphee goyee daggoona beshahe. Arooba bi dabbeena'o shaacaqqi teepphee moochoon kuxxiqqi maaheete.
40012002	Kuxxiqqi boonoshi maa beetee, Fariseena'o beeggiqqi Yesuusin "Ebiyoche! Shambatee aabooba Muusichi calloo bajiton ne dabbeena'o tunii beetina'one' iyeete.
40012003	Yesuusi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Daawitinaa biinna tookkii beetina'ona boonoshi shaacahooba Daawiti tuniiton shemmataachotina?
40012004	Yeerichi kexooch giyiqqi qeesheena'oyichalli boonoshich daageyaani yaaree koshon biinnaa biinna tookkii beetina'ona maatina'one.
40012005	Qeesheena'o yaafee kexooch Shambatee aaboon boonoshi quyo qajitee, axaaxoo boonoshich tunee qayon Muusichi calloochee shemmataachotina?
40012006	Tunaballi ittoshich gettoye; Yaafee Kexoyee besho hiniich beetone.
40012007	Wotta Yeeri 'Ta shunnaa beeto, ashich ariqqoonalli deejoon toonoone' bi ito ama geto gaata bi tunoon ittoshi ariito gaata, axaaxoon shuunataaneena'ochi toommooch nallaachesho ittoshine.
40012008	Ashi bushoo Shambatoyich Doonone" iye.
40012009	Yesuusi aroochee beshaqqi Ayihudeena'o kicee beeti kexooch giyiye.
40012010	Aroochoo bi kishoo qomati uro beehe. Arooch beetina'o Yesuusin taggoyich qaawiqqi, "Shambatooba biiyaton wodiyoon Muusichi calloo daaggita?" iqqi biin echaheete.
40012011	Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Ittoshi daggoochee bagachi asho, ara bi bago Shambatooba opooch bi dihi gaata, opoochee geechi kichaacheha?
40012012	Illa asho bagoyee beshaacha? Ebich Muusichi calloo Shambatooba de'a shuunoon daaggiye" iye.
40012013	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi kishoo qomati uroon "Ne kishoon yaggibe!" iye. Biyoo yaggiye; bekkach ara qomati kishoo oha kishoochoomon shaahiqqi iiwoo tunahe.
40012014	Ebich arooch beeti Fariseena'o kechiqqi, "Hini Yesuusin aabichiree wuxibona?" iqqi echeeheete.
40012015	Yesuusi boonoshi shalligoon ariiqqi aroochee bara xaa'ooch tiyii hammiye. Dofee asheena'o biin dabbiqqi hammiyeete; biiyachina'o bullinoo wodiihe.
40012016	"Bareena'oyich taachon gettaahotine!" iqqi boonoshich gettiye.
40012017	Arooba Yeeri keemachi Isiyaasichi noonoona ishichiqqi bi gettito ceenniye;
40012018	" 'Ebiyoche! Taach bi wocheeyemmoyich ta kaaccati ta bushoo, ta shunnaa beeto, taanoo emirikkito hinine! Ta Ayaanoon bi toommooch kotiiyemmo taane; ta shunnaa beeti tata mooyon aagateena'oyich gettemmone.
40012019	Gajiteyaachemmone; oohee cookaachemmone; keeja kaattoochaa bi qaaroon kichi yibbaatataachemmone;
40012020	asheena'o kopheeti shombaqoon boonoshi tiichi qayoomon giidaalleena'oyich bi maaco manjaachemmone. Asheena'o taha bedditi gipoon boonoshi takkee qayoomon degaalleena'ochi toommooch bi giidoon bekkiyaachemmone. Ebin bi tuniiyemmo, Yeeri shunniti tata mooyon bi ceechimmi wottooniye.
40012021	Aagateena'o biin gibanemmina'one' iqqi Yeeri gettitone" iye.
40012022	Ebiyee gub, yinno bi toommooch beeti aaf dooga, noona miima uroon Yesuus waan deebiyeete. Yesuusi ara uroon wodiihe; uroo ciinonaa yibbaatoonon hakkiye.
40012023	Ebich asheena'o bulli woriganaqqi, "Hini uro Daawitichi bushoo tuneha?" iyeete.
40012024	Tunatee Fariseena'o ishin waayaqqi, "Hini beelzebuli gettee beeti yinnee taatoochi giidoonalli baroona yinnoon ashi toommoochee yoohache" iyeete.
40012025	Tunatee Yesuusi boonoshi gaboon ariiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ikka taatee shawooch beeti asheena'o boonoshinaa boonoshina kaaraqqi shaca gaata, ara taatittine aallemmine. Wotta ikka katamooch oohee ikka kexooch beeti asheena'o boonoshinaa boonoshina kaaraqqi shaca gaata, ara katamoo oohee ara kexo neexataachemmone.
40012026	sheexaanoo yinnoon asheena'ochi toommoochee yookkii beeto bi tuna gaata, biinnaa biinna shacate getone. Illa bi taatittine aabichiree neexehane?
40012027	Tawoo beelzebulichi giidoona yinnoon asheena'ochi toommoochee yookkaa beeto ta tuna gaata, ittoshi bushiisheena'o konichi giidoonaniye boonoshi yookkii beeto? Ebich ittoshi bushiisheena'o ittoshi toommooch nallemmina'one.
40012028	Tunaballi ta Yeerichi Ayaanee giidoona yinnoon yookkaa beeto ta tuna gaata, illa Yeerichi taatittine ittoshi waan shaggatine.
40012029	"Wotta ikka uro shiichiqqi giidachi uroon yechii cuyaanoon bi kexooch giyiqqi bi gijoo bullin daamon aabichiree hakkehe? Kechi Doonon yechii bi cuchitoyee gub, bi gijoo bullin daamon hakkemmone.
40012030	Taanna tookkii neexataano taan shixxii beetone; taanna tookkiinoo kicaano shaccii beetone.
40012031	Ebich ittoshich gettoye; Yeeri asheena'o shuunaa beeti axaaxoonaa boonoshi naagaa beeti naagoonon maaremmone; tunaballi Yaafa Ayaanoon naaggii beeton maaraachemmone.
40012032	Ashi bushoo ta toommooch gondoon yibbaataa beeton Yeeri maaremmone; tunaballi Yaafa Ayaanoochi toommooch gondoon yibbaataa beeto bullin hini yemeenooch tunatee, woyemmi yemeenooch Yeeri maaraachemmone" iye.
40012033	Daakkiqqi Yesuusi ishichiye:- "Gonda mixo ittoshich bi bee gaata, gonda aafoon danemmo ittoshine; de'a mixo ittoshich bi bee gaata, wotta de'a aafoon danemmo ittoshine. Ebich mixon bi aafoona ariiyemmo ittoshine.
40012034	Hini xekaree bushiisheena'ote! Ittoshi gondo tunaachi tiyi aabichiree de'a yibbaatoon yibbaato hakkehotine? Asho bi gettii beeto bi mullooch ceenniti mooyoocheenniye.
40012035	De'a asho bi mullooch bi kotiiti de'a mooyoochee de'oon kichiye. Gonda asho bi mullooch bi kotiiti gonda mooyoochee gondoon kichiye.
40012036	Ta ittoshich gettoye; asheena'o yibbaataa beeti duuba mooyo bullich nallaa gallooba Yeerich wochemmina'one.
40012037	Ne noonoochee kechiti de'a mooyona Yeeri neech de'oon nallemmone; oohee ne noonoochee kechiti gonda mooyona Yeeri neech gondoon nallemmone" iye.
40012038	Arooba Muusichi callee dojachina'onaa Fariseena'onochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o tiyiqqi Yesuusin "Dojachocho! mallatoon ne waanee beegga qaawii beeto noone" iyeete.
40012039	Tunatee bi wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Hini yemeenooch beeti asheena'o gondeena'onaa Yeer waanee kechiqqi baroyich goyinnaa beetina'ona mallatoon beegoyich qaawii beetina'one; tunatee Yeeri keemachi Yoonaasichi toommooch bi bekkiiti mallatoyee bara mallatoon boonoshich bekkiyaachemmone.
40012040	Yoonaasi ooga haashee maacooch aabaa xuma keeja qemon bi kotatoomon, ebiyoomon ashi bushoo ta shawee maacooch aabaa xuma keeja qemon kotemmo taane.
40012041	Nallaa gallooba Nanawi Katameexi asheena'o neexaree hini yemeeneexi asheena'on taggemmina'one; Ebiyoo Yoonaasi Yeerichi wochoon bi gettee waayaqqi axaaxee gommoochee Yeer waan boonoshi wottatoyichiye. Andoo Yoonaasiyee besho hiniich beetone.
40012042	Aabi kechaa qanna badee waati taatee nallaa gallooba neexaree hini yemeeneexi asheena'on taggemmine; Ebiyoo Solomooni gettemmi de'a mooyon waayoyich shawee tuggoochee bi waatoyichiye. Andoo Solomooniyee besho hiniich beetone" iye.
40012043	Yesuusi aroochee daakkiqqi ishichiye:- "Yinno ashi toommoochee bi tiyitoyee gub, bi kashemmi xaa'oon qaawiibee aachaalli shawoona guuddiye; tunaballi danataanoon muccahe.
40012044	Ebich 'Ta kechati kexooch wottaree hami gibana' iqqi wottaa bi waahee, ara bi kechiti kexo qechoo tunaa hidee qanniqqi beeton danahe.
40012045	Aroyee gub, hammiqqi biyee gonda shabaatta bara yinneena'on kicii dabbii deebiye; boonoshiyoo biinna tookkii arooch giyiqqi kotaheete; ara uroyich aafichoyee andi beemo beshoon gondahe. Hini yemeenee gonda shiijaroyich wotta ebiyoomon tunemmone" iye.
40012046	Ebiye gub, Yesuusi dofee asheena'oyich getooch bi beetee, bi indeenaa bi maneena'ona biinna daniya qaawiqqi maaxooch neexaheete.
40012047	[Asheena'ochi daggoochee ikkoo tiyiqqi, "Ne indeenaa ne maneena'ona neenna daniya qaawiqqi maaxooch neexaa beeteete" iye.]
40012048	Tunatee Yesuusi biich gettiti uroyich wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Ta indee aabine? Ta maneena'ochi wotta aaboshine?" iye.
40012049	Bi kishoona bi dabbeena'on kochii bekkiibee, "Ta indeenaa ta maneena'ona eboshine!
40012050	Shimaayooch beeti ta nihoochi daaggoon ceechi beetina'o bulli taach manoo, maneenaa indeenaniye" iye.
40013001	Arooba Yesuusi kexoochee kechii hammiqqi baharee gashooch kotahe.
40013002	Biyoo dofee asheena'o bi waan kiceetoyich, baharee toommooch beeti marikabooch kechiqqi kotahe. Asheena'o bulli baharee gashooch beeti shawooch neexaheete.
40013003	Asheena'oyich meeti mooyon shaahiyoona gettiye. gettiibeenoo ishichiye:- "Ellabote! Yaree shookkacho bi yaroon shookka kechiye.
40013004	Shookkii bi beetee, ikkikkoo gomi gashooch holliye. Aroon kafeena'o waa macii maaheete.
40013005	Baroo maacaa xaqqachi shawooch holliye. Shawoo giishatoyich kaataa collahe;
40013006	Tunatee aabe michiyona shoolliye; cammon awuro bi qajitoyich, shuuqqiye.
40013007	Baroo wotta angichi xupo beetooch holliye; ara angichi xupoo naaxii (nocii) kechiqqi maahe.
40013008	Baroo wotta qeemi shawooch holliqqi collahe; dccii kechiqqinoo aafahe; ikkoo balla aafoon, ikkoo shicha aafoon, ikkoo shaasha aafoon aafahe.
40013009	Waayaa beeti waajacho waayabe" iye.
40013010	Ebiye gub, bi dabbeena'o Yesuus waan giddaqqi, "Amoyichiye asheena'oyich shaahiyoona ne gettaa beeto?" iqqi echaheete.
40013011	Yesuusi wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Yeeri shimaaji taatittineech maacee mooyon ittoshich arichiitone; tunatee bareena'oyich arichiyaanoone.
40013012	Beetoyich daakkemmone; biichoo woddiiyemmone. Tunatee amolla aallo waanee biich beeti giishacheenolla tiijemmone.
40013013	Ebich ciinniibee beego boonoshi qajitoyich, waayaabee ello boonoshi qajitoyich, shalligoonoo boonoshi qajitoyich shaahiyoona boonoshich arichiihoye.
40013014	Isiyaasi ishichitone; 'Hini asheena'o waayoon waayaa beeteete; shalligaacheete. ciinon ciinnii beeteete; beegaacheete.
40013015	Boonoshi aafoona boonoshi ciinaachemmoyich, boonoshi waamona boonoshi waayataachemmoyich, boonoshi mulloona boonoshi shalligaachemmoyich, ta waan boonoshi wottatee boonoshin ta wodiyaachemmoyich, boonoshi mulloon muumiitina'one; boonoshi waamon ulliitina'one; boonoshi aafoonoo opatina'one' iqqi bi keemmiti keemo boonoshi toommooch ceennitone.
40013016	"Tunatee ittoshi aafo ciinnii bi beetoyich, ittoshi waamoo waayaa bi beetoyich, diireeto ittoshine.
40013017	Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; meeti keemachina'onaa cadiqeena'ona ittoshi beeggii beeton beegga qaatitina'one; tunaballi beegaaneena'one; ittoshi waayaa beeton waayiya qaatitina'one; tunaballi waayataaneena'one" iye.
40013018	Yesuusi daakkiqqi bi dabbeena'oyich ishichiye:- "Yaree shookkachochi shaahiyoo amo gaata waayabote!
40013019	Yeerichi taatittinee qaaroon waayaqqi shalligaano bullichi toommooch gondoochi nihoo woyemmone; boonoshi mullooch shookkati qaaroon maciree daamemmone; eboshi gomi gashooch holliti yaroomina'one.
40013020	Wotta maacaa xaqqo beeti shawooch holliti yaroon shaahii beetina'o, Yeerichi qaaroon waayaqqi bekkach emiroona deqqi beetina'one.
40013021	Tunatee baadalli cammon yeshaaneena'one; Yeerichi qaaree naboona iritoo oohee du'o waahooba bekkach giinnii dihachina'one.
40013022	Ebiyoomon angichi xupo beeti shawooch holliti yaroon shaahii beetina'o, Yeerichi qaaroon boonoshi waayatee, hini shaweexi beemon gaboonaa gijee shaawona dacheyoona boonoshi mullooch naaxiqqi boonoshi waayati qaaroon maa beetone; ebichi naboona aafataanoon dobbaree echemmina'one.
40013023	Qeemi shawooch holliti yaroon shaahii beetina'o, Yeerichi qaaroon waayaqqi shalligii beetina'one. Boonoshiyoo aafoon aafemmina'one; ikkoo balla aafoon, ikkoo shicha aafoon, ikkoo shaasha aafoon aafemmone" iye.
40013024	Yesuusi bara shaahiyoon ishichiqqi boonoshich gettiye:- "Shimaaji taatittine ebiyoomine; ikka uro bi goyooch de'a yaroon shookkiye.
40013025	Tunaballi asho bulli tokkataachee, uroochi kaaracho waaqqi tepphee daggooch dadaddoon shookkichii hammiye.
40013026	Teepphoo collaa dccikkii bi aafahee, dadaddoo wotta bekkahe.
40013027	"Goyee Doonochi shuunachina'o waaqqi, 'Doonocho! De'a yaroon shoohaano neena? Dadaddochi amoochee waahe?' iqqi echaheete.
40013028	"Biyoo wochiqqi, 'Ta kaarachone shookkito' iye. "Bi shuunachina'o 'And hamiree waaxi no bayon qaawii beetine?' iyeete.
40013029	"Tunatee teepphee Doono wochiqqi, 'Dadaddoon waaxii ittoshi beetee teepphoo tookki waaxemmone; qayote!
40013030	Dadaddoo teepphoona tookki kashe; qecci goorooba qeccachina'on "Dadaddoon shiichiree macibote! Qiriree qaaqqoona michibote! Teepphoon wotta ta gotooch gedote!" gettemmo taane' iqqi gettiye" iye.
40013031	Wotta Yesuusi bara shaahiyoon boonoshich gettiye:- "Shimaaji taatittine ebiyoomine; asho bi goyooch shanaafee aafoon shookkiye.
40013032	Hini shanaafee aafe bara maayi yaroo bulliyee giishacheene; tunaballi shookkeeqqa collaa bi diccahooba daaddeexi maayeena'oyee besheene. Shimaayoona yoobbii beeti kafeena'o waaqqi bi atooch kotoon boonoshi hakkimmi wottoon ooga mixo tunemmine" iye.
40013033	Yesuusi daakkiqqi bara shaahiyoon gettiye; ishichiye:- "Shimaaji taatittine ikka ure bukoo tiyimmi wottoon daammaqqa keeja qunnee buddinoona tookkii xiriqqaqqa bi kotiiti bukee shittoomine" iye.
40013034	Yesuusi dofee asheena'oyich ebi bullin shaahiyoona gettiye; mooyon shaahiyaalloon getaanoone.
40013035	Ebi bi tunati nabo "Shaahiyoona gettemmo taane; Yeeri shawoonaa shimaayoonon bi hallitoochee tiijiqqi aacheeti mooyon gaxxemmo taane" iqqi keemacho gettito bi ceenemmoyichiye" iye.
40013036	Arooba Yesuusi asheena'on qajiqqi kexooch giyiye. Bi dabbeena'o bi waan giddaqqi, "Budeexi dadaddee shaahiyoon kaachiree nooch gete!" iyeete.
40013037	Biyoo wochiqqi ishichiye:- "De'a yaroon shookkato ashi bushoo taane;
40013038	budoo hini shawee toommooch beeti asheena'one. De'a yaroo Yeerichi taatittinee bushiisheena'one; dadaddoo gondoochi nihoo bushiisheena'one.
40013039	Shixacho tunaqqi dadaddoon shookkito Daabiloosine; qeco yemeenee ciiroone; qeccachina'oo Yeerichi maraakeena'one.
40013040	"Illa dadaddo macee qaaqqoona bi micoomon, yemeenee ciirooba ebiyoomon tunemmone.
40013041	Ashi bushoo ta, ta maraakeena'on deejemmo taane; asheena'oyich xugo tunaa beetina'onaa hukkoon shuunaa beetina'o bullinon ta taatittinee daggoochee macemmina'one;
40013042	qaaqqee sheellooch dupemmina'one; aroochaa eefonaa gashee qaayona tunemmone.
40013043	Arooba cadiqeena'o boonoshi nihoo Yeerichi taatittineecha aabeechoomon aaxxemmina'one. Illa waayaa beeti waajacho waayabe" iye.
40013044	"Wotta shimaaji taatittine ebiyoomine; ikka uro goyee daggooch aacheeti aaxxi qiicoon danahe. Danaqqi arooch wochii aachiye. Emiroona qitiibee hammii biich beeto bullin kemmiqqi ara goyoon kemahe.
40013045	"Wotta shimaaji taatittine ebiyoomine; ikka giixacho macacikkiti inqoon kemiya iqqi qaawiye.
40013046	Aaxxi gatiyoo kichii beeti ikka inqoon bi danahooba hammiqqi biich beeto bullin kemmiqqi hini ara inqoon kemahe" iye.
40013047	"Wotta shimaaji taatittine ebiyoomine; haasha yesheena'o boonoshi dabboon baharooch dufee, dabboo haashee yaroo bulliichee yechiye.
40013048	Haashoo dabbooch ceenniyona, boonoshiyoo aacoochee geechii kichiyeete; shawooch kotaqqi de'i de'oon guubooch macii kiciyeete; gondi gondoon kichiqqi dupiyeete.
40013049	Yemeenee ciirooba ebiyoomon tunemmone; Yeerichi maraakeena'o waaree cadiqeena'ochi daggoochee gondeena'on qephi kichemmina'one;
40013050	qaaqqee sheellooch dupemmina'one; aroochaa eefonaa gashee qaayona tunemmone" iye.
40013051	Yesuusi bi dabbeena'on "Ebi bulli ittoshi mullooch giyita?" iqqi echahe. Boonoshiyoo "Eeha" iyeete.
40013052	Biyoo "Illa shimaaji taatittineecha ta dabboo tunati callee dojacho bulli, bi kiciti qiicoochee andra mooyonaa geena mooyonon kichii beeti doonoomone" iye.
40013053	Yesuusi hini shaahiyeena'on gettii bi ciichitoyee gub aroochee tiyiqqi hammiye.
40013054	Bi dicciti shawooch waaqqi asheena'o woriganammi wottoon Ayihudeena'o kicee beeti kexoochaa asheena'oyich dojiye. Boonoshiyoo ishichiyeete:- "Hini uro ebi ariyoonaa gaakkachi shuunee shuunoonon amoochee danahe?
40013055	Hini uro shaaqqee hachachochi bushoo toona? Bi indee Maariyami tooneena? Bi maneena'o Yaaqoobi, Yoosayi, Simooninaa Yihudina tooneena'ona?
40013056	Bi maacha maneena'o bulli noonna tookkii beetina'o tooneeta? Ishi gaata, eboshi bullin amoochee danahe?" iyeete.
40013057	Hini mooyo boonoshich xugo tunahe. Tunaballi Yesuusi "Keemachon bi shiijee shaweexi asheena'onaa bi kechi asheena'onoyee beshatee bareena'o oogiyaanoon qayaacheete" iye.
40013058	Boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iyoo boonoshi qajitoyich, arooch gaakkachi mooyon shuunataanoone.
40014001	Aroobee yemeenooba Galiilee shawee iraashoo Heroodisi Yesuusichi mooyon waayahe.
40014002	Bi mikkirachina'oyich "Hini Aacona Afaallachi Yowannisine. Hinoomi gaakkachi mooyon tuniyoo bi hakkito, qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee kechiqqiniye" iye.
40014003	Heroodisi bi ishichiti naboo ebine; Heroodisi bi manoo Filipphoosich mechee Heroodiyaadin bi shaaggitoyich, Yowannisi tiyiqqi biich 'Ne manoochi mecheen shaage!' iqqi Muusichi calloo daaggaanoone" iye. Heroodisi urechi naboyich "Yowannisin yeshi cuyote!" iqqi bi ginee naayina'oochee wochahe. Boonoshiyoo hammiqqi yechii cuyee kexooch cuchiyeete.
40014005	Heroodisi wuxxiyoyich qaawii beehe; tunatee asheena'o keemachon shaahiiqqi biin boonoshi ciinnii beetoyich boonoshich shattiye.
40014006	Tunaballi ebiyee gub, Heroodisichi shiijee aabee baarooba Heroodiyaadichi bushee iibbeena'ochi aafooch giyaa duubbaqqa Heroodisin emirikkiyan.
40014007	Ebich bushech "Ne qollammo bullin imbana" iqqi wogaqqi gibanikkiye.
40014008	Busheyoo bi indeena koceeqqa, "Aacona Afaallachi Yowannisichi qettoon and kuxxiiree bi qelloon gafatoona taach imbe!" iyan.
40014009	Arooba taatoo ayiniye; tunatee bi wogati wogoonaa biinna tookkii kotati iibbeena'onoyicha iqqi bushech bi heciyoon shaddoo shunnaanoone. Bekkach bi ginachina'oochee ikkoon ceeggiqqi, "Cuyee kexooch hamiree Yowannisichi qettoon kuxi bi qelloon deebiree bushech imbe!" iqqi wochahe.
40014010	Hini ara uro hammiqqi cuyee kexooch beeti Yowannisichi qettoon kuxxii,
40014011	Bi qelloon gafatoona deebii bushech immiye. Bushee daammaa bi indech immahan.
40014012	Yowannisichi dabbeena'o hammii bi dubanoon kichiqqi daammii duukkiyeete; aroochee waaqqi Yesuusich gettiyeete.
40014013	Heroodisi Yowannisin bi wuxiyoon Yesuusi waayaqqi aroochee tiyii marikaboona ashaalli xaa'ooch hammiye. Dofee asheena'o ebin waayaqqi katamoo bulliichee baatoona biin dabbiyeete.
40014014	Yesuusi marikaboochee kindiibee dofee asheena'on beeggiqqi bi maacoona ayiniye. Boonoshi daggooch beeti biiyachina'on wodiihe.
40014015	Aroochee shawoo beshaa womikkoo wottatee, Yesuusichi dabbeena'o bi waan giddaqqi, "No beeto gafoo aalli xaa'oone; andoo shawoo xumatone. Ebich hini dofee asheena'on diggiiree daachiibe! Gafoo beetooch hamiree maayoon boonoshi qellich kemabeete" iyeete.
40014016	Tunatee Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Hammaayeete; ittoshi maanjibote!" iye.
40014017	Bi dabbeena'oo "Hiniich nooch beeto uucha xekee koshonaa gutta haashoona baachiye" iyeete.
40014018	Biyoo "Eke aroon taach deebote!" iye.
40014019	Asheena'o bullin "Mocee toommooch kotabote!" iye. Uucha xekee koshonaa gutta haashoonon tiijii yechiqqi, shimaaj ciinniichii Yeerin gallatahe. Koshon tiichiqqi bi dabbeena'oyich immiye. Boonoshiyoo daammiqqi asheena'oyich qoomaheete.
40014020	Bulliyoo maaqqi michiyeete. Echati kochi ooyoon bi dabbeena'o aaraa gutta ogooga mokoona ceechiqqi tiijiyeete.
40014021	Maacheena'onaa bushiisheena'ona haddiyaanoon koshon maatina'oochee anaamina'o baach uucha hum bedeena'one.
40014022	Yesuusi bi dabbeena'oyich ishichiye:- "Asheena'on ta deennammi wottoon marikabooch giyiree bekkach tayee shiichiree kimbote!" iqqi gettiye.
40014023	Asheena'o bullin bi deennitoyee gub, corootiya bi ikketo gepooch kechiye. Bi ikketo arooch bi beetee, shawoo xumahe.
40014024	Arooba marikabo aroochee wokkiye; giidachi yongo marikaboyee aafaa tiyee, ara marikaboon aachi aayo tapahe.
40014025	Qaabba baakkee kuuhooch Yesuusi baharee aachi toommona sha'aabee boonoshi waan waahe.
40014026	Bi dabbeena'o baharee aachi toommona bi womon beeggiqqi, "Yoogoone" iqqi keqqoona shataa cookiyeete.
40014027	Bekkach Yesuusi boonoshich "Kupphabote! Taane; shattaahotine!" iye.
40014028	Arooba Pheexiroosi tiyiqqi, "Ta Doonocho! Ne gaata, aachi toommona sha'aree ne waan ta woyemmoyich gete!" iye.
40014029	Yesuusiyoo "Wobe!" iye. Pheexiroosi marikaboochee kindiqqi aachi toommona sha'aabee Yesuus waan hammiye.
40014030	Tunaballi giidachi yongoon beeggiqqi shattiye; aaco biin qooxxiyona, "Ta Doonocho! Taan wodiibe!" iqqi cookiye.
40014031	Bekkach Yesuusi bi kishoon yaggii yechiqqi tiyii, "Hini ne mulloon ta toommooch too'iyaanoocho! Ne mulloon amoyich guttiine?" iye.
40014032	Gutteena'oo marikabee toommooch boonoshi kechiyona yongo qajiye.
40014033	Marikabee toommooch beetina'o "Ibaroon Yeerichi Bushoo neene" iqqi Yesuusich yittii goyinnaheete.
40014034	Yesuusinaa bi dabbeena'ona baharoon kimmiqqi Genshaareexee Shawooch shaggiyeete.
40014035	Ara shawooch beetina'o Yesuusin ariiqqi aree guudooch beeti shawooch wochiiqqi biiyachina'on Yesuus waan deebiyeete;
40014036	Biiyachina'o Yesuusin "Ne qoraddee caapoonolla yeshone" iqqi qollaa beeheete. Yechitina'o bulli wodiyeete.
40015001	Arooba ikkikka Fariseena'onaa Muusichi callee dojachina'ona Yerusalemee waa Yesuus waan giddaqqi,
40015002	"Ne dabbeena'o no qaabbachina'ochi doyoon amoyichiye boonoshi shaaddaa beeto? Maayoon mamoyich boonoshi giddaa bee gaata, no doyoochoomon boonoshi kishoon machataacheete" iqqi echaheete.
40015003	Yesuusi wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Ittoshiyochi ittoshi doyoocha iqqi amoyichiye Yeerichi calloon ittoshi shaaddaa beeto?
40015004	Yeeri 'Ne indeenaa ne nihoonon oogiibe!' wotta 'Bi indeen oohee bi nihoon naaggiyoo qitibe' itone.
40015005	Tunatee ittoshi 'Ikka uro bi nihoon oohee bi indeen "Ittoshich ta immemmon Yeerich kichito taane; Yeerich yaafeetone" ii beeto bulli,
40015006	bi nihoonaa bi indeenon dego qaawiyaache' ii beeto ittoshine. Ittoshi doyoocha iqqi Yeerichi qaaroon biichito ittoshine.
40015007	Hini ittoshi maacoon xalloo shaahii beetina'ote! Isiyaasi ittoshichon ishichitone; 'Hini asheena'o boonoshi noonoona taan oogii beetina'one; tunatee boonoshi mullo ta waanee oogaton wohone; ashi doyoon Yeerichi qaaro tuniiqqi dojiibee, duuboon taach goyinnaheete' iqqi ibarooniye bi keemito" iye.
40015010	Aroochee wotta Yesuusi dofee asheena'on bi waan ceeggiqqi, "Ta getee waayabote! Shalligibote!
40015011	Ashoon ee'ii beeto kookkoona giyii beeti maayo toonoone; tunatee ashoon ee'ii beeto ashi noonoochee kechii beeti mooyone" iye.
40015012	Arooba bi dabbeena'o Yesuus waan giddaqqi, "Fariseena'oyich hini boonoshi waayati qaaro xugo bi tunoon ariitine?" iyeete.
40015013	Tunatee bi wochiqqi, "Shimaaji ta nihoo Yeeri bechaano bulli waaxemmone.
40015014	Boonoshin qayote! Aaf doogoon yaabii beeti aaf doogeena'one; aaf doogo aaf doogoon bi yaabi gaata, gutteena'o yesharee opooch dihemmina'one" iye.
40015015	Pheexiroosi tiyiqqi, "Ashoon ee'ii beeti mooyoyich ne gettati shaahiyoon kaachiree nooch gete!" iye.
40015016	Ebich Yesuusi bi dabbeena'oyich ishichiye:- "Andoo ittoshi mullooch giyaacha? Shalligaachotina?
40015017	Kookkoona giyii beeto bulli maacooch giyiqqi maach keyon ariyaachotina?
40015018	Tunatee noonoochee kechii beeto, mulloocheenniye bi kechii beeto; ashoon ee'ii beeto aroone.
40015019	mulloochee kechii beetina'o, gonda shalligoo, wuxoo, shunee mamo, yahoo, gaayo, kootee miixo, naago eboshine.
40015020	Ashoon ee'ii beeto ebiyalli, Ayihudeena'ochi doyoomona kishoon machataanoon mamo toonoone" iye.
40015021	Yesuusi aroochee tiyiqqi Xiroosinaa Sidooninochi katamee ga'ooch beeti shawooch hammiye.
40015022	Bekkach ara shawooch beeti Kanaanee Shawee ure waaqqa, "Ta Doonocho! Daawitichi bushoocho! taach ariqqabe! Ta busheen giidachi maach biiyo yechitone" iqqa cookiibee qollahan.
40015023	Tunatee Yesuusi amoonolla getaanoone. Bi dabbeena'o bi waan giddaqqi, "Hini ure cookiibee noon dabbii beetine; daachiibe! Hamboye" iqqi qollaheete.
40015024	Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi, "Bago aalloomon aallati Isra'eeleena'o ikketoyichiye Yeeri taan wochaa bi deejito" iye.
40015025	Tunatee ure waaqqa, "Ta Doonocho! taan gaachabe!" iibee goyinnahan.
40015026	Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Bushiisheena'ochi maayoon tiijiqqi kunaaneena'oyich dufo tato toonoone" iye.
40015027	Ure wochiqqa, "Ishi ibaroone ta Doonocho! Tunaballi kunaaneena'olla boonoshi doonochi madoochee oojiti ooyoon macikkii maa beetina'one" iyan.
40015028	Arooba Yesuusi ureyich wochiqqi, "Hini ureene! Ne mulloon ta toommooch ne too'iyoo oogati mooyone. Ebich ne qaawitoomon neech tunabe" iye. Arooba bi bushee bekkach wodiyan.
40015029	Yesuusi aroochee tiyiqqi Galiilee baharee gashooch hammiye. Arooch beeti gepoochoo kechiqqi kotahe.
40015030	Dofee asheena'o baata yesheena'on, dureena'on, aaf doogeena'on, noona miimeena'on, meeti biiyachi bareena'onoo bi waan deebiyeete; Yesuusichi baatooch kotiiheete; biyoo boonoshin wodiihe.
40015031	Ebich dofee asheena'o noona miimeena'o yibbaatatee, dureena'o wodee, baata yesheena'o sha'atee, aaf doogeena'o ciinee beeggiqqi woriganaheete; Isra'eelichi Nuggushoo Yeerin gallataheete.
40015032	Ebiye gub Yesuusi bi dabbeena'on bi waan ceeggiqqi, "Hini asheena'o taanna tookkii boonoshi kotato, hanaach keeja qemone. Boonoshi shoho ciiratoyich, taan oogichiqqi ayinikkiye. Gommoochaa maraataree boonoshi dihaachemmoyich, abata kashoona boonoshin daachiyoon shunnaache" iye.
40015033	Bi dabbeena'o wochiqqi, "Hini shaaha asheena'on michiiyemmi koshon hini gafoo aalli xaa'oochee amoochee danehone?" iyeete.
40015034	Yesuusi "Ambicha kosho ittoshich beete?" iqqi echahe. Boonoshi wochiqqi, "Shabaatta xekee koshonaa giishacha haashoona beete" iyeete.
40015035	Aree hillooch Yesuusi asheena'on "Kotabote!" iye.
40015036	Shabaatta xekee koshoonaa haashoonon yechiqqi Yeerin gallatahe. Tiichiqqi bi dabbeena'oyich immiye. Bi dabbeena'oo asheena'oyich giddiiqqi qoomaheete.
40015037	Asheena'o bulliyoo maaqqi michiyeete. Aroyee gub bi dabbeena'o echati ooyoon shabaatta mokkee ceenon tiijiyeete.
40015038	Arooba maati anaamina'o baach maacheena'onaa bushiisheena'ona giyaanoon awudda humeena'one.
40015039	Yesuusi asheena'o bullin diggiiqqi deennii bi daachiitoyee gub, marikaboona Magidalee Shawooch hammiye.
40016001	Ebiyee gub, Fariseena'onaa Saduuqeena'onoochee ikkikkeena'o Yesuusin muriciiya iqqi bi waan giddaqqi, "Eke shimaayoochee mallatoon nooch bekkiibe!" iqqi echaheete.
40016002	Tunatee Yesuusi wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Xum woyimikka 'Shimaayoo ceellatone; amiyo dihaachemmone' iyotine;
40016003	haree maaddoona 'Shimaayoo ceellaa qubatone; hanaach amiyo dihemmone' iyotine. shimaayoon ciinniqqi tunemmi mooyon ariyoon hakkiyotine; tunaballi yemeenee mallatoon beeggiqqi tunemmi mooyon ariyoon hakkaachotina?
40016004	Hini yemeeneexi asheena'o gondeena'onaa Yeer waanee kechiqqi baroyich goyinnaa beetina'ona mallatoon beegoyich qaawii beetina'one; tunatee Yeeri keemachi Yoonaasichi toommooch bi bekkiiti mallatoyee bara mallatoon bekkiyaachemmone" iye. Ishichii bi itoyee gub arooch boonoshin dupiichii bara xaa'ooch hammiye.
40016005	Yesuusichi dabbeena'o baharoyee beqach boonoshi kimmiyooba shohoon yeshaanoon battaheete.
40016006	Yesuusi boonoshin "Fariseena'onaa Saduuqeena'onochi bukee shittoochee ittoshi qelloon quyabote!" iye.
40016007	Aroochee boonoshinaa boonoshina "Koshon yeshaano no qajatoyich shaahiye bi gettii beeto" iqqi yibbaataheete.
40016008	Yesuusi boonoshi gaboon ariiqqi ishichiye:- "Hini ittoshi mulloon ta toommooch too'iyaaneena'ote! 'Kosho nooch aallatoyich shaahiye' iqqi amoyichiye ittoshi yibbaataa beeto?
40016009	And beddaahee ittoshi mullooch giyaacha? Uucha xekee koshon uucha huma ashich tiichaa ta qoodiyooba, echati kochi ooyoon ambicha mokkoon ittoshi tiijito gaata shalligaachotina?
40016010	Wotta shabaatta xekee koshon awudda humeena'oyich tiichaa ta qoodiyooba, echati kochi ooyoon ambicha mokkoon ittoshi tiijito gaata shalligaachotina?
40016011	'Fariseena'onaa Saduuqeena'onochi bukee shittoochee ittoshi qelloon quyabote!' iqqa ta gettato kochichon toonoone. Ebin aabichiqqi shalligaachotine?" iye.
40016012	Arooba Yesuusi gettito, Fariseena'onaa Saduuqeena'ona dojii beeti mooyonalli, "Kochi bukee shittoochee ittoshi qelloon quyabote!" iqqi bi getti qayo bat boonoshi mullooch giyiye.
40016013	Yesuusi Filipphoosi Qeshaari Kataamee ga'ooch beeti shawooch shaggiqqi tiyii bi dabbeena'on "Asheena'o ashi bushoo taan konine ii beeteete?" iqqi echahe.
40016014	Boonoshiyoo "Ikkikkeena'o 'Hini Aacona Afaallachi Yowannisine', echeena'o 'Eliyaasine', echeena'o wotta 'Erimiyaasine oohee wonna Yeerichi qaaroon keemmii beetina'oochee ikkoone' ii beetina'one" iyeete.
40016015	Biyoo "Ittshoyoochi taan konine ii beetotine?" iye.
40016016	Simoon Pheexiroosi tiyiqqi, "Ne Kiristoosi, beeyachi Yeerichi Bushoo neene" iye.
