40016017	Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Yoonichi bushoo Simoono! Ebin neech bekkiito shimaayooch beeti ta nihoalli asho toonoone; ebichi diireeto neene.
40016018	Tawoo neech gettoye; ne shigo Pheexiroosine; hini xaqqee toommooch ta dabbeena'ochi ikkittinoon neechemmo taane; qitee giidolla bi tunatee, hini ikkittioon niriyoon hakkaachemmone.
40016019	shimaaji taatittinee kellee qulifoon neech immemmo taane; shawoochaa ne cuchati mooyo bulli shimaayoochaa cucheeto tunemmone; shawoochaa ne biichati mooyo bulli shimaayoochaa biicheeto tunemmone" iye.
40016020	Arooba bi dabbeena'oyich "Ta Kiristoosi ta tunoon konicholla gettaahotine!" iqqi gettiye.
40016021	Aroobee aabooba Yesuusi bi dabbeena'oyich ishichiqqi getooch giyiye; "Yerusalem hamo taach qaawiihe; aroochaa shawee geeneena'o, qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa Muusichi callee dojachina'onochi kishoochee wodda xuuxoon beeggemmo taane; taan wuxiiyemmina'one. Tunaballi keeja qemooba qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee Yeeri taan kichemmone" iye.
40016022	Aarooba Pheexiroosi Yesuusin ikka bad wochiqqi, "Yeeri ebin ne waanee wokkiibe; cir ebin Yeeri ne toommooch bechaaye" iqqi noggaa kaarahe.
40016023	Tunatee bekkach Yesuusi guuddii wottaqqi Pheexiroosin "Hini sheexaanoocho! Ta waanee wohe! Taach xugo tunato neene. Ashichonalli, Yeerichon gabaachine" iqqi gettiye.
40016024	Arooba wotta Yesuusi daakkiqqi bi dabbeena'oyich ishichiye:- "Bi kasheen qitoochee wodiyoyich shunnii beeto bulli muccemmone; tunaballi taacha iqqi bi kasheen mucammo bulli danemmone. Taan dabboon shunniyo koniyolla bi tuna gaata, bi qelloon nookkabe; aree hillooch ta yooddeeyemmi masqaloon ta shaaggemmoomon, bi yooddeeyemmi masqaloon shaagiree taan dabbibe.
40016026	Wotta 'Asho taane' ito, shawee toommooch beeto bullin biicho tuniichii bi kasheen bi mucca gaata, amoon biich hallehe? Asho bi kasheen wochiqqi danoyich amoon qoco hakkehe?
40016027	Ashi bushoo ta, ta nihoochi oogee yiiroona bi maraakeena'ona tookki katinoon woyemmo taane; arooba bullich bi shuuni shuunoomon immemmo taane.
40016028	Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; hiniich neexaa beetina'oochee ikkikkeena'o ashi bushoo ta, taataqqa ta waatee boonoshi beegimmi wottoon, qitaachemmina'o beetina'one" iye.
40017001	Aroochee Yesuusi shiritta qemoyee gub Pheexiroosin, Yaaqoobinaa bi manoo Yowannisinon baach yechiqqi genja guudi toommooch kechiye.
40017002	Bi kechitoyee gub aroochaa boonoshi aafooch shaddeehe; bi aafo aabechoomon aaxxahe; bi tahati qoraddoo oogichii naccaa wacwacciye.
40017003	Arooba Muusinaa Eliyaasina xalla bekkaqqi Yesuusina tookkii boonoshi yibbaataa beetee, keeja bi dabbeena'o beeggiyeete.
40017004	Pheexiroosi tiyiqqi Yesuusin "Ta Doonocho! Hiniich beemo nooch gaawiye. Ne shuni gaata, hiniich keeja bashoon, ikkoon neech, ikkoonoo Muusich, ikkoonoo Eliyaasich bashibone" iye.
40017005	Ishin getooch bi beetee, bekkach nacca huttoomi qubo shimaayoochee kindiqqi boonoshin yiirahe; qubee daggoochaa "Biinna ta emiriti ta shunnaa beeti ta bushoo aroone. bi waanee waayabote!" ii beeti qaaroon waayaheete.
40017006	Ishin waayati keeja bi dabbeena'o oogichiqqi boonoshi keqqitoyich, baroona shawooch guufaheete.
40017007	Tunatee Yesuusi boonoshi waan giddaa shuurikkiqqi, "Tibote! Shattaahotine!" iye.
40017008	Damba kaamaqqi boonoshi ciinniyee, Yesuusi ikketoyee damba koninolla beegaaneena'one.
40017009	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusinaa keeja bi dabbeena'ona guudi toommoochee boonoshi kindii beetee, Yesuusi "Ashi bushoo taan qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee Yeeri kichimmi wottoon, ittoshi beeggiton konicholla gettaahotine!" iqqi gettiye.
40017010	Aroochee bi dabbeena'o wochiqqi Yesuusin "Ishi gaata, Muusichi callee dojachina'o 'Shiichi woyemmo Eliyaasine' iqqi amoyichiye boonoshi gettii beeto?" iqqi echaheete.
40017011	Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ibaroone; Eliyaasi shiichiree woyemmone. aroo bulli mooyon tachemmone.
40017012	Tunatee ta waanee waayabote! Eliyaasi ebiyee aaf waatone. Bi waatee, boonoshi qaawito bullin bi toommooch shuunateetalli bi koni gaata ariyaaneena'one. Ebiyee wotta ashi bushoo ta boonoshi kishoochee xuuxoon beeg beddato taane" iye.
40017013	Arooba Yesuusi gettito, Aacona Afaallachi Yowannisin bi tuno bi dabbeena'ochi mullooch giyiye.
40017014	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusinaa keeja bi dabbeena'ona dofee asheena'o beetooch boonoshi shaggiyee, ikka uro Yesuus waan giddaa goyinnaqqi
40017015	ishichiye:- "Doonocho! Ta bushoyich ariqqabe! Maachi biiyoo biin yechitone. Meeti kaalloon qaaqqooch, meeti kaalloonoo aacooch dichii beetone.
40017016	Ne dabbeena'o waan ta deebee, wodiyoon mawiitina'one" iye.
40017017	Yesuusi wochiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Hini Yeerichi toommooch ittoshi mulloon too'iyaani xumma asheena'ote! Aati wottoon ittoshina tookki beeyehote? Amee wottoon ittoshin haa'iiyehote? Eke ta waan bushoon deebote!" iye.
40017018	Yesuusi yinnoon "Hini bushoochi toommoochee tibe!" iqqi noggahe. Yinnoo bushoochi toommoochee tiyiye; bushoo bekkach wodiye.
40017019	Aree hillooch bi dabbeena'o boonoshi ikketo Yesuus waan giddaqqi, "No amoyichiye yoohon no mawiito?" iqqi echaheete.
40017020	Yesuusi boonoshich wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Ittoshi mulloon Yeerichi toommooch too'iyoo ittoshi qajitoyichiye. Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; ittoshi mulloon giishacheenolla Yeerichi toommooch ittoshi too'iito gaata, hini gepoon 'Hiniichee tiyiree ok ebiich beshabe!' ittoshi geti gaata, beshemmone; ittoshin mawemmi mooyo amolla aalloone.
40017021	[Coomiqqi ittoshi corootaan gaata, ebiyoomi yinnoon cir yoohon hakkaachotine]" iye.
40017022	Galiilee Shawooch bi dabbeena'o kiceetoyee gub, Yesuusi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ashi bushoo taan ashi kishooch beshiiree imma ii beetina'one;
40017023	Boonoshiyoo taan wuxemmina'one; boonoshi wuxitoyee gub keeja qemooba qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee Yeeri taan kichemmone" iye. Hini mooyona bi dabbeena'o oogichiqqi ayiniyeete.
40017024	Yesuusinaa bi dabbeena'ona Qifirinaahi Katamooch boonoshi shaggitoyee gub, nati natona yaafee kexooch giyii beeti gijoon deqqi beeti asheena'o Pheexiroos waan giddaqqi, "Ittoshi dojacho Yaafee Kechi gijoon qocaacheha?" iqqi echaheete.
40017025	Pheexirooyoo wochiqqi, "Eeha qoccemmone" iye. Pheexiroosi kexooch giyiyee, Yesuusi shiichiqqi, "Simoono! Neech amon shaahii beete? Hini Shawee taateena'o qaraxoonaa gibiroonon koni waaneeniye boonoshi deqqi beeto? Boonoshi bushiisheena'o waaneenashi oohee baree waati asheena'o waaneeniye?" iqqi echahe.
40017026	Pheexiroosi "Bare waati asheena'o waaneeniye" iqqi wochiye. Yesuusi "Ishi gaata, kechi bushiisheena'o qoco boonoshich qaawiyaache.
40017027	Tunaballi boonoshich xugo no tunataachemmoyich, baharooch hamiree haashoon yesha qamaaxiroon baharooch dufe! Shiichii ne yechati haashee gammon ne gaxxiyee, gijoon danemmo neene; aroon daamiree neennaa taannoch shigoona Yaafee Kexooch giijibe!" iye.
40018001	Arooba bi dabbeena'o Yesuus waan giddaqqi, "Shimaaji taatittineechaa bulliyee besho koni tunehe?" iqqi echaheete.
40018002	Arooba Yesuusi ikka giishacha bushoon ceeggiqqi boonoshi daggooch neechiye;
40018003	Boonoshichoo ishichiye:- "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; Yeer waan wotto ittoshi qayi gaata, gishiishi bushiishoochoomonoo tuno ittoshi qayi gaata, shimaaji taatittineech cir giyaachemmo ittoshine.
40018004	Illa hini giishacha bushoochoomon bi qelloon giishii beeto shimaaji taatittineechaa bulliyee beshoone.
40018005	Ebiyoomi gishiishi bushiisheena'oochee ikkoon taacha iqqi shunnii beeto koniyolla taan shunnii beetone" iye.
40018006	"Wotta boonoshi mulloon ta toommooch too'iiti hini gishiisheena'oochee ikkoyich xugo tunammo koniyolla, ooga yiikka xaqqoon bi qettooch tifee baharee gejooch giyii manjeyoo biich gaawiye.
40018007	Ebi shaaha xugo tunemmi mooyo woyemmo bi tunatoyich hini shawee toommeexi asheena'oyich woowo! Ashi dihoo echataani mooyone; tunaballi ara uroon xugo tunaqqi dichimmi uroyich woowo!
40018008	Illa ne kishoo oohee ne baatoo neech xugo bi tuna gaata, kuxiree dufe! Gutta kishoona oohee gutta baatoona beebee, bulli araddoon tahaani shiwaree qaaqqooch ne dupeyoyee, baata kuxo oohee kisha duro tunaachii kashee kexooch giyiqqi beemo neech gaawiye.
40018009	Wotta ne aafo neech xugo bi tuna gaata, kichiree dufe! Gutta aafoona beebee shiwaree qaaqqooch ne dupiyoyee ikka aafoona beebee kashee kexooch giyiqqi beemo neech gaawiye" iye.
40018010	"Hini gishiisheena'oochee ikkoonolla ittoshi hoxataachemmoyich, ittoshi qelloon quyabote! Shimaayooch beeti boonoshi maraakeena'o shimaayooch beeti ta nihoochi aafooch bulli araddoon beetina'one.
40018011	["Ashi bushoo ta waato, aallaton danaa wodiyoyichiye.]
40018012	"Eke ittoshich amon shaahii beete? Ikka uroyich balla bago bee gaata, aree daggoochee ikka bago aalla gaata, echati yixanaa yiixiyeena'on gepooch dufiichi tiyii ara aallaton qaawoyich hamaacheha?
40018013	Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; bi dana gaata, aallataani yixanaa yiixiyeena'oyee aallaqqi danati bagoyich oogichi emiremmone.
40018014	Ebiyoomon hini gishiisheena'oochee ikkolla bi aallemmoyich shimaayooch beeti ittoshi nihoochi daaggoo toonoone" iye.
40018015	"Ne manoo neen bi xu'i gaata, hamiree bi ikketon neennaa biinna guttoo tunaree, 'Ebi ne shuunati shuunoo gaawiya?' getiree ittibatabe! Ne getee bi waaya gaata, ne hajee manoon tuniiyemmo neene;
40018016	Tunaballi bi waayoo qayi gaata, ikka oohee gutta bara asheena'on yeshiree bi waan hambe! 'Ne miixoo boonoshi tunemmoyich gutta oohee keeja miixoon yesho neech qaawiihe' getee kooreeto ceennemmoyich ebin tuniibe!
40018017	Boonoshi getee waayo bi qayi gaata, kittinee guuphoyich gete! Wotta kittineena'o getee waayo bi qayi gaata, Yeerin ariyaanoonaa gabiyee guudoonon tuniiree ciine!
40018018	"Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; shawoochaa ittoshi cuchiti mooyo shimaayoochaanoo cucheeto tunemmone; shawoochaa ittoshi biichiti mooyo shimaayoochaanoo biicheeto tunemmone" iye.
40018019	"Wotta ittoshich gettoye; hini shawee toommoochaa ittoshi daggoochee guttoo, amashee mooyoonolla ikka mulloona tunaqqi boonoshi qolla gaata, shimaayooch beeti ta nihoo boonoshi qollato bullin boonoshich tuniiyemmone.
40018020	Ebiyoo guttoo oohee keemo tunaqqi ta shigoona boonoshi kicee beetooch boonoshina tookkii ta beetoyichiye" iye.
40018021	Arooba Pheexiroosi Yesuus waan giddaqqi, "Ta Doonocho! Ta manoo taan bi xu'i gaata, ambicha kaallooniye biin ta maareho? Shabaatta kaalloon maaribata?" iye.
40018022	Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Shaba wottee shabaatta kaalloonalli, 'Shabaatta kaalloon baach maaribe!' getaache" iye.
40018023	"Illa shimaaji taatittine ebiyoomine; ikka taatoo bi ukkuriitina'on bi gijeechon echiya qaawiye.
40018024	Shiichiqqi bi echahee, meeti huma birawoon erattati ikka uroon bi waan deebiyeete.
40018025	Ara uro hini bi maati gijoon qocoyich bi hakkoo guutee, taatoo 'Neennaa ne mecheena, ne bushiishoona, neech beeto bulli kecheeree hini ne maati gijoon qoce!' iqqi gettiye.
40018026	"Ebich ara uro taatoochi baatooch dihiqqi, 'Ta Doonocho! Haa'iibe! Bullin qoccemmo taane' iqqi qollahe.
40018027	Taatoo ara uroyich oogichii ariqqaqqi gawukkiye; bi erattati gijoonoo maarii qajiye.
40018028	"Tunaballi ara uro kechii hammii bi beetee, bi waanee balla birawoon erattati ikka bi nuuchoona danaqqi, 'Ta hiishoon qoce!' iqqi bi qettoona yechiye.
40018029	"Ebich bi nuucho bi baatooch dihiqqi, 'Haa'iibe! Bullin qoccemmo taane' iqqi qollahe.
40018030	"Tunaballi aroo ariqqataanoone; bi hiishoon bi qoccimmi wottoon cuyee kexooch cuchiihe.
40018031	Bi nuucheena'o tunati ukkureena'o bi shuunaton beeggiqqi oogichii ayiniyeete; hammiqqi tunati mooyo bullin taatoyich gettiyeete.
40018032	"Ebiyee gub, taatoo ara ukkuroon ceeggiiqqi ishichiye:- 'Hini gonda ukkuroocho! Taan ne qollatoyich, ne erattati gijoo bullin neech qajaa maaraachota?
40018033	Neech maarii ta qayoomon, ne nuuchoo tunati ara ukkuroyich qayo neech qaawiyaacha?' iye.
40018034	Ebich taatoo ipaqqi bi erattati gijoo bullin bi qoccimmi wottoon ebi ara ukkuroon sheeremmina'oyich beshiiqqi immiye.
40018035	"Illa ittoshi ikki ikkoo bi manoon bi mulloochee tiijiqqi bi maaroo qayi gaata, shimaayeexi ta nihoo ebiyoomon bi toommooch tuniiyemmone" iye.
40019001	Yesuusi ebin gettii bi ciichitoyee gub, Galiilee Shawoochee tiyiqqi Yooridanoosi Aacoyee beqach beeti Yihudee Shawooch hammiye.
40019002	Dofee asheena'o biin dabbiyeete; aroochaa biiyatina'on wodiihe.
40019003	Arooba ikkikka Fariseena'o Yesuus waan giddaa biin muriciiya qaawiqqi, "Asho tunammi mooyona bi mecheen bi gawukkemmoyich Muusichi calloo daaggita?" iqqi echaheete.
40019004	Yesuusi wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Yeeri shiichiqqi ashoon anaamonaa maacheenon tuniiqqi halliye.
40019005	Ishichiinoo iye:- 'Asho bi nihoonaa bi indeenon qayiichi bi mecheena tookki ikkoo tunemmone; gutteena'oo ikka meeno tunemmina'one' ii beeti qaaroon shemmataachotina?
40019006	Ebich ara aaboochee tiijiqqii ikkeena'oalli gubbichi gutteena'o tooneena'one. Illa Yeeri xaaqqiton, asho bariyaaye" iye.
40019007	Fariseena'o wochiqqi, "Ishi gaata, Muusi 'Bi gawukkeyoon miixaa beeti woraqatoon koori imiree gawukkibe' iqqi amoyich gettiye?" iyeete.
40019008	Yesuusi wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Muusi ittoshi mullee muumoon beeggiqqinalli 'Ittoshi mecheen gawukkibote!' iqqi bi gettito; wonna ebi aalloone.
40019009	Tunaballi ta ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; shunoon maataani bi mecheen gawukkiqqi bareen shaaggii beeto bulli bi mechechi toommooch shunoon maatone" iye.
40019010	Bi dabbeena'o "Mecheenaa kenoonochi mooyo ebi tuna gaata, shaagi qayo gaawiye" iyeete.
40019011	Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Ebi Yeeri immitina'oyichalli bullich toonoone;
40019012	Ebiyoo bi indee maacoochee guruusho tunaqqi shiijato beetone; ashoona nasheeto beetone; shimaaji taatittineyicha iqqi shaagon qajitina'o beetina'one. Ebich ebiyoomon tunoon hakkiyoyich tunabe" iye.
40019013	Arooba asheena'o "Yesuusi bi kishoon boonoshi shimbooch kotiiree boonoshich corootibe" iqqi gishiishi bushiisheena'on bi waan deebiyeete; tunatee bi dabbeena'o bushiisheena'on deebiti asheena'on noggaheete.
40019014	Tunaballi Yesuusi bi dabbeena'on " Qayote! Shimaaji taatittine tunemmo eboyoomina'oyichiye; ebichi gishiishi bushiisheena'o ta waan wobeete; bajaahotine" iye.
40019015	Bi kishoon boonoshi shimbooch bi kotiitoyee gub aroochee tiyiqqi hammiye.
40019016	Ikka araddoon ikka uro Yesuus waan giddaqqi, "Dojachocho! Bulli yemeenee kashoon ta danemmoyich amee de'a shuunoon shuunabate?" iqqi echahe.
40019017	Yesuusi wochiqqi, "De'a shuuneechon amoyich taan echa beetine? De'o tunato ikketi Yeeri baachiye. Bulli yemeenee kashoon danoon ne qaawi gaata, Muusichi calloo gettiton ceechibe!" iye.
40019018	Uroo wochiqqi, "Bi gettitoochee aabiniye?" iye. Yesuusi wochiqqi, " 'Wuxiyaahine! Shuno maayaahine! Gaajaahine! Kootoon miixiyaahine!
40019019	Ne nihoonaa ne indeenon oogiibe! Neenoomi ne manoon neenna tachiree shune!' ii beetoniye" iye.
40019020	Gurimaashoo wochiqqi, "Ebi bullin ceechito taane. Ebiye baroo ta shapiiti mooyo amoone?" iye.
40019021	Yesuusi "De'oon tuno ne shuni gaata, hamiree neech beeto bullin kemiree iriteetina'oyich imbe! Neech shimaaji kexooch kiceeree beeyemmone. Aroyee gub waaree taan dabbibe!" iye.
40019022	Tunatee ara gurimaashoo wodda gijoo biich beeto bi tunatoyich, ebin waayaqqi tiyii ayiniibee wottaqqi hammiye.
40019023	Aree hillooch Yesuusi bi dabbeena'oyich ishichiye:- "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; gaannachoyich shimaaji taatittineech gimo oogati iritoone.
40019024	Guttinoon ittoshich gettoye; gaalleyich napee aahoona besho maggoone; tunaballi wotta gaannachi uroyich Yeerichi taatittineech gimo ebiyee beshoon maggoone" iye.
40019025	Bi dabbeena'o ishin waayaqqi oogichii woriganaabee, "Ishi gaata, konine wodoon hakkeho?" iyeete.
40019026	Yesuusi boonoshin ciinniqqi, "Asho hini mooyon tuniyoo hakkaache; tunaballi Yeeri bulli mooyon tuniyoyich hakkachone" iye.
40019027	Arooba Pheexiroosi wochiqqi, "Illa bullin qajaqqa neen dabbito noone. Ishi gaata, Yeer waanee no danemmo amooniye?" iye.
40019028	Yesuusiyoo boonoshich wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; bulli mooyo andrammi yemeenooba ashi bushoo ta oogee yiiree taatee qeenooch ta kotahooba, taan dabbii beeti ittoshi wotta aaraa gutta taatee qeenooch kotaree aaraa gutta Isra'eelee yoodeena'ochi toommooch taatemmo ittoshine.
40019029	Taacha iqqi bi kexon, oohee bi anaami maneena'on, oohee bi maacha maneena'on, oohee bi indeen, oohee bi nihoon, oohee bi bushiishoon, oohee bi gochii beeti shawoon qajito bullich Yeeri eboshi bulliyee beshaa beshoon immemmone; wotta bulli yemeenee kashoon biich immemmone.
40019030	Tunaballi and 'Shiichitina'o' getteetina'ochi daggoochee meetina'o arooba gubbemmina'one; and 'gubbatina'o' getteetina'ochi daggoochee meetina'o arooba shiichemmina'one" iye.
40020001	Wotta Yesuusi ishichiye:- "Shimaaji taatittine ebiyoomine; ikka woyinee Doono meeti bi woyinee goyee daggooch boonoshi shuunemmoyich shuunachina'on ceegga maaddiqqi kechiye.
40020002	Shuunachina'on danaqqi, 'Ikka heechi shuunee damoojoon imbana' ii echee kuxxiqqi boonoshin bi goyo beetooch daachiihe.
40020003	"Guttinoon keeja saatooch kechiqqi shuunaalli asheena'o gabiyee godooch neexaa beetina'on beeggiye;
40020004	Areena'onoo 'Ittoshi wotta ta woyinee goyo beetooch hamiree shuunabote! Ittoshi qoodee damoojoon ittoshich immemmo taane' iye.
40020005	Boonoshiyoo goyee xaa'ooch hammiyeete. "Wotta shiritta saatoonaa yiixiya saatoonooch kechiqqi ebiyoomon tuniihe.
40020006	Andoo wochiqqi aaraa ikka saatooch kechiqqi gabiyee godooch neexaa beeti bara shuunaalleena'on danaqqi, 'Shuunoon biichiqqi heeyi xumoon hiniich amooniye ittoshi hallii beeto?' iye.
40020007	"Boonoshiyoo wochiqqi, 'Noon shuuniiyemmon muccaqqaaniye no neexaa beeto' iyeete. "Biyoo 'Ishi gaata, ittoshiyoo wotta ta woyinee goyee xaa'ooch hamiree shuunabote!' iye.
40020008	"Shawoo xumatee woyinee doono bi ukkuriiton 'Shuunachina'on ceegiree ciirooch waatina'oochee tiijiree shiichii waatina'ooch beddaahee boonoshi damoojoon imbe!' iye.
40020009	"Aroochee aaraa ikka saatooch waatina'o giddaqqi boonoshi qelli qelloona ikka heechi damoojoon deqqiyeete.
40020010	Ebich shiichii waatina'o 'Beshoon deqqemmo noone' iqqi gabiyeete; tunaballi boonoshi wotta gub waatina'ona tookkii tatoon deqqiyeete.
40020011	Boonoshi deqqitoyee gub 'Hini gub waatina'o ikka saato ikketon shuunaheete; no heeyi xumoon aabee sheelloona miccaabee maraataa heechati noonna deebaa tachine?' iqqi woyinee doonochi toommooch guruuxeeheete.
40020013	"Woyinee doono wochiqqi boonoshi daggoochee ikkoyich ishichiye:- 'Ta xiboocho! Neen xu'aano taane. No yibbaatato, ikka heechi damoojoona toona?
40020014	Ne qoodoon de'iree hambe! Neech ta immatoomon gub waatoyich imon qaawii beeto taane.
40020015	Ta gijoona ta shunahon shuuno hakkaachehota? Oohee ariqqacho ta tunatoyich qanaataa beetine?' iye.
40020016	"Ebiyoomon and 'Gubbatina'o' getteetina'o arooba shiichemmina'one; and 'Shiichitina'o' getteetina'o arooba gubbemmina'one" iye.
40020017	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi Yerusalem hamma kechiye; hammiibee gommoochaa aaraa gutta bi dabbeena'on baach ikka bad wochiqqi ishichiye:-
40020018	"Ebiyoche! And Yerusalem hammaa beeto noone. Aroochaa ashi bushoo taan qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa Muusichi callee dojachina'onoyich beshiiree immemmina'one. Boonoshiyoo 'Qitibe' getiree ta toommooch nallemmina'one;
40020019	Aagatee asheena'oyichoo beshiiree immemmina'one; boonoshiyoo taan coonemmina'one; arangoonoo xoobbemmina'one; aroyee gub yooddemmina'one. Tunatee keeja qemooba qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee Yeeri taan kichemmone" iye.
40020020	Arooba Yabidoosichi mechee bi bushiisheena'ona tookkii Yesuus waan giddaqqa ikka mooyon biich bi tuniiyemmoyich goyinnaa qollahan.
40020021	Biyoo "Amoon qaawinne?" iye. Ureyoo "Hini gutta ta bushiisheena'o, ne taatahooba ikkoo ne qanna bad, ikkoo ne yoocha bad kotabeete" iyan.
40020022	Tunatee Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Ittoshi qollemmon ariyaachotine. Ta uchemmi xuuxee xoofoochee uyon hakkehotina?" iye. Boonoshiyoo wochiqqi, "Eeha, hakkemmo noone" iyeete.
40020023	Yesuusi wotta "Ta uchemmi xoofoochee uchemmo ittoshine. Tunaballi ta qannoonaa ta yoochoonooch ittoshi kotemmoyich immemmo ta toonoone. Ebi ara xaa'eena'on ta nihoo qanniiree bi immemmo, bi kaacciti asheena'oyichiye" iye.
40020024	Aree hillooch echa aashira bi dabbeena'o waayaqqi gutta maneena'on kaaraheete.
40020025	Tunatee Yesuusi boonoshi bullin bi waan ceeggiqqi ishichiye:- "Aagatee taateena'o shawoo bullichi toommooch taataqqi areexi asho bullin boonoshi hajoon arii beeto ittoshine; wotta eboshi bullichi toommooch beeti iraasheena'o doono tunoon tuushaachotine.
40020026	Tunatee ittoshi daggooch ebiyoomon tunaaye. Ittoshi daggoochee koniyolla 'Oogo tunabana' ito, wochee bushoochoomon ittoshich shuunabe;
40020027	Wotta ittoshi daggoochee koniyolla 'Ukkurabana' ito, shiichiree kemee guunochoomon ittoshich shuunabe.
40020028	Ebiyee ashi bushoo tawolla wocheyoonaa ta kashoon meetina'ochi keroyich deejoonoyich waahoalli, 'Boonoshi taach wocheebeete' iqqa waataano taane" iye.
40020029	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusinaa bi dabbeena'ona Yaariki katamoochee boonoshi kechiyee, dofee asheena'o boonoshin dabbiyeete.
40020030	Arooba aaf dooga gutta asheena'o gomi gashooch kotaabee Yesuusi aroona beshoon waayaqqi, "No Doonocho! Nooch ariqqabe! Daawiti bushoocho!" iqqi cookiyeete.
40020031	Arooba doofee asheena'o "Cookaayote!" iqqi boonoshin noggaheete. Tunaballi "No Doonocho! Nooch ariqqabe! Daawiti bushoocho!" iibee beshoon cookiyeete.
40020032	Aree gaata Yesuusi neexaachii ceeggiqqi, "Ittoshich amoon ta tuniyooniye ittoshi qaawii beeto?" iqqi echahe.
40020033	"No Doonocho! No aafoon ne ciinniiyemmoyichiye!" iyeete.
40020034	Yesuusi ariqqaqqi boonoshi aafoon bi kishoona yechiye. Boonoshi aafo bekkach ciinniye; aroochee Yesuusin dabbiyeete.
40021001	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusinaa bi dabbeena'ona Yerusalem katinniqqi, Zayitee Michi Guudi ga'ooch beeti Beetefaageeni katamooch shaggiyeete. Arooba Yesuusi bi dabbeena'oochee gutteena'on ishichiqqi wochahe;
40021002	"Ittoshi aaf beeti gafooch hambote! Hammii ittoshi shaggiyee, tipeeqqa beeti kureenaa biinna tookkii beeti bi bushoonon danemmo ittoshine; areena'on biishiree taach deebote!
40021003	Asho koniyolla tiyiqqi ittoshin ikka mooyon bi geti gaata, 'Doonoyich qaaweetina'one' getote! Bekkach areena'on ittoshich gawukkemmone" iye.
40021004	Ebi bi tunato, "Ciyooni Katamee asheena'oyich 'Ebiyoche! Ittoshi taatoo ga'i de'o tunaqqi kurechi busheen yebbaa ittoshi waan waa beetone' getote!" gettee keemachona geteeto bi ceennemmoyichiye.
40021006	Aroochee gutta bi dabbeena'o hammiqqi Yesuusi gettitoomon tuniiheete;
40021007	kureenaa bi bushoonon bi waan deebiyeete. Deebiqqi boonoshi tahoon kureena'ochi toommooch boonoshi yaggee, Yesuusi yebbahe.
40021008	Arooba asheena'oochee dofeena'o boonoshi tahoon gommooch yaggiyeete; bareena'o wotta michi waamon kuxxii kuxxiqqi gommooch yaggiyeete.
40021009	Aaf shiichii beetina'onaa gub dabbii beetina'ona "Daawitichi bushoyich oogo tunabe! Doono Yeerichi shigoona waa beeto diireebe! Shimaaji shimaayooch beeti Yeeri gallateebe!" iibee cookeeheete.
40021010	Aroochee Yesuusi Yerusalem bi shaggee, katameexi asheena'o bulli "Ebi konine?" iqqi shuuriyeete.
40021011	Asheena'o "Hini Galiilee Shawooch beeti Naazireeti Katamoochee waati keemachi Yesuusine" iyeete.
40021012	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi Yaafee Kechi kakall daggooch giyiye. Giyiqqi, arooch gabiyoo geddii kemmii kemaa beeti asheena'o bullin gashaa kichiye. Boonoshin kichiibee gijoon shaddii beetina'ochi qeenon, uggon kemmii beeti asheena'ochi gabbaroonoo yangiye.
40021013	Wotta asheena'oyich "Yeeri 'Ta kexo "Corootee kexoone" getteeyemmone' iqqi bi gettito Yaafa Macaafooch kooreetone; tunaballi ittoshi 'Bokkeena'ochi gofoon' tuniito ittoshine" iye.
40021014	Yesuusi Yaafee Kechi kakallee daggooch bi beetee, aaf doogeena'onaa baata yesheena'ona bi waan waatee, boonoshin wodiihe.
40021015	Tunaballi qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa Muusichi callee dojachina'ona Yesuusi tuniiti woriganikkiti mooyonaa Yaafee Kechi kakallee daggoochaa "Oogo Daawitichi bushoyich tunabe!" iibee cookii beeti bushiisheena'onon beeggiqqi ipaheete.
40021016	Ebich Yesuusin "Hini bushiisheena'o gettii beeti mooyo neech waayee beeta?" iyeete. Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi, "Waayaa beeto taane; 'Yeero! Gaggareena'onaa xammii beetina'onochi noonoochee gallatoon ne qellich qanniitine' ii beeti qaaroon cir shemmataachotina" iye.
40021017	Ebiyee gub, boonoshin qajii Yerusalemee tiyiqqi Bitaana kechii hammiye; ara bi hammiti katamooch qeyiye.
40021018	Dechra maaddoona Yesuusi Yerusalem wottaqqi hammiibee shaacahe.
40021019	Gomi gashooch ikka balasee mixin beeggiqqi bi waan hammiye; tunaballi waamoyee damba aafoon cir danataanoone. Ebich balasee mixin "Guttinnoon aafoon aafaaye!" iqqi upiye. Ara balaseyoo bekkach shoolliyan.
40021020	Bi dabbeena'o ebin beeggiqqi, "Hini balasee mixi aabichiqqa kaata shoolliyane?" iqqi woriganaheete.
40021021	Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi, "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; ittoshi mulloon Yeerichi toommooch ittoshi too'ii gaata, wotta ittoshi mulloonoo guttiyoo ittoshi qayi gaata, balasee mixin ta tuniito ikketo tunataanoon, hini gepoonolla 'Hiniichee waaxaree baharooch awureebe!' ittoshi geti gaata, tunemmone.
40021022	Ittoshi mulloon Yeerichi toommooch too'iyoona biin ittoshi qollammo bullin danemmo ittoshine" iye.
40021023	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi Yaafee Kexooch giyiqqi dojii bi beetee, qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa shawee geeneena'ona bi waan giddaqqi, "Hini mooyina'on ne tunii beeto, amee ukkurittinoon danaqqaaniye? Hini mooyina'on ne tuniiyemmoyich konine neen wochato?" iqqi echaheete.
40021024	Yesuusi wochiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ta wotta ittoshin ikka mooyon echabana; ittoshi wochi gaata, ta wotta hini mooyina'on amee ukkurittinoona ta tunii beeto gaata ittoshich gettemmo taane.
40021025	Yowannisin 'Aacona afaallibe!' iqqi wochato konine? Yeerinashi, ashoone?" iye. Arooba boonoshinaa boonoshina echeeqqi, " 'Yeerine' no geti gaata, 'Ishi gaata, bi gettiton amoyich ibariyaachotine?' getiree echemmone.
40021026	Tunatee 'Ashoone' no geti gaata, Yowannisin asheena'o bulli "Keemachone" iqqi boonoshi gabii beetoyich boonoshin shattahone" iyeete.
40021027	Ebich wochiqqi Yesuusich "No ariyaano noone" iyeete. Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi, "Wotta amee ukkurittinoona hini mooyina'on ta tunii beeto gaata ittoshich getaache" iye.
40021028	Yesuusi daakkiqqi ishichiye:- "Ittoshich amoon shaahii beete? Gutta bushiishachi ikka uro beehe. Boonoshiichee ikkoo waan giddaqqi, 'Ta bushoocho! hanaach ta woyinee goyooch hamiree shuunabe!' iye.
40021029	"Ara bushoo wochiqqi, 'Ta hamaache' iqqi qajiye. Tunatee gub 'Ta nihoochi wochoon amoyichiye ta qajato?" iqqi shuunoyich hammiye.
40021030	"Wotta guttinnee bi bushoon daakkiqqi wochahe. Biyoo wochiqqi 'De'a ta nihoocho!' iye; tunaballi hamaanoone.
40021031	"Gutteena'oochee bi nihoochi wochoon waayato aabine?" iye. Boonoshiyoo wochiqqi, "Shichii bi wochatone" iyeete. Boonoshich Yesuusi ishichiye:- "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; gabiyee guudeena'onaa yahachina'ona Yeerichi taatittineech ittoshiyee shiichiree giyemmina'one.
40021032	'Amoyicha?' bi gettee gaata, Yowannisi cadiqittinee gommichon bekkiiya ittoshi waan bi waatee, bi yibbaatoon ibariyaano ittoshine; tunatee gabiyee guudeena'onaa yahachina'ona ibariitina'one. Ittoshi ebin beeggiqqinolla, axaaxee gommoochee wottaqqi biin ibariyaano ittoshine" iye.
40021033	Wotta Yesuusi ishichiye:- "Bara shaahiyoon waayabote! Woyinoon bechiti ikka uro beehe. Bi guudoon xaqqoona gayahe; wotta woyinee hiicci opoon iijiye; dilaaloon shuunahe; aree hillooch uchi shiimemmi quyachina'oyich quyichii, bara shawooch hammiye.
40021034	"Ebiyee gub, woyinee aafee gooro waatee, 'Woyinee aafoon quyachina'o waanee qoodeeree ta qoodoon deebote!' iqqi bi shuunachina'on quyachina'o waan wochahe.
40021035	"Ara wocheeti bi shuunachina'on quyachina'on yechiqqi ikkoon xoobbiyeete; ikkoonoo wuxiyeete; baroon xaqqoona xoobbiyeete.
40021036	Woyinee doono wotta aafichina'oyee beshi shuunachina'on quyachina'o waan daakkiqqi wochahe. Boonoshiyoo aafichoomon boonoshi toommooch tuniiheete.
40021037	Ciiroochaa woyinee doono 'Ta bushoon oogiiyemmina'one' iqqi bi bushoon boonoshi waan wochahe.
40021038	"Tunatee quyachina'o ebi bushoon beeggiqqi boonoshinaa boonoshina 'Bi woraashoo hinine. Ittoshi waatee wuxibone. Hini bi shawoonoo de'one' iyeete.
40021039	Ebina bushoon yechiqqi, woyinee goyoyee maach kichiqqi wuxiyeete.
40021040	"Illa woyinee goyee doono wotta waaree hini quyachina'ochi toommooch amoon hallehe?" iye.
40021041	Boonoshiyoo wochiqqi, "Hini gonda asheena'on guuri ciichemmone; woyinee aafoonoo bi goori gooroona biich deebemmi bara quyachina'oyich immemmone" iyeete.
40021042	Yesuusi boonoshich ishichiye:- " 'Xaqqee kechi haggachina'o hoxati xaqqo, aroo kexon deggii neechiti giimbee guummon tunatone. Ebinoo Doono Yeeri tuniitone. Hini mooyo no beeggich woriganikkito tunatone' ii beeton Yaafa Macaafoochee cir shemmataachotina?
40021043	"Ebich ittoshich gettoye; Yeeri bi taatittineen ittoshi kishoochee tiijemmone; bi shunniti shuunoon shuunaa beeti aagatoyich immemmone[.
40021044	Hini xaqqee toommooch dihiyo buricemmone; tunatee hini xaqqo bi toommooch dihiyo bulli yiikkeeyemmone]" iye.
40021045	Qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa Fariseena'ona hini shaahiyeena'on waayaqqi boonoshin bi geton shalligiyeete.
40021046	Ebich Yesuusin yecha qaawiyeete; tunatee dofee asheena'o Yesuusin "Keemachone" iqqi boonoshi gabii beetoyich boonoshich shattiyeete.
40022001	Daakkiqqi Yesuusi bara shaahiyoona boonoshich gettiye; ishichiinoo iye:-
40022002	"Shimaaji taatittine ebiyoomine; ikka taatoo bi bushoochi gaaroyich gifiroon qanniihe.
40022003	Gaarooch ceeggeetina'on boonoshi kicemmoyich bi wochee bushiisheena'on boonoshi waan daachiihe; tunatee ceeggeeti asheena'o womon shunaaneena'one.
40022004	"Taatoo bara wocheyachina'on wochinnoon wochahe; ishichiqqinoo gettiye:- 'Ceeggeeti gaarachina'o waan hamiree, "Ebiyoche! Gaaree maayoon qanniito taane; maa'eena'onaa gubbaneena'ona basheetina'one; mooyo bulli gawaateetone; ebichi gaarooch kaataree wobote!" getiree getote!' iye.
40022005	"Hammii boonoshi gettitee, ceeggeetina'o gaaroon qallaayiqqi ikkoo bi goyooch, baroo bi giixooch hammiye.
40022006	Echeena'o wocheetina'on yechiqqi boonoshi kashoon yulliiheete; wuxiinoo iyeete.
40022007	Taatoo ebin waayaqqi oogichii kaarahe; bi naayina'on daachiiqqi ara wuxitina'on wuxiihe; boonoshi katmoonoo michiihe.
40022008	"Ebiyee gub, taatoo bara wocheyachina'oyich ishichiye:- 'Gaaree gifiro qannitone; tunatee ceeggeetina'o bedditina'o tunataaneena'one.
40022009	Illa keeja kaattooch keyiree ittoshi danammi asho bullin gaaree kexooch ceegote!' iye.
40022010	Ebina ara wocheyachina'o gommooch kechiqqi boonoshi danato bullin, gondeena'onoo, de'eena'onoo kiciyeete; gaaree kexooch gaarachina'o ceenniyeete.
40022011	"Tunaballi taatoo ceeggeeti asheena'on beegga gaaree kexooch bi giyiyee, asheena'ochi daggooch gaaree tahoon tahataani ikka uroon beeggiye.
40022012	Biich ishichiye:- 'Ta xiboocho! Gaaree tahoon tahataanoon aabichiqqa gaaree kexooch giyanne?' iye. Uroo cikkii qajiye.
40022013	"Arooba taatoo qoomeena'on 'Hini uroon bi kishoonaa bi baatoonon cuyiree maach mandarooch kich dufote! Aroochaa eefonaa gashee qaayona tunemmone' iye.
40022014	"Ceeggeetina'o meetina'one; tunatee kaacceetina'o giishacheena'one" iye.
40022015	Ebiyee gub, Fariseena'o hammiqqi, "Aabichiree hini Yesuusin bi yibbaatoon muciyiibona?" iqqi echeeheete.
40022016	Boonoshi dabbeena'on, Heroodisi asheena'oochee ikkikkeena'ona tookkii Yesuusin boonoshi echemmoyich daachiiheete; boonoshiyoo hammiqqi, "Dojachocho! Ibara moochacho ne tunoon, ibara mooyona Yeerichi gommichon ne dojoon arii beeto noone. Ashoon giisho, oogo getaachine; ebichi konicholla beshii shapii dabbiyaachine.
40022017	Illa and amoon gabii beetine? Eke nooch gete! Roomi taatoyich qaraxee qocon Muusichi calloo daaggitashi, daaggaache?" iqqi echaheete.
40022018	Yesuusiyoo boonoshi gonda gaboon ariiqqi, "Hini ittoshi maacoon xalloo shaahii beetina'ote! Amoyich taan muciyiiya qaawii beetotine?
40022019	Eke taach qaraxo qoccee beeti gijoon bekkiibote!" iye. Boonoshiyoo Roomachina'ochi shilingoon biich deebiqqi bekkiiheete.
40022020	Biyoo "Hini shilingee toommooch beeti mallatoonaa kooreeti shigoona konichone?" iqqi echahe.
40022021	Boonoshiyoo "Roomi taatoochone" iyeete. Yesuusiyoo "Ishi gaata, Roomi taatoochon Roomi taatoyich, Yeerichon Yeerichi imbote!" iye.
40022022	Boonoshiyoo ebin waayaqqi woriganaabee qajii hammiyeete.
40022023	Ebi arooba "Qitii duukkatina'o keyaachemmina'one" ii beeti Saduuqeena'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o Yesuus waan waaqqi ishichii echaheete;
40022024	"Dojachocho! Muusi 'Ikka uro mecheen shaaggiqqi bushoon shiyaanoon bi qiti gaata, bi manoo ara ureen woraashiree bi manoyich bushoon keribe' iqqi gettitone.
40022025	Illa shabaatta maneena'o noonna tookkii beetee, boonoshi daggoochee qaabboo mecheen shaaggiqqi bushoon shiyaanoon qitiye. Ebina bi hilloo ara ureen woraashiye;
40022026	Ebiyoomon wotta guttinno, keejinno, shabaattinnooch beddaahee bulli ara ureen woraashiqqi bushoon shiyaanoon qitii ciiraheete.
40022027	Ciiroochaa ure qitiyan.
40022028	Illa hini shabaatteena'o ara ureen shaaggitina'one. Ebich qitii duukkatina'o keyiyooba mechee bi tunemmo konichiye ?" iqqi echaheete.
40022029	Yesuusi wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Yaafa Macaafo gettii beetonaa Yeeri giidacho bi tunoonon ittoshi tuushitoyich muricciyotine.
40022030	Qitii duukkatina'o keyiyooba, shimaayooch beeti maraakeena'oomonalli boonoshi tunemmo; shaagaacheete; shaaggeyaacheete.
40022031	Wotta qitii duukkatina'ochi keyichon Yeeri ittoshich gettiton cir shemmataachotina?
40022032	Ebiyoo 'Ta Abrahamichi Nuggushoo, Yisaaqichi Nuggushoo, Yaaqoobichi Nuggushoo Yeeri taane' ii beetone. Illa boonoshi meenona qitiqqi kashoona beetina'oyichalli meenonaa kashoona qititina'oyich Nuggushoo toonoone" iye.
40022033	Dofee asheena'o ebin waayaqqi bi yibbaatoon woriganaheete.
40022034	Aree hillooch Yesuusi Saduuqeena'on wochemmi noonee bi mucciyoon Fariseena'o waayaqqi ikkooch kiceeqqi bi waan waaheete.
40022035	Boonoshi daggoochee ikka Muusichi callee dojacho Yesuusin muriciya qaawiqqi,
40022036	"Dojachocho! Calloo bulliichee besho aabine?" iqqi echahe.
40022037	Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Doono Yeeri ne Nuggushoon ceeni ne mulloona, ceeni ne kashoona, ceeni ne shalligoona shune!' ii beetone.
40022038	Qaabboonaa inda calloona ebine.
40022039	Ebin shaahii beeti guttinnee calloo 'Neenoomi ne manoon neenna tachiree shune!' ii beetone.
40022040	Muusichi calloonaa keemachina'o dojito bullina hini gutta calleena'ona tuggeetone" iye.
40022041	Fariseena'o kiceeqqi boonoshi beetee, Yesuusi ishichiqqi boonoshin echahe;
40022042	"Kiristoosichon amoon gabii beetotine? Bi konichi bushoo ittoshich shaahii beete?" iqqi echahe. Boonoshi wochiqqi, "Daawitichi bushoone" iqqi wochiyeete.
40022043	Yesuusiyoo "Ishi gaata, Daawiti Yaafa Ayaano biich shalligichee, 'Doono' iqqi akkiya ceeggiye? Daawiti ishichiqqi gettitone;
40022044	'Doono Yeeriyoo ta Doonon "Neenna koyaa beetina'on ne baate dechiich ta dichimmi wottoon ta qanna bad kotabe!" itone' iye.
40022045	Illa Daawiti biin 'Doono' itone. Ishi gaata, aabichiree bi bushoo tunehe?" iye.
40022046	Arooba ikka qaaroonolla wochoyich hakkito koniyolla aalloone. Aroobee aaboochee tiijiqqi Yesuusin echoyich kupphato koniyolla aalloone.
40023001	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi dofee asheena'onaa bi dabbeena'onoyich ishichiqqi gettiye;
40023002	"Muusichi callee dojachina'onaa Fariseena'ona Muusichi gabbarooch kotatina'one.
40023003	Ebich boonoshi gettii beeto bullin tuniibote! Ceechibote! Tunaballi boonoshi shuunaa beeton shuuniyaahotine! Ebiyoo boonoshi yibbaataa beeton boonoshi qelloona tuniyaaneena'o boonoshi tunatoyichiye.
40023004	Magga shaagoon cuchiqqi ashi toommooch shaaggiiheete; tunatee ikka yaphareenolla kettiyoon qaawaacheete.
40023005	"Boonoshi shuunoo bullin asho beeggemmoyich baach shuunaheete. Ebich boonoshi baroonaa boonoshi kishoonooch boonoshi cuyaa beeti Yeerichi callee kitaafoon gamichiyeete; boonoshi qoraddee caapoon genjiiheete;
40023006	gifiree kexoochaa ooga qeenon, Ayihudeena'o kicee beeti kexoochaa genja gabbaroon,
40023007	Gabiyee godoochaa shawooch qebanee diggiyoonaa 'Dojachocho!' getee ceeggeyoonon qaawiyeete.
40023008	"Tunaballi ittoshi 'Dojacho' getee ceeggeyaahotine! Ittoshich ikka dojacho baach bi beetoyich, ittoshi bulli ikka manoo ittoshine.
40023009	Wotta shimaayooch beeti ittoshi nihoo ikkoo bi tunatoyich, shawee toommooch beeto koninolla 'Nihoo' getiree ceeggaahotine!
40023010	Ittoshi Doono ikkoo, biyoo Kiristoosine; ebichi 'Doono' getee ceeggeyaahotine!
40023011	Ittoshiyee beshiyo ittoshi wochee bushoo tunabe.
40023012	Bi qelloon oogiimmo bulli giishemmone; bi qelloon giishiimmo bulli oogemmone" iye.
40023013	"Hini ittoshi maacoon xalloo shaahii beeti Muusichi callee dojachina'onaa Fariseena'onote! Ittoshich woowo! Asho shimaaji taatittineech bi giyaachemmoyich kelloon hicciyotine. Ittoshi qelloona giyaachotine; giya qaawii beetina'oyichoo bajiyotine.
40023014	[Hini ittoshi maacoon xalloo shaahii beeti Muusichi callee dojachina'onaa Fariseena'onote! Ittoshich woowo! Xuumeena'ochi kexon tiichiibee ittoshi shuunoon qeroyich corooton geechii geenjiihotine. Ebich Yeeri besha shattii giiriti nalloon ittoshi toommooch kindiiyemmone.]
40023015	"Hini ittoshi maacoon xalloo shaahii beeti Muusichi callee dojachina'onaa Fariseena'onote! Ittoshich woowo! Ikka uroon ittoshi waan wochoyich baharoonaa shawoonon guuddiyotine. Ashoon ittoshi danatoyee gub ittoshi toommooch kindemmoyee besha shiwaree qaaqqee nalloon bi toommooch kindiihotine.
40023016	"Hini aaf doogeena'on yaabii beeti aaf doogeena'ote! ittoshich woowo! 'Asho "Yaafee kexona!" iqqi bi woga gaata, 'Amolla tunataachemmone; tunatee "Yaafee Kechi aachoona!" iqqi bi woga gaata, wogo biin yechemmone' iyotine.
40023017	Hini wolla ulleena'ote! Aachoonaa ara aachoon yaafii beeti yaafee kexonoochee aabi beshiye?
40023018	Wotta ittoshi 'Asho "Deejee gudoona!" iqqi bi woga gaata, amolla tunataachemmone; tunaballi "Deejee gudee toommooch beeti deejoona!" iqqi bi woga gaata, wogo biin yechemmone' iyotine.
40023019	Hini aaf doogeena'ote! Deejoonaa deejoon yaafii beeti deejee gudoonoochee aabine besho?
40023020	Illa 'Deejee gudoona!' iqqi wogaa beeto, deejee gudoonaa bi toommooch beeti deejoo bullina wogatone.
40023021	'Yaafee kexona!' iqqi wogaa beeto, yaafee kexonaa bi maacooch beeti Yeerina wogatone.
40023022	'Shimaayoona!' iqqi wogaa beeto, Yeerichi taatee qeenonaa bi toommooch kotati Yeerina wogatone.
40023023	"Hini ittoshi maacoon xalloo shaahii beeti Muusichi callee dojachina'onaa Fariseena'onote! Ittoshich woowo! Kefoo, aa'aafoonaa kamunonoochee aashira kishoochee ikka kishoon Yeerich kichiyotine; eboshin qaji bedaachotine; tunaballi callee daggooch beeti magga mooyon qajitotine; eboyoo tachii nalloo, ashich ariqqaqqi maaroo, gibaneeto tunoone; eboshin tuniyoo ittoshich qaawii beetone; tunaballi tuniyaachotine.
40023024	Hini ashoon yaabii beeti aaf doogeena'ote! 'Noon ee'iiyemmone' iqqi ittoshi uyoochee shunneen teegiyotine; tunaballi magga Yeerichi calloon shaaddahotine.
40023025	"Hini ittoshi maacoon xalloo shaahii beeti Muusichi callee dojachina'onaa Fariseena'onote! Ittoshich woowo! Xoofoonaa shaatoonochi qeddoon machiyotine; tunaballi boonoshi maacooch ittoshi shuunati bogoonaa hiriggoona arooch ceennitone.
40023026	Hini aaf dooga Farisoocho! Shiichiree maacichon mayi xalliibe! Maachichoo tookki xallemmone.
40023027	"Hini ittoshi maacoon xalloo shaahii beeti Muusichi callee dojachina'onaa Fariseena'onote! Ittoshich woowo! Maachi maashee opee toommooch hagee booroona dikkeeqqi boonoshi mallatateenolla, boonoshi maacooch qititi asheena'ochi shaawishonaa ee'a mooyona ceenniti maashee opee toommeexi kexina'on shaaho ittoshine.
40023028	Ebiyee ittoshi wotta maaxoochaa ashich cadiqo shaahii bekkahotine; tunaballi ittoshi maacooch mulloon xalloo shaahiyoonaa gondoonon ceechiyotine" iye.
40023029	"Hini ittoshi maacoon xalloo shaahii beeti Muusichi callee dojachina'onaa Fariseena'onote! Ittoshich woowo! Keemachina'o duukkati maashee opee toommooch kexon haggiyotine; cadiqeena'ochi maashee opee toommeexi hawulitoonoo mallatiihotine.
40023030	Wotta 'No qaabbachina'ochi yemeenooba no beeto gaata, keemachina'on wuxitina'ona tookki ikkotataachesho noone' iyotine.
40023031	Ishi gaata, keemachina'on wuxitina'ochi bushiishoo ittoshi tunoon ittoshi qelloona miixaa beetotine.
40023032	Ittoshi wotta ittoshi qaabbachina'ochi axaaxee xoofooch ceechiyotine.
40023033	"Hini dingareena'ote! Hini xekarechi bushiisheena'ote! Yeeri nallemmi shiwaree qaaqqoochee aabichiree muriccehotine?
40023034	Ebich keemachina'onaa Yeerichi ariyoona ceenniti asheena'onon, ta mishiraachee dojachina'onoo ittoshi waan wocha daachiiyemmo taane. Boonoshi daggoochee ikkikkeena'on wuxemmo ittoshine; ikkikkeena'on yooddemmo ittoshine; boonoshi daggoochee ikkikkeena'on ittoshi kicee beeti kexoochaa arangoona xoobiree katamoochee katamooch yookkemmo ittoshine.
40023035	Ebich cadiqo tunati Abeelichi damoochee tiijiqqi, yaafee kexonaa deejee gudee gutta daggoochaa ittoshi wuxiti Baraakiyaasichi bushoo Zakaariyaasichi damooch beddaahee, shawee toommooch ufati cadiqeena'o bullichi damee naboona echeeyemmo ittoshine.
40023036	Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; ebi bullichi nalloo hini shiijaroo toommooch kindemmone" iye.
40023037	Daakkiqqi Yesuusi ishichiye:- "Hini Yerusalemi asheena'ote! Keemachina'on wuxii beetina'ote! ittoshi waan wocheetina'on xaqqoona yexxii wuxii beetina'ote! Baakkee bi bushiishoon bi qoshee daggooch bi guufoomon, tawoo ittoshin ikkooch kicoyich ambicha kaalloon shunatote! Tunatee ittoshi qaawaano ittoshine.
40023038	Ebiyoche! Yeeri ittoshi yaafee kexon qayee, onoo tunaree shekiremmone.
40023039	Ittoshich gettoye; 'Doono Yeerichi shigoona waa beeto diireeto tunabe' ittoshi immi wottoon ebiyee damba taan beegaachemmo ittoshine" iye.
40024001	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi Yaafee Kexoochee kechiqqi hamma bi tiyiyee, bi dabbeena'o Yaafee Kechi xaqqee kexon biich bekkiyoyich bi waan giddaheete.
40024002	Tunatee biyoo wochiqqi, "Eboshi bullin beeggii beetotina? Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; hini xaqqeena'o hapiyaanoon keddeeree ebina beetaachemmina'one" iye.
40024003	Wotta Yesuusi Zayitee Michi Guudi toommooch kotaa bi beetee, bi dabbeena'o boonoshi ikketo bi waan giddaqqi, "Eke nooch gete! Hini mooyo bi tunemmo aataniye ? Ne womonaa yemeenee ciiroonon bekkiiyemmi mallatoo amashoone?" iqqi echaheete.
40024004	Yesuusi wochiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Asho koniyolla ittoshin bi muriciyaachemmoyich, ittoshi qelloon quyabote!
40024005	Ebiyoo meetina'o 'Taane Kiristoosi' getibee ta shigoona waaree meeti asheena'on muriciiyemmina'one.
40024006	Ginee koyoonaa ginee woroonon waayemmo ittoshine; tunatee keqqiyaahotine! Ebi tuno echataachemmone. Tunaballi yemeenee ciiro battiye.
40024007	Arooba ikka aagateexi asho bara aagateexi ashoona, ikka shaweexi taatoo bara shaweexi taatoona koyemmone; bari bara xaa'oochoo shaacoo giyemmone; shawee qewo tunemmone.
40024008	Ebi bulli bi bekkii beeto, bat xuuxee gimoniye.
40024009	"Arooba ittoshin xuuxiiyemmina'oyich beshiiree immemmina'one; wuxemmina'one; ta naboyich aagateena'o bulli ittoshin shixxemmina'one.
40024010	Arooba meetina'o taan nookkemmina'one; boonoshinaa boonoshina ikkoo ikkoon beshiiree immemmone; boonoshinaa boonoshina shixeeyemmina'one.
40024011	Meeti koota keemachina'o tiyemmina'one; meetina'onoo murciiyemmina'one.
40024012	Axaaxoo woddatee, meeti asheena'ochi shuno aqqemmone.
40024013	Tunatee ciirooch beddaahee manjiqqi kupphammo wodemmone.
40024014	Ashi yaroo bullich miixoo bi tunemmoyich hini Yeerichi taatittinee mishiraachee qaaro shawee toommo bulliich getteeyemmone; arooba yemeenee ciiro woyemmone" iye.
40024015	Yesuusi daakkiqqi ishichiye:- "Illa ebiyee aaf keemachi Daaneeli gettiti aalliyachi ee'acho yaafee xaa'ooch bi neexatee beeggemmo ittoshine. Ebiyooba shemmammo shalligibe.
40024016	Arooba Yihudee Shawooch beetina'o gepoo beetooch maxxabeete.
40024017	Kechi toommooch beeto 'Kindiree kexooch beeti ta qiicoon deebana' getiree giyaaye.
40024018	Goyee toommooch beeto 'Ta qoraddoon deebana' getiree gub wottaaye.
40024019	Arooba yeqqafachina'onaa bushoon xaachii beetina'onoyich woowo!
40024020	Tunaballi ittoshi gooyo yooyooba oohee Shambatooba bi tunataachemmoyich corootibote!
40024021	Arooba Yeeri shawoonaa shimaayoonon hallitoochee tiijiqqi hanaach beddaahee bekkataani, gubbich wotta bekkataachemmi giidachi xuuxo tunemmone.
40024022	Yeeri ebi ara aabeena'on bi qamichaan gaata, koniyolla wodoon hakkaacheshone; tunaballi bi kaaccitina'oyicha getiree ebi ara aabeena'on qamichemmone.
40024023	Arooba koniyolla ittoshichch 'Hini beege! Kiristoosi hiniich beetone' oohee ok ebiich beetone' bi geti gaata, ibariyaahotine!
40024024	'Taane Kiristoosi', wotta 'Taane keemacho' getibee murciiyemmina'o tiyemmina'one. Boonoshiyoo 'Yeeri kaaccitina'onolla muriciyoyich qiiccabone' getibee ooga mallatoonaa woriganikkiti mooyonon bekkiiyemmina'one; tunatee Yeeri kaaccitina'on murciyoon hakkaachemmina'one.
40024025	Illa ittoshich ishiichiqqa gettato taane.
40024026	"Illa arooba 'Ebiyoche! Barahoochiye' boonoshi geti gaata, kechahotine! 'Ebiyoche! Kechi gatoochiye' boonoshi geti gaata, ibariyaahotine!
40024027	Xeeyo aabi keyoochee xeejiqqi aabi gimooch beddaahee phaqqi bi bekkoomon, ashi bushoo ta womo ebiyoomon tunemmone.
40024028	Dubano beetooch qufeena'o (aakkeena'o) kiceeyemmina'one" iye.
40024029	Wotta Yesuusi ishichiye:- "Ebiyooba ebi ara xuuxoyee gub 'Aabe bekkach mandaremmine; aganeyoo aaxxataachemmine; xojaneena'o shimaayoochee hollemmina'one; shimaaji giideena'o shuuremmina'one.'
40024030	"Arooba ashi bushoo ta mallatoo shimaayoochaa bekkemmone; arooba shawooch beeti ashi yareena'o bulli 'Woowo!' gettemmina'one. Ashi bushoo ta, giidoonaa oogee yiiroona shimaaji quboona ta waatee beeggemmina'one.
40024031	Arooba ooga tiree qaaroona ta maraakeena'on wochemmo taane. Boonoshiyoo hamiree awudda kelloona aabi keyoochee aabi gimooch, shawee tuggooch beddaahee Yeeri kaaccitina'on kicemmina'one" iye.
40024032	"Wotta mallatoon balasee mixoochee beegote! Balasee mixo quummiqqi ato nacii (nocii) bi waaja gaata, arooba yooyo womon ariihotine!
40024033	Ebiyoomon wotta hini mooyina'o tunoon ittoshi beegiyooba ashi bushoo ta womo katinniqqi kelloch shaggito bi tunoon ariibote!
40024034	Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; hini mooyina'o bulli tunataanoon hini shiijaroo beshataachemmone.
40024035	Shawoonaa shimaayoona beshemmina'one; tunaballi ta qaaro bulli yemeenooch manjiree beeyemmone" iye.
40024036	Wotta Yesuusi ishichiye:- "Tunatee ara aaboonaa ara saatoonon nihoo Yeeriyee damba koniyolla arii beeto aalloone. Shimaaji maraakeena'o tunabeete, Yeerichi Busholla tunabe arii beeto aalloone.
40024037	Wonnee Noohi yemeenooba bi tunoomon, ashi bushoo ta womo ebiyoomon tunemmone.
40024038	Arooba aalliyee aacoyee aaf Noohi ooga marikabooch bi giyimmi aabee wottoon asheena'o maa uchiibee, shaaggii shaageebee beeheete.
40024039	Aalliyee aaco waaqqi asho bullin hidiqqi bi aalliimmi wottoon boonoshi ariyee qayoomon, ashi bushoo ta womo wotta ebiyoomon tunemmone.
40024040	Arooba gutta asheena'o goyooch beeyemmina'one; ikkoo yeshee hammemmone; ikkoo echemmone.
40024041	Gutta maacheena'o xaqqoon yiikka beeyemmina'one; ikkee yeshee hammemmine; ikkeyoo echemmine.
40024042	"Illa ittoshi Doono amee aabooba bi woyemmo gaata ariyaachotine. Ebich qaalliree quyabote!
40024043	Tunaballi ebin ariibote! Kechi Doono xumee ambicha saatooch gaayo womon bi ariito gaata, qaalliree quyeshone; bi kexonoo gaayona iijiyaacheshone.
40024044	Ebich ittoshi wotta qanniree beebote! Ashi bushoo ta ittoshi shalligaani xaa'ooch woyemmo taane" iye.
40024045	"Illa maayoon boonoshich qaawiimmi saatoona bi immemmoyich bi doono bi kechi asheena'ochi toommooch ukkuriiti gibaneeti mullachi wochee bushoo konine?
40024046	Bi doono waahee, bi shuunee toommooch beebee danammi wochee bushoo diireetone.
40024047	Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; biich beeto bullichi toommooch ukkuriiyemmone.
40024048	Tunatee gonda wochee bushoo bi tuna gaata 'Ta doono kaata wottataachemmone; yagemmone' iqqi bi mulloona bi gabi gaata,
40024049	aroochee biinoomi bi nuucheena'on yexxii bi beetee, mashachina'ona tookkii uchii maa bi beetee,
40024050	ara wochee bushoochi doono bi gabaani xaa'ooch woyemmone;
40024051	Biin ariqqaalli yexon yeshi yexxemmone; bi ixoonoo xummeena'ochi ixooch haddemmone. Aroochaa eefonaa gashee qaayona biich tunemmone" iye.
40025001	Daakkiqqi Yesuusi ishichiye:- "Ashi bushoo ta woyemmi aabooba shimaaji taatittine ebin shaahemmine; aashira gidiireena'o (giddiideena'o) boonoshi ceechoon ceechiqqi wo'ee kenoon giijiya kechiyeete.
40025002	Boonoshi daggoochee uucheena'o mullachina'o, uucheena'o mullaalleena'one.
40025003	mullaalleena'o boonoshi ceechoon yechiqqi tiyii boonoshi ceechoona tookkii bara ceechee zayiton yeshaanoon kechiyeete;
40025004	Tunatee mullachina'o boonoshi ceechoonaa wotta qulloona bara ceechee zayitonon yechiqqi kechiyeete.
40025005	Wo'ee keno yagitoyich, boonoshi bullin geephiro yeshee tokkataheete.
40025006	"Xumi gutta qellimooch 'Ebiyoche, wo'ee keno waa beetone; keyiree giijibote!' immi cookoon waayaheete.
40025007	"Aree gaata gidiireena'o tokkatoochee tiyiqqi boonoshi ceechoon qanniiheete.
40025008	Mullaalleena'o mullachina'on 'No ceechoo tahiya ii beetone; ebich ittoshi ceechee zayitoochee nooch imbote!' iyeete.
40025009	"Tunatee mullachina'o wochiqqi, 'Nooch beeti ceechee zayito noonnaa ittoshinoyich bedo bi qayi gaatoche? Ebiyee hamiree kemmii beetina'o waanee ittoshi qellich kemabote!' iyeete.
40025010	"Kemiya boonoshi hammiichee, wo'ee keno waahe. Qanniqqi beeti uucheena'o biinna tookkii gaaree kexooch giyiyeete; kello bekkach tuggeehe.
40025011	"Gub wotta echati uucha gidiireena'o waaqqi, 'Doonocho! Doonocho! Nooch qechibe!' iyeete.
40025012	"Tunatee wo'ee keno wochiqqi, 'Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; ta cir ittoshin ariyaano taane' iye.
40025013	"Illa ashi bushoo ta woyemmi aaboonaa saatoonon ariyaano ittoshine; ebich qanniree quyabote!" iye.
40025014	"Wotta shimaaji taatittine ebiyoomine; ikka uro bara shawooch hamma tiyiqqi bi wochee bushiisheena'on ceeggiqqi biich beeti bi gijoon boonoshich immiye.
40025015	Boonoshi hakkee wottoon boonoshi qelli qelloona qoodiqqi ikkoyich uucha huma birawoon, ikkoyichoo gutta huma birawoon, ikkoyichoo ikka huma birawoon immiichii bara shawooch tiyii hammiye.
40025016	Uucha huma birawoon deqqito daammii giixaqqi bara uucha huma birawoon shiijiye.
40025017	Wotta gutta huma birawoon deqqito ebiyoomon tuniiqqi bara gutta huma birawoon shiijiye.
40025018	Tunaballi ikka huma birawoon deqqito daammii opoon iijiqqi bi Doonochi gijoon duukkiye.
40025019	"Meeti aganoyee gub hini wochee bushiisheena'ochi doono wottaa waaqqi, 'Ta gijoon amoon tuniitotine?' iqqi echahe.
40025020	"Uuca huma birawoon deqqito giddaqqi bara uucha huma birawoona tookkii immiqqi tiyii, 'Ta doonocho! Uucha huma birawoon taach immato neene; and bara uucha humoon shiijito taane' iye.
40025021	"Doono 'Gaawiye; hini de'a gibaneeti wochee bushoocho! giishachoona ne gibaneetoyich, woddiiree neen ukkuriiyemmo taane. Ta emiroochee giyiree qoodeebe!' iye.
40025022	"Wotta gutta huma birawoon deqqito giddaqqi, 'Ta doonocho! Gutta huma birawoon taach immato neene; and bara gutta humoon shiijito taane' iye.
40025023	"Doono 'Gaawiye; hini de'a gibaneeti wochee bushoocho! Giishachoona ne gibaneetoyich, woddiiree neen ukkuriiyemmo taane. Ta emiroochee giyiree qoodeebe!' iye.
40025024	"IKka huma birawoon deqqito wotta giddaqqi, 'Ta doonocho! Ne shoohaanoochee qeccaa beeto, ne shacaanoochee macii beeti maac manjoo ne tunoon arii beeto taane.
40025025	Ebich shattaqqa ne waanee ta deqqati gijoon daammaa iijaqqa shawooch duukkahoye. Andoo ne gijoon neech wochiya deebato taane' iye.
40025026	"Doono wochiqqi ishichiye:- 'Hini gonda yeexara wochee bushoocho! Ta shoohaanoochee ta qecon, ta shacaanoochee ta macoon ariito neene.
40025027	Ishi gaata, ta gijoon giixachina'oyich amoyich imaachine? Tawoo waaqqa ta gijoon amoyich shimona tookkii de'aachote?' iye.
40025028	"Arooba doono bara wochee bushiisheena'oyich 'Andoo hini gijoon bi kishoochee tiijiree aashira huma birawachoyich imbote!
40025029	Beetoyich, biich beeti toommooch daakkiree immemmo taane; biichoo woddemmone; tunatee amolla aallo waanee biich beeti giishacheenolla tiijemmo taane.
40025030	Hini gaacaalli wochee bushoon maach mandarooch kichi dufote! Aroochaa eefonaa gashee qaayona tunemmone' iqqi gettiye" iye.
40025031	"Ashi bushoo ta, ta oogee yiiroona maraakeena'o bullina tookki waaree oogee yiiroo beeti ta taatee qeenooch kotemmo taane;
40025032	Aagatee asheena'o bulli ta aafooch kiceeyemmina'one. Qiddoo bageena'on emmisheena'ochi daggoochee bi baribariyoomon boonoshi bullin baribariiyemmo taane;
40025033	Bageena'on ta qanna bad, emmisheena'on ta yoocha bad neechemmo taane.
40025034	"Taatoo ta, qanna bad beetina'oyich ishichemmo taane; 'Hini ta nihoo diiritina'ote! Wobote! Yeeri shawoonaa shimaayoonon bi hallitoochee tiijiqqi ittoshich bi qanniiti taatittineech giyiree beebote!
40025035	Ta shaacatee, maanjito ittoshine; ta shachawatee, uchito ittoshine; dallaawaqqa ta waatee, iibbiito ittoshine;
40025036	Ta tubbatee, tajito ittoshine; ta biiyatee, cacheeto ittoshine; ta cuchatee, echato ittoshine' gettemmo taane.
40025037	"Arooba cadiqeena'o wochiree taach ishichemmina'one; 'No Doonocho! Ne shaacatee beeggaqqa aatooba maanjitone? Oohee ne hachawatee beeggaqqa aatooba uchitone?
40025038	Oohee dallaawoo ne tunatee beeggaqqa aatooba iibiitone? Oohee ne tubatee beeggaqqa aatooba tajitone?
40025039	Oohee ne biiyatee, oohee ne cuchatee beeggaqqa aatooba ne waan waatone?' gettemmina'one.
40025040	"Taatoo ta wochiree, 'Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; bulliyee desho tunati hini ta maneena'oochee ikkoyicholla ittoshi tuniito taach tuniyoomone' gettemmo taane.
40025041	"Arooba yoocha bad beetina'oyich ishichemmo taane; 'Hini upeetina'ote!Daabiloosinaa bi maraakeena'onoyich qanniti tahaani shiwaree qaaqqooch ta waanee hambote!
40025042	Ta shaacatee, maanjaano ittoshine; ta shachawatee, uchaano ittoshine;
40025043	dallaawaqqa ta waatee, taan iibbiyaano ittoshine; ta tubbatee, tajaano ittoshine; ta biiyatee, ta cuchatee, echataano ittoshine' gettemmo taane.
40025044	"Boonoshiyoo wochiree, 'Doonocho! Ne shaacatee, oohee ne shachawatee, oohee dallaawoo ne tunatee, oohee ne tubbatee, oohee ne biiyatee, oohee ne cuchatee, aatooba beeggaqqa neen degaano qajoone?' gettemmina'one.
40025045	"Arooba 'ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; bulliyee desho tunati eboshi daggoochee ikkoyicholla ittoshi tuniyee qayo taach tuniyee qayone' getiree wochemmo taane.
40025046	"Boonoshiyoo bulli yemeenee shiwarooch, cadiqeena'o wotta shimaaji taatittineech giyiree bulli yemeenoon beeyemmina'one" iye.
40026001	Yesuusi hini mooyina'o bullin gettii ciichiqqi tiyii, bi dabbeena'on
40026002	"Gutta qemoyee gub Beshee Baaroo bi tunemmon arii beeto ittoshine; ashi bushoo taan yoodiyoyich beshiiree immemmina'one" iye.
40026003	Arooba qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa shawee geeneena'ona Qeyaafi gettee beeti qeeshee guudoochi kakallee maac kiceeheete;
40026004	Yesuusin maroona yechiyoyich, wuxiyoyichoo echeeheete.
40026005	Tunatee "Hini baaree aaboona tunaaye; asheena'o kaaroon tiijemmina'one" iyeete.
40026006	Arooba Yesuusi Bitaana, qeddee shaddee biiyoon biiyaqqi woditi Simoonichi kexooch beehe.
40026007	Ara kexoochee biich maayo giddatee madee toommooch bi beetee, ikka ure elibaaxiroosi gettee beeti firiqaadee ceeni, aaxxoo tunati, gaawa cinnachi shittoon yechaqqa bi waan waahan. Waa firiqaadoon tiichaqqa ara shittoon Yesuusichi shimbooch ukkiyan.
40026008	Bi dabbeena'o ebin beeggiqqi kaaraheete; "Hini shitttoon cikkii bi duubii beeto amoyichiye?
40026009	Ebi shittto aaxxi gatiyoona kemee iriteetina'oyich amoyich immeyaache?" iyeete.
40026010	Yesuusiyoo hini boonoshi yibbaatoon ariiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Hini ureen amoyich iritii beetotine? Biyoo taach de'a shuunoon shuunatine.
40026011	Girachina'o bulli araddoon ittoshina tookkiiniye boonoshi beeto; tunatee ta bulli araddoon ittoshina tookki beetaachemmo taane.
40026012	Hini ure ta duukkeyaan beetee, shiichiqqa ta ashittinoon hini shitttoona huuttatine.
40026013	Andoo ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; asheena'o hini mishiraachoon boonoshi getimmi shawee toommo aabiicholla biin shalligoyich aree shuunaton wotta gettemmina'one" iye.
40026014	Ebiyee gub, aaraa gutta bi dabbeena'oochee ikkoo tunati Asqorootachi Yihudi, qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'o waan hammiqqi,
40026015	"Yesuusin ittoshich ta beshii immi gaata, taach amoon immehotine?" iqqi echahe. Boonoshiyoo shaasha xira birawoon biich immiyeete.
40026016	Aroobee saatoochee tiijiqqi "Yesuusin aabichiree beshii imbate?" iibee beshiiree bi immemmi holloon qaawii beehe.
40026017	Qara kochi baaree batti batti aabooba bi dabbeena'o Yesuus waan giddaqqi, "Beshee Baaree maayoon ne maayemmoyich aabiich no qanniyoon shunnanne?" iqqi echaheete.
40026018	Arooba Yesuusi "Katamooch hamiree ikkaati kexooch 'Dojacho "Ta taajee aabo shaggitone; ta dabbeena'ona tookki ne kexoochaa Beshee Baaroon baaremmo taane" itone' getote!" iye.
40026019	Aroochee bi dabbeena'o hammiqqi Yesuusi gettiton tuniiheete; Beshee Baaree maayoonoo qanniiheete.
40026020	Shawoo xumatee, Yesuusi aaraa gutta bi dabbeena'ona tookkii madoo giddatee maaya kotahe.
40026021	Maa boonoshi beetee, "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; ittoshi daggoochee ikkoo taan beshiiree immemmone" iye.
40026022	Ebi mooyona ayiniqqi boonoshi qelli qelloona "Ta Doonocho! Ta tunehota?" iqqi Yesuusin echooch giyiyeete.
40026023	Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Taan beshiiree immemmo taanna tookkii ikka shaatooch dukkaa beetone.
40026024	Ashi bushoo ta, Yaafa Macaafooch bi kooreetoomon, qitaanoon echataachemmo taane; tunaballi ashi bushoo taan beshiiree immemmi ara uroyich woowo! Ara uro shiijataanoon bi dooggito gaata, biich gaawiye" iye.
40026025	Beshii immemmi Yihudi wochiqqi, "Dojachocho! Ta tunehota?" iqqi echahe. Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Ne noonoona gettatine" iye.
40026026	Aree hillooch boonoshi maa beetee, Yesuusi koshon tiijiqqi Yeerin gallatahe; tiichiqqi bi dabbeena'oyich imiibee, "Ha'ote, mamote! Hini ta meenone" iye.
40026027	Wotta woyinee uyo yechiti xoofoon tiijii Yeerin gallataqqi boonoshich immiye; boonoshichoo ishichiye:- "Bulla ebiichee uyote!
40026028	Ebi meetina'ochi axaaxoon maaroyich ufemmi ta damoo Yeeri neechemmi wogee mallatoone.
40026029	Andoo ittoshich gettoye; ta nihoochi taatittineecha ittoshina tookki hini woyinee aafoochee androon ta uchemmi aabee wottoon hini woyinee uyoochee guttinnoon uyaachemmo taane" iye.
40026030	Boonoshiyoo Yeerichi shoddoon boonoshi shoddatoyee gub tiyiqqi, Zayitee Michi Guudooch kechiqqi hammiyeete.
40026031	Arooba Yesuusi bi dabbeena'oyich ishichiye:- " 'Yeeri "Qiddoon xoobbemmo taane; bageena'o shacemmina'one" iqqi gettitone' gettee kooreetone; ebichi hanaach xum ittoshi bulli taan qajemmo ittoshine.
40026032	Tunaballi qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee Yeeri taan bi kichitoyee gub, ittoshiyee shiichiree Galiilla hammemmo taane" iye.
40026033	Arooba Pheexiroosi tiyiqqi, "Bareena'o bulli neen boonoshi qayi gaatolla, ta neen cir qayaache" iye.
40026034	Yesuusi "Ibaroon neech gettoye; hanaach xum baakkoo kuukkaahee, keeja kaalloon taan nookkemmo neene" iye.
40026035	Pheexiroosi wochiqqi, "Qitolla bi tuna gaata, neenna tookki qitehalli cir neen nookkataache" iye. Echati bi dabbeena'o bulli ebiyoomon gettiyeete.
40026036	Arooba Yesuusi bi dabbeena'ona tookkii Getesemaana hammiye. Yesuusi boonoshin "Ta ok ebiich hamiree corootibana; ittoshi hiniich beebote!" iye.
40026037	Pheexiroosinaa Yabidoosichi gutta bushiisheena'onon dabbiiqqi hammiye. Bi kasho keyaano giyaano yullahe.
40026038	Boonoshin "Ta kashe ayinoona xuuxaqqa kech beddatine. Hiniich beebote! Tokkataayi kuppharee taanna tookki quyabote!" iye.
40026039	Boonoshi aafoochee giishachoon wokkiqqi hammiye. Baroona gufaachii corootiibee, "Ta nihoocho! Tunesho gaata, hini xuuxee xoofoon (Xuyoon) ta waanee wokkiibe! Tunatee ne daaggoo tunaballi, ta daaggoo tunaaye" iye.
40026040	Aroochee keeja bi dabbeena'o waan wottaqqi bi waahee, tokkataqqi beetina'on danahe. Pheexiroosinoo "Illa taanna tookkii ikka saatoonolla tokkatataanoon kupphaqqi quyoon hakkaachotina?
40026041	Gondoochi nihoo dachooch ittoshi giyaachemmoyich, kuppharee quyabote! Corootibote! Asho bi mulloona de'oon shuunoyich gabii beetone; tunatee meenoyich yiingoo aalloone" iye.
40026042	Wotta guttinnoon hammiqqi corootiibee, "Ta nihoocho! Hini xuuxee xoofoon (Xuyoon) uyo taach bi qaawii gaata, ne daaggoo tunabe" iye.
40026043	Guttinnoon wottaqqi bi waahee, geepphiroona daadeeqqi tokkataa boonoshi beetee danahe.
40026044	Wotta boonoshi waanee qajii hammiqqi, keejinnoon wochiqqi shiichii bi corootitoomon corootiye.
40026045	Aroochee bi dabbeena'o waan wottaa waaqqi, "Andoo bat tokkataa kashaqqiniya ittoshi beeto? And saato bedditone; ashi bushoo taan axaaxachina'oyich beshiiree immemmina'one.
40026046	Tibote! Hambone. Andoo taan beshiiree immemmo shaggitone" iye.
40026047	Yesuusi ishin yibbaataa bi beetee, bekkach aaraa gutteexi ikkoo Yihudi shaggiye. Biinna tookkii dofee asheena'o sheefoonaa yeelloonon yechiqqi waaheete. Boonoshiyoo qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa shawee geeneena'ona waanee wochatee waatina'one.
40026048	Ebiyee aaf "Yesuusin beshiiree imbana" ito, boonoshich ishichiqqi mallatoon immiye; "Ittoshi yechemmo, diggiiqqa ta shummahoniye; ebi ittoshich mallatoo tunabe. Aroon yeshiree daambote!" iye.
40026049	Yihudi bekkach Yesuusi waan giddaqqi, "Dojachocho! Diggoo neech tunabe" iqqi yechii shummiye.
40026050	Yesuusiyoo "Ta xiboocho! Amee mooyoyich waanne?" iye. Arooba Yihudi deebiti asheena'o giddaqqi Yesuusin yechiyeete.
40026051	Bekkach Yesuusina tookkii beetina'ochi daggoochee ikkoo bi sheefoon kaacciqqi qeeshee guudoochi guunon wuxiya bi daachiito uroochi waamoon karii kindiihe.
40026052	Arooba Yesuusi biich ishichiye:- "Sheefoon kaaccii beetina'o bulli sheefoona qitemmina'one; ebich ne sheefoon bi gonanooch wochibe!
40026053	Ebiyoomo gaata, ta nihoon qollo taan mawemmo neech shaahii beeta? Ta qollatee, bekkach aaraa gutta cifirachi maraakeena'oyee beshoon taach deejeshone.
40026054	Ishi gaata, ebiyee aaf Yaafa Macaafoochaa 'Ebin tunemmone' getteeto aabichiree ceennehe?" iye.
40026055	Arooba Yesuusi dofee asheena'oyich "Bokkoon yeshoomon taan yecha sheefoonaa yeelloonon yechiqqi waahotina? Yaafee Kexooch bulli araddoon kotaqqa dojii ta beehooba, taan yeshaano ittoshine.
40026056	Tunaballi ebi bulli bi tunato, keemachina'o kooriti Yaafa Macaafee qaaro bi ceenemmoyichiye" iye. Arooba bi dabbeena'o bulli biin dupiichii aallaheete.
40026057	Aroochee Yesuusin yechitina'o Muusichi callee dojachina'onaa shawee geeneena'ona kiceeti qeeshee guudo Qeyaaf waan daammiyeete.
40026058	Arooba Pheexiroosi qeeshee guudoochi kakallooch beddaahee wokkiibee biin dabbiye. "Moochi tuggoon beegana" iqqi gayee maac giyiqqi kellachina'ona tookkii kotahe.
40026059	Arooba qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa kaacceeti Ayihudee nallachina'o bullina Yesuusin wuxiiya bi toommooch koota miixeena'on qaawiyeete;
40026060	Tunaballi koota miixeena'o boonoshi giddateenolla, biin wuxiiyemmi miixoon miixemmina'on danataaneena'one. Ciiroochaa gutta miixeena'o giddaqqi,
40026061	"Hini uro 'Yeerichi Yaafee kexon hapiichi keeja qemona baroon hagon hakkiyoye' itone" iyeete.
40026062	Aree hillooch qeeshee guudo tiyiqqi Yesuusin "Ebi ne toommooch miixaa beetina'oyich noonoo wochaachemmo neena?" iqqi echahe.
40026063	Tunatee Yesuusi cikkii qajiye. Wotta qeeshee guudo "Ne Yeerichi Bushoo Kiristoosi ne gaata, nooch ne gettemmoyich Beeyachi Yeerina neen yechato taane" iye.
40026064	Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Ne gettato neene; tunaballi ittoshich gettoye; ebiyee damba ashi bushoo ta, giidachi Yeerichi qanna bad ta kotatee, wotta shimaaji qubee toommoochoo kotaree ta waatee beeggemmo ittoshine" iye.
40026065	Arooba qeeshee guudo bi tahoon getoochaa keexxiqqi, "Yeerin naaggitone; ebiyee damba amee miixoo qaawiihe? Bi naagoon gaata, waayato ittoshine.
40026066	Illa ama getiree nallehotine?" iqqi echahe. Boonoshiyoo "Qita beddiye" iqqi wochiyeete.
40026067	Arooba bi aafooch cuddiyeete; biinoo tukaheete; bareena'o wotta tapaabee,
40026068	"Kiristooso! Neen tapato koni gaata, eke nooch gete!" iyeete.
40026069	Pheexiroosi kechi maach gayee maac kotaa bi beetee, ikka shaajatee bi waan giddaqqa, "Ne wotta Galiillachi Yesuusina tookkii beeto ne toona?" iyan.
40026070	Tunatee Pheexiroosi wochiqqi, "Ne gettaa beeton ariyaache" iqqi bullichi aafooch nookkahe.
40026071	Ishichiqqi tiyii kakallee kelloch bi kechiyee, bara shaajatee ciinnaqqa arooch beetina'oyich "Hini uro wotta Naazireetachi Yesuusina tookkii beetone" iyan.
40026072	Pheexiroosiyoo wogaabee, "Ara uroon ariyaano taane" iqqi guttinnoon nookkahe.
40026073	Giishachoon yiccimiqqi arooch neexaa beetina'o bi waan giddaqqi, "Ne yibbaatoona arichaa beetine; ibaroon ne wotta boonoshi daggeexo neene" iyeete.
40026074	Arooba Pheexiroosi "Ara uroon ariyaano taane" iqqi bi kashoon upii wogahe. Bekkach baakkoo kuukkiye.
40026075	Pheexiroosi "Baakkoo kuukkaahee, keeja kaalloon taan nookkemmo neene" Yesuusi iti qaaroon gabiqqi maaxooch kechii tiittaa eepiye.
40027001	Dechra maaddoona qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa shawee geeneena'ona bulli Yesuusin wuxoyich echeeheete.
40027002	Cuchiqqi daammii Yihudee iraashoo Phelaaxoosich beshiiqqi immiyeete.
40027003	Arooba Yesuusin beshiiqqi immiti Yihudi Yesuusichi toommooch kinditi qitee nalloon beeggiqqi ayiniye; shaasha xira birawoon qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa shawee geeneena'onoyich wochiqqi tiyii,
40027004	"Xalla uroon beshiiqqa ta immatoyich, xuqqato taane" iye. Boonoshiyoo "Noon amo qaaqqiye? Aroo ne qelli mooyone" iyeete.
40027005	Arooba Yihudi birawoon yaafee kexooch dupiichii kechii hammii bi kishoona taaqqa qitiye.
40027006	Aroyee gub qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'o birawoon tiijiqqi, "Kashee gatiyoone; ebichi no calloo Yaafee Kechi gijee daggooch no baccemmoyich daaggaache" iyeete.
40027007	Echeeqqi nuuqqa hachachochi shawoon kemaqqi dallaaweena'oyich maashoon tuniiheete.
40027008	Ebich ara shawoo hanaach beddaahee "Damee shawoo" getteehe.
40027009	Arooba keemachi Erimiyaasi gettiti keemo ceenniye; ebiyoo "Isra'eelee bushiisheena'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o gatiyoo boonoshi yexxiti shaasha xira birawoon daammiyeete;
40027010	Doono Yeeri taach gettitoomon, ara gijoona nuuqqa hachachochi shawoon kemaheete" bi itone.
40027011	Arooba Yesuusi Yihudee iraashoochi aafooch neexahe; Yihudee iraashoo "Ne Ayihudeena'ochi taatoo neena?" iqqi echahe. Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Newolla gettaa beetine" iye.
40027012	Qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa shawee geeneena'ona bi toommooch taggoon yaaqqiyeete; Yesuusi minna kanna getaanoon qajiye.
40027013	Arooba Yihudee iraashoo Phelaaxoosi tiyiqqi, "Ambicha taggoon ne toommooch boonoshi taggaa beeto gaata waayataachine?" iqqi echahe.
40027014	Iraashoo oogichiqqi woriganammi wottoon minna kanna getaanoon cikkii qajiye.
40027015	Wotta Yihudee iraashoo nati natona hini baaree aabooba asheena'o "Biishe!" iqqi qollammi ikka uroon cuchaqqi beetina'ochi daggoochee biich doyoo biich beetone. Arooba Baribaasi gettee beeti ikka arichati uro cuchaqqi beehe. Phelaaxoosi Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o Yesuusin qanaataqqi beshii boonoshi imon bi ariitoyich dofee asheena'o kiceeqqi beetee tiyiqqi, "Baribaasinashi oohee Kiristoosi gettee beeti Yesuusin biishate? Aabi biicheyoon shunniyotine?" iqqi echahe. Aroochee Phelaaxoosi nallee gabbarooch kotaqqi bi beetee, bi mechee "Yichi xum gumona hini ara uroon beeggaqqa bi naboona oogichiqqa xuuxoon beeggati taane; ebichi ebi xalla uroochi toommooch gondoon shuuniyaahine!" iqqa bi keno waan wochoon daachiihan.
40027020	Tunaballi qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa shawee geeneena'ona "Baribaasi biichabe; Yesuusi qitibe" getiree boonoshi qollemmoyich dofee asheena'on kocciyeete.
40027021	Aree hillooch iraashoo wochinnoon echaqqi, "Hini gutteena'oochee aabin ta biishon shunniyotine?" iye. Boonoshiyoo "Baribaasin biishe!" iyeete.
40027022	Phelaaxoosi "Illa hini Kiristoosi gettee beeti Yesuusin aabichibate?" iye. Boonoshi bulli wochiqqi, "Yoode!" iyeete.
40027023	Yihudee iraashoo Phelaaxoosi "Amoyichiye? Bi gondochi amoone?" iqqi echahe. Tunatee boonoshi wochiqqi, "Yoode!" iqqi caagaa cangachaheete.
40027024	Phelaaxoosiyoo ebin beeggiqqi, "Cookee meetoyee damba danemmi mooyo aalloone" iqqi tiyii, "Hini uroochi qitoona ta echeyaachemmo taane; ebi ittoshi shuunoone" iqqi dofee asheena'ochi aafoochaa aacon tiijiqqi bi kishoon machahe.
40027025	Asheena'o bulli wochiqqi, "Bi kashee mangoo noonnaa no bushiishoonochi toommooch bede" iyeete.
40027026	Arooba Phelaaxoosi Baribaasin biichiichii Yesuusin arangoona bi xoobbiitoyee gub, "Yoodote!" iqqi beshii immiye.
40027027	Arooba iraashoochi ginee naayina'o Yesuusin iraashoochi kakallee maac daammiyeete. Echati boonoshi guuphina'o bullin bi beetooch ceeggii kiciyeete.
40027028	Bi qoraddoon shottiichii ceella tahoon tajiyeete;
40027029	Angixonoo gengiqqi bi qellooch taatee mallatoon tunati gubbichoon ukiiheete; bi qanna kishooch shimaree gumboon yechiiheete; bi aafooch gurataqqi, "Ayihudeena'ochi taatoocho! ne taatittino manjibe!" iibee coonaheete; cudonoo bi toommooch cuddiyeete;
40027030	shimaree gumboon bi kishoochee deqqiqqi aroona bi qelloon xoobbiyeete.
40027031	Eechiqqi boonoshi coonatoyee gub boonoshi tajiti ceella tahoon shoottiichii, biichon tajiqqi yoodoyich daammiyeete.
40027032	Yerusalemee boonoshi kechiyee, Simooni gettee beeti Qereenachi uroona danaheete; biinoo "Yesuusichi masqaloon shaage!" iqqi yechiyeete.
40027033	"Golgooti" getee ceeggee beeti xaa'ooch shaggiyeete; "Golgooti" geto "Qellee koofee xaa'oo" getone.
40027034	Aroochaa miraaroo bacceeti woyinee uyoon "uye!" iqqi Yesuusich immiyeete; tunaballi napphaqqi tiyii, "Uyaache" iqqi qajiye.
40027035	Aree hillooch masqalee toommooch xuuree xogoona biin xogiqqi yooddiyeete. Ebiyee gub bi tahoon ixoon kuxxiqqi qoodeeheete.
40027036	Aroochee kotaqqi biin quyaa beeheete.
40027037	"Hini Yesuusi Ayihudeena'ochi taatoone" getee kooreeti taggee mallatoon biyee took kichiqqi xogiyeete.
40027038	Arooba biinna tookkii gutta bokkeena'on ikkoon bi qanna bad, ikkoonoo bi yoocha bad yooddiyeete.
40027039	Aroona beshaa beeti gommachina'o boonoshi qelloon shuurikkiibee Yesuusin naagaheete;
40027040	"Yaafee Kexon hapiichi wochiree keeja qemona haggeshocho! Eke ne qelloon wodiibe! Yeerichi Bushoo ne gaata, masqalee toommoochee kindibe!" iyeete.
40027041	Ebiyee wotta qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'o Muusichi callee dojachina'onaa geeneena'ona tookkii coonaabee ishichiyeete:-
40027042	"Bareena'on wodiito bi qelloon wodiyoo mawiiha? Isra'eelee taatoo bi gaata, eke and masqaloochee kindibe. Bi kindi gaata, ibariiyemmo noone.
40027043	'Yeeri taan wodiiyemmone' itone; wotta 'Yeerichi Bushoo taane' itone. Illa Yeeri biin bi shuni gaata, and biin wodiibe" iyeete.
40027044	Arooba biinna tookkii yooddeeti bokkeena'o wotta asheena'o naagatoomon naagaheete.
40027045	Aree hillooch haree shirita saatoochee tiijiqqi yiixiya saato beddimmi wottoon shawoo bulli mandarahe.
40027046	Yiixiya saato ceenee, Yesuusi "Eloohe! Eloohe! Laamaa sabaqitaani?" iqqi bi qaaroon oogichiqqi cookiye. Ishi geto "Ta Nuggushoocho! Ta Nuggushoocho! Akkiya taan qajane?" getone.
40027047	Aree gaata arooch neexaqqi beetina'oochee ikkikkeena'o waayaqqi, "Eliyaasin ceeggii beetoche!" iyeete.
40027048	Bekkach ara asheena'oochee ikkoo wocii hammii, isiponjoona kiikkara uyoon hacciqqi deebii genja shimaree gumboona bi noonooch giddiihe.
40027049	Tunatee bareena'o "Eke qaye! Eliyaasi waa biin bi wodiiyemmo gaata, beegone" iyeete.
40027050	Aree hillooch Yesuusi wochinnoon oogichiqqi bi cookitoyee gub bi kasho abbatahe.
40027051	Arooba Yaafee Kexooch tipeeti maccillaatoo dambee tiijiqqi desh beddaahee gutta bad kapheeqqi keexaa kechiye; shawee qewahan; xaqqeena'oo gaahaheete;
40027052	maashee opeena'o qecheeheete; Yeerichi asheena'oochee meetina'o kashacho tunaqqi qitii boonoshi duukkatoochee kechiyeete;
40027053	maashee opeena'oochee kechiqqi yaafee katamoo Yerusalem hammii giyiqqi meeti asheena'oyich bekkaheete. Ebi tunato, Yesuusi qitii bi duukkatoochee bi kechitoyee gubbiye.
40027054	Aree gaata balla ginee iraashoonaa biinna tookkii Yesuusin quyaa beetina'ona shawee qewoonaa tunati mooyonon beeggiqqi, "Ibaroon hini uro Yeerichi Bushoone" iqqi oogichii shataheete.
40027055	Yesuusin degoyich Galiilee Shawoochee biin dabbiti wodda genneena'o arooch wokkii neexaachii ciinnii beeheete.
40027056	Boonoshi daggooch Magidalachi Maariyami, Yaaqoobinaa Yoseefinochi indee Maariyami, Yabidoosichi mechee eboshi beetina'one.
40027057	Aroochee woyimikkoo wottaqqi shawoo xumatee, Yooseefi gettee beeti gaannacho Arimaati Katamoochee waahe; biyoo wotta Yesuusichi dabboone.
40027058	Arooba Yihudee iraashoo Phelaaxoosichi aafooch giddaqqi, "Yesuusichi cahoon taach imbe!" iqqi qollahe. Phelaaxoosiyoo bi ginachon "Imbe!" iqqi gettiye.
40027059	Ebina Yooseefi Yesuusichi cahoon daammiqqi andra kaafanoona kaapiye;
40027060	xaqqee guudoochee bi qellich gooshiiqqi bi shuuniiti opooch daammii arooch duukkiye. Wotta ooga xaqqoon gedirikkiqqi ara opee kelloon hicciichii hammiye.
40027061	Arooba Magidalachi Maariyaminaa guttinnee Maariyamina opee ciinooch kotaqqi beeheete.
40027062	Dechra (dechi hara) Ayihudeena'ochi qanniyee aabo tunatoyee gub, qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa Fariseena'ona Phelaaxoos waan kiceeheete;
40027063	Kiceeqqi ishichiyeete:- "Doonocho! Ara ashoon dawishoona muriciiyacho qitaanoon beebee, 'Keeja qemoyee gub qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee Yeeri taan kichemmone' bi iton shalligito noone.
40027064	Illa bi dabbeena'o waaree bi cahoon boonoshi gaayaachemmoyich, 'Qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee Yeeri biin kichitone' getiree boonoshi getaachemmoyich, 'opo keeja qemooch beddaahee quyeebe' getiree gete! Ebi tuno qayi gaata, gubbi kooto aafichoyee beshoon gondemmone" iyeete.
40027065	Phelaaxoosi "Kellachina'on daami neechibote! Hamiree ittoshi hakkimmi wottoon quyiibote!" iye.
40027066	Ebich kellachina'on daammiqqi opee kello keppheeti xaqqooch mallatoon geddiqqi manjii hicciqqii opoon quyiiheete.
40028001	Shambatoo beshatoyee gub batti batti shabaatee aabo, ebiyoo oogi shambatee maaddoona aabe kechahee, Magidalachi Maariyaminaa guttinnee Maariyamina opoon beegga maasho beetooch hammiyeete.
40028002	Diqqoona oogati shawee qewo tunahe; Doono Yeerichi maraakoo shimaayoochee kindiqqi xaqqoon maashee opee kellochee gedirikkiqqi aree toommooch kotahe.
40028003	Maraakoochi aafo xeeyoochoomon phaqqi beeto, bi tahati taho kecho naccoomon naccoone.
40028004	Maashee opoon quyaa beeti ginachina'o maraakoon beeggiqqi oogichii boonoshi keqqitoyich qewaheete; qititi ashoonoo shaahiyeete.
40028005	Hini ara maraakoo genneena'oyich ishichiye:- "Haanoshite! Shattaahotine! Yoodee qititi Yesuusin ittoshi qaawoon arii beeto taane.
40028006	Bi noonoona bi gettitoomon Yeeri qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee biin kichitone; hiniich aalloone. Bi cahoo qeyiti xaa'oon waaree beegote!
40028007	Andoo kaata hiniichee hamiree, 'Qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee Yeeri biin kichitone; ebiyoche, Galiilla ittoshiyee shiichiree hammemmone; aroochaa biin beeggemmo ittoshine' getiree bi dabbeena'oyich getote! Ta waato ebin gettaniye" iye.
40028008	Genneena'oo boonoshi shattitee, oogichii emiriibee afaafinoona opee xaa'oochee tiyiqqi Yesuusi dabbeena'oyich getta wocaheete.
40028009	Wocona hammii boonoshi beetee, diqqoona Yesuusi boonoshina danaqqi boonoshin diggiihe. Boonoshiyoo giddaa bi baatoon yechiqqi biich goyinnaheete.
40028010	Aroochee Yesuusi "Shattaahotine! Hamiree, 'Galiila beshabote!' getiree ta maneena'oyich getote! Aroochaa taan beeggemmina'one" iye.
40028011	Genneena'o hamooch boonoshi beetee, opoon quyaa beeti ginachina'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o Yerusalem waaqqi tunato bullin qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'oyich gettiyeete.
40028012	Boonoshiyoo shawee geeneena'ona tookkii kicee echeeqqi ginee naayina'oyich wodda gijoon immiqqi,
40028013	" 'Tokkatooch no beetee, bi dabbeena'o xumoona waaqqi gaajii daammiyeete' getote!
40028014	Ishi iraashoo Phelaaxoosich waayee gaata, gondo ittoshicho tunee qayon no gettemmo noone; ittoshi toommooch iritoo waataachemmoyich tuniiyemmo noone" iyeete.
40028015	Ginachina'oo gijoon deqqiqqi qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa shawee geeneena'ona gettiti mooyo bullin ceechiyeete. Ebiyoo Ayihudeena'o waan hanaach beddaahee yibbaatee beetone.
40028016	Ebiyee gub, aaraa ikka Yesuusichi dabbeena'o bi gettiti Galiilee Shawooch beeti gepooch hammiyeete.
40028017	Aroochaa biin beeggiqqi goyinnaheete; tunaballi boonoshi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o "Hini Yesuusi toonoone" iqqi shaammiyeete.
40028018	Yesuusi boonoshi waan giddaqqi boonoshich ishichii gettiye:- "Yeeri shawoonaa shimaayoonooch beetina'o bullichi toommooch taan ukkuriitone.
40028019	Illa tiyiree hambote! Aagateena'o bulliich beetina'on nihoo Yeeri, bushoo taannaa Yaafa Ayaanoonochi shigoona aacona afaalloonaa 'Tuniibote!' iqqa ittoshich ta gettato bullin boonoshich dojoona ta dabbeena'on tuniibote! Illa yemeenee ciirooch beddaahee bulli araddoon ta ittoshina tookkii beeto taane" iye.
41001001	Yeerichi Bushoo Yesuus Kiristoosichon miixaa beeti mishiraachee qaaro hinine.
41001002	Shiichiqqi Yeeri wochati keemachi Isiyaasi ishichiye:- "Yeeri 'Ebiyoche! Ne gommon qaxemmi ta wocheyachon neyee shiichiree daachiiyemmo taane' itone.
41001003	Ebiyoo 'Doonochi gommon qanniibote! Bi woratoonoo kaachi qaxabote!' iibee barahoochaa cookii beeti ashi qaaro" iqqi kooritone.
41001004	Ebich Aacona Afaallachi Yowannisi barahoochaa aacona afaalliibee, "Ittoshi axaaxee gommoochee Yeer waan wottaree aacona afaalleebote! Yeeriyoo ittoshi axaaxoon maaremmone" iqqi dojiibee waahe.
41001005	Arooba Yihudee Shawoonaa Yerusaleminooch beeti aasheena'o bi waan conjiqqi waa beeheete; boonoshi axaaxoon aannii boonoshi miixatee, Yowannisi boonoshin Yooridanoosi Aacona afaallii beehe.
41001006	Biyoo gaallee eexoochee shipeeti qoraddoon tahaqqi gooqqoocee shuuneeti shachoon cuyaa beehe; gecheenaa bobiyee eeyonon maa beehe.
41001007	Wotta arooba "Bi caammee cuyoon biich ta bedaani tayee besho ta hillooch waa beetone.
41001008	Ta ittoshin aacona afaalliyoye; tunaballi aroo ittoshin Yaafa Ayaanoona afaallemmone" ii gettii beehe.
41001009	Arooba Yesuusi Galiilee Shawooch beeti Naazireetee bi waatee, Yowannisi Yooridanoosi Aacona biin afaalliye.
41001010	bekkach Yesuusi aacooche bi kechiyee, shimaayo qeceeqqi Yaafa Ayaano bi ashittinee halloo uggeechoomon tunaqqi Yesuusichi toommooch bi kindoon Yowannisi beeggiye.
41001011	Wotta shimaayoochee "Ta shuni bushoo neene; neenna emirito taane" ii beeti qaaro waayeehe.
41001012	Bekkach Yaafa Ayaano Yesuusin "Barahooch hambe!" iye. Yesuusiyoo hammiqqi,
41001013	cooxina'o beeti barahoochaa Sheexaanoo gondoon biin shuunniiya qiicaa bi beetee, aabba qemon kotahe. Shimaaji maraakeena'oo waaqqi biin deggii beeheete.
41001014	Yowannisi yeshee cucheetoyee gub, Yesuusi Yeerichi mishiraachee qaaroon gettiibee,
41001015	"Yemeeno katinnitone; Yeerichi taatittine ittoshi kellooch shaggatine; ebich ittoshi axaaxee gommoochee Yeer waan wottaree, Yeerichi wocho tunati mishiraachee qaaroon ibariibote!" iibee Galiilee Shawooch waahe.
41001016	Yesuusi Galiili baharee gashoona bi beshahee, haashoon yechii beeti gutta maneena'o Simooninaa Indiriyaasina haashee yesha dabboon baharooch boonoshi dupii beetee ciinniye.
41001017	Arooba Yesuusi "Ta hillooch wobote! Haashoon hashiqqi ittoshi yeshoomon ashoon yeshiree ta waan ittoshi deebemmoyich tuniiyemmo taane" iye.
41001018	Boonoshiyoo bekkach boonoshi dabboon dupiichii biin dabbiyeete.
41001019	Wotta aroochee giishachoon beshaqqi Yabidoosichi bushiisheena'o gutta maneena'o Yaaqoobinaa Yowannisina marikabee toommoochaa, keexati boonoshi dabboon boonoshi shipii beetee ciinniye.
41001020	Bekkach "Ta hillooch wobote!" iqqi ceeggiye. Boonoshiyoo boonoshi nihoo Yabidoosin gijoo qocee shuunaa beeti asheena'ona tookkii marikabooch dupiichii biin dabbiyeete.
41001021	Yesuusinaa biin dabbii beetina'ona Qifirinaahi Katamooch shaggiyeete. Aroyee gub Shambatoo shagee, Ayihudeena'o kicee beeti kexooch giyiqqi dojiye.
