42020019	Arooba qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa Muusichi callee dojachina'ona "Ebi shaahiyoona noonalli bi gettii beeto" iqqi, aree gaata Yesuusin yecha qaawiyeete; tunatee dofee asheena'oyich shattiqqi qajiyeete.
42020020	Hini ara qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa Muusichi callee dojachina'ona Yesuusichi toommooch nallemmi Yihudee iraashoochi kishooch beshiiqqi imoyicha iqqi holloon quyabee, ibaroon shaahiibee, bi noonoochee hollimmi gonda mooyon macemmina'on bi waan daachiiheete.
42020021	Boonoshiyoo hammiqqi, "Dojachocho! Tatoon ne yibbaatoonaa ibaroon ne dojoonon ariihone; ibaroon Yeerichi gommon dojihinalli, konicholla beshii shapiiqqa dabbiyaachine.
42020022	Illa Roomi taatoyich qaraxee qocon Muusichi calloo daaggii beetashi, daaggaache?" iqqi echaheete.
42020023	Tunaballi marachina'o boonoshi tunoon Yesuusi ariiqqi,
42020024	"Eke taach ikka Roomi shilnkoon bekkiibote!" iye. Boonoshi bekkiitee, "Hini shilnkee toommooch beeti mallatoonaa kooreeti shigoona konichone?" iqqi echahe. Boonoshiyoo "Roomi taatoochone" iyeete.
42020025	Yesuusiyoo "Ishi gaata, Roomi taatoochon Roomi taatoyich, Yeerichon Yeerichi imbote!" iye.
42020026	Ebich dofee ashi aafooch bi noonoochee kechiti gonda mooyo aallatoyich, boonoshi danemmi mooyon muccaqqi bi wochiti wochoyich woriganaabee cikkii qajiyeete.
42020027	Ebichi hillooch "Qitii duukkatina'o keyaachemmina'one" ii beeti Saduuqeena'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o Yesuus waan waaqqi ishichii echaheete;
42020028	"Dojachocho! Muusi 'Ikka uro mecheen shaaggiqqi bushoon shiyaanoon bi qiti gaata, bi manoo ara ureen shaagiree qititi bi manoyich bushoon keribe!' iqqi Callee Macaafooch nooch kooriye.
42020029	Illa shabaatta maneena'o beeheete; boonoshi daggoochee qaabboo mecheen shaaggiqqi bushoon shiyaanoon qitiye.
42020030	Ebina bi hilloo ara ureen woraashiye;
42020031	keejinnoo woraashiye; shabaattinnee ciireexooch beddaahee bulli ara ureen woraashiqqi bushoon shiyaanoon qitii ciiraheete.
42020032	Ciiroochaa ure wotta qitiyane.
42020033	Illa hini shabaateena'o bulli ara ureen shaaggitina'one. Ebich qitii duukkatina'o kechiyooba mechee bi tunemmo aabichiye ?" iqqi echaheete.
42020034	Yesuusi wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Hini yemeenooch beeti asheena'o shaaggiyeete; shaageeheete.
42020035	Tunaballi ara yemeeno shagiyooba, 'Qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee kech beddiyeete' iqqi Yeeri gettitina'o shaagaacheete; shaaggeyaacheete;
42020036	, Ebiyoo shimaaji maraakoomina'o boonoshi tunatoyichiye; illa qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee kechiqqi Yeerichi Bushiisheena'o boonoshi tunatoyich, gubbich qitoonolla qitaacheete.
42020037	Wotta qitii duukkatina'ochi keyon Muusiyolla ittoshich arichiitone; ebinoo bi arichiito, tushee qaaqqee ga'ooch nexaa bi beetee tunati mooyon bi kooriyooba, Doono Yeerin 'Abrahamichi Nuggushoo, Yisaaqichi Nuggushoo, Yaaqoobichi Nuggushoo' iqqi bi getonaniye.
42020038	Illa asho bulli kashoona beeto tunabe, qititoo tunabe, Yeerich beeti kashachina'one; ebich kashachina'o Nuggushoalli qititina'ochi Nuggushoo toonoone" iye.
42020039	Arooba Muusichi callee dojachina'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o wochiqqi, "Dojachocho! Gaawichii gettatine" iyeete.
42020040	Boonoshi ishichito, wochiqqi biin echoon boonoshi shattitoyichiye.
42020041	Ebichi hillooch Yesuusi Muusichi callee dojachina'oyich ishichiye:- " 'Kiristoosi Daawitichi bushoone' iqqi aabichii gettiyeete?
42020042	Daawiti bi qelloona Yaafa Shoddee Macaafoochaa 'Doono Yeeriyoo ta Doonon "Neenna koyaa beetina'on ne baatee dechiich ta dichimmi wottoon ta qanna bad kotabe!" itone' iye.
42020044	Illa Daawiti biin 'Doono' itone; ishi gaata, aabichiree Daawitichi bushoo tunahe?" iqqi echahe.
42020045	Arooba asheena'o bulli waayaa boonoshi beetee, Yesuusi bi dabbeena'on
42020046	"Genja tahoon tahaqqi guudon qaawii beeti Muusichi callee dojachina'oyee ittoshi qelloon quyabote! Gabiyee godoochaa 'Shawooch qebana' ii beeti diggiyoon, Ayihudeena'o kicee beeti kexoochaa genja gabbaroon, gifiree kexoochaanoo oogee xaa'oon qaawii beetina'one.
42020047	Boonoshiyoo wotta xuuma maacheena'ochi kexon tiichiibee, cadiqo shaahi bekkiya iqqi corootoon geechii genjii beetina'one. Ebosichi toommooch Yeeri beshi shattii giiriiti nalloon kindiiyemmone" iye.
42021001	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi Yaafee Kexooch gijoo kicee beeti qiicee daggooch gijoon dupii beeti gaannachina'on xiishiqqi ciinnii beehe.
42021002	Wotta ikka girachi xuuma ure waaqqa gutta duudin bi dufon beeggiqqi,
42021003	"Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; eboshi bulli boonoshich beddiqqi echati gijoocheeniye deebii boonoshi dupito; tunaballi hini girachi bi tunateenolla maaree bi qeyemmon echiyaanoon biich beeti bullinoo deebaa dupatine. Ebich asheena'o bulliyee beshoon dupati hini girachi xuumeene" iye.
42021005	Ebiyee gub, ikkikka asheena'o Yaafee Kechi mooyon tiijiqqi, "Yeerin oogiyoyicha iqqi asheena'o wojiti, hini Yaafee Kexo haggeeti xaqqeena'ochi mallato am shaahoo gaawahe!" iqqi yibbaataa boonoshi beetee,
42021006	Yesuusi "Hini ittoshi beeggii beeti mooyo bulli shixachina'ochi kishoona hapeyaanoon xaqqo xaqqee toommooch kedeeree ebina bi beetaachemmi yemeeno woyemmone" iye.
42021007	Arooba Yesuusin bi dabbeena'o "Dojachocho! Illa hini mooyo bi tunemmo aataniye? Hini mooyo ceen bedon bekkiiyemmi mallatoo amoone?" iqqi echaheete.
42021008	Yesuusi wochiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Koniyolla ittoshin bi muriciyaachemmoyich ittoshi qelloon quyabote! Meetina'o 'Taane Kiristoosi' wotta 'Kiristoosi woyemmi yemeeno shaggitone' getibee ta shigoona woyemmina'one; ebiyooba ishichimmina'on dabbiyaahotine!
42021009	Ginee woroonaa hukkee woroonon ittoshi waayahooba keqqiyaahotine! Ebi bulli shiichii tuno echataachemmone; tunaballi yemeenee ciiro bekkach tunataachemmone" iye.
42021010	Wotta Yesuusi daakkiqqi ishichiye:- "Ikka aagatoo bara aagatoona, ikka shawee taatoo bara shawee taatoona koyemmone.
42021011	Bari bara xaa'oochoo oogati shawee qewo tunemmone; kaataa wuxii beeti biiyoonaa shaacoona giyemmone; keqqichemmi mooyina'onaa shimaayoochaa ogooga mallateena'ona bekkemmina'one.
42021012	"Tunaballi ebi bulliyee shiichiree, ta naboyich ittoshin yechemmina'one; duu'iiyemmina'one; Ayihudeena'o kicee beeti kechi nallachina'oyich ittoshin beshiiree immemmina'one; boonoshiyoo ittoshin cuchiiyemmina'one; taateena'onaa iraasheena'onochi aafoochoo ittoshin neechemmina'one;
42021013	Ebiyoo ta mishiraachee qaaroon ittoshi miixemmoyich gommon qechemmone.
42021014	Arooba ittoshi taggachina'o bulli ittoshin bayonaa ittoshi yibbaatoon nookkoonon boonoshi hakkaachemmi ariyoonaa noonoonon ittoshich immemmo taane. Ebich 'No taggemmi taggoon shiichi gabaayone!' getiree kuxote!
42021016	Ittoshi nihoonaa indeena, maneena'oo, xibeena'onaa shunachina'onolla ittoshi toommooch nallemmina'oyich beshiiree ittoshin immemmina'one; boonoshiyoo ittoshi daggoochee ikkikkeena'on wuxiiyemmina'one.
42021017	Asheena'o bulli ta naboyich ittoshin shixxemmina'one.
42021018	Tunaballi ittoshi qelli eexoochee ikkeyolla aallataachemmine;
42021019	kupphaqqi ittoshi neexa gaata, bulli yemeenee kashoon danemmo ittoshine" iye.
42021020	Yesuusi daakkiqqi ishichiye:- "Yerusalemin shixachina'ochi ginee naayina'o guuddii boonoshi giishee ittoshi beegiyooba, arooba biich aallee shagon ariibote!
42021021	Yaafa Macaafooch kooreeto bi ceennemmoyich eboshi Yeeri Isra'eeleena'ochi toommooch nichoon bi kichemmi aabeena'one. Ebich arooba Yihudee Shawooch beetina'o gepoo beetooch maxxabeete! Ara Yerusalem beetina'o tiyi bara keyeete! Bi guudeexi goyachi gafooch beetina'o ara Yerusalem giyaayeete!
42021023	Arooba yeqqafachina'onaa bushoon xaachii beetina'onoyich woowo! Hini shawee toommooch ooga xuuxo, hini aagatee toommoochoo ooga naxo kindemmone.
42021024	Sheefoona qitemmina'one; keccaree aagatoo bulliichoo shacemmina'one; ebi ara boonoshin kecciti aagateena'ochi yemeeno ciirammi wottoonoo Yerusalemin yiikkaree neexi hajemmina'one" iye.
42021025	Wotta Yesuusi daakkiqqi ishichiye:- "Ara yemeeno ciirahooba aabeenaa aganeenochi toommooch, xojanoochi toommoochoo mallatoo bekkemmone. Shawoo bullichi toommoochoo baharee gejoonaa aachi aayi timi naboona aagateena'o gaabbibee xuuxemmina'one.
42021026	Shimaaji giideena'o shuuritoyich, shawoo bullichi toommooch kindemmi mooyon quyabee ashi kashoo keqqoona muujemmone.
42021027	Ebiyee gub, ashi bushoo tawoo wodda giidoonaa oogee yiiroona 'Qubee daggoona ta waatee' beeggemmina'one.
42021028	Ebi mooyina'o tiyiyooba, Yeeri ittoshin biisharee bi wodiiyemmi aabo bi katinnitoyich, kaama neexaachi damba wochiree ciinote!" iye.
42021029	Ebichi hillooch Yesuusi bi dabbeena'oyich ishichiqqi shaahiyoona gettiye:- "Balasee mixonaa bara mixina'o bullinon ciinote!
42021030	Quummiqqi boonoshi ataa waajahooba, arooba ebin beeggiqqi yooyo womon ittoshi qelloona arii beeto ittoshine.
42021031	Ebiyoomon wotta hini mooyo bulli tunoon ittoshi beegiyooba, Yeerichi taatittine katinnati bi tunoon ariibote!
42021032	"Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye; hini mooyo bulli tunataanoon hini shiijaroo beshataachemmone.
42021033	shawoonaa shimaayoona beshemmone; tunaballi ta qaaro bulli yemeenooch manjiree beeyemmone" iye.
42021034	"Tunaballi ittoshi mullo miyona, mashoonaa mashaamiti beemi qaatoona dingiraata bi beetee, ashi bushoo ta aabo diqqich ittoshi toommooch bi waataachemmoyich, ittoshi qelloon quyabote!
42021035	Cooxo waaqqi diqqoona ollooch bi yechoomon, ara aabo shawooch beetina'o bullichi toommooch diqqoona shaggemmone.
42021036	Illa hini shag bedditi mooyoochee ittoshi muriccemmonaa ashi bushoo ta aafooch ittoshin neechemmi hakkoon ittoshi danemmonoyich corootibee, bulli araddoon qanniree quyabote!" iye.
42021037	Araddoon Yesuusi Yaafee Kexoochaa asheena'oyich dojiibee, shawoo xumahona Yerusalemee maach kechiqqi, Zayitee michi Guudooch hammii qeyii beehe.
42021038	Asheena'o bulliyoo "Bi dojoon waayabone" iqqi maad maaddoona Yaafee Kexooch bi waan waa beeheete.
42022001	Ebiyee gub, baaroon baariibee shittoo giyaani koshon boonoshi maa beeti, Beshee Baaree aabo katinniye.
42022002	Arooba qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa Muusichi callee dojachina'ona dofee asheena'oyich boonoshi shattitoyich, arichiyaanoon Yesuusin danaree boonoshi wuxiiyemmi gommon qaawii beeheete.
42022003	Arooba aaraa gutta Yesuusichi dabbeena'ochi dageexi ikkoo Asqorotachi Yihudichi mullooch Sheexaanoo ceenniye.
42022004	Biyoo hammiqqi aabichiree Yesuusin boonoshich beshiiree bi immemmo gaata, qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa Yaafee Kechi qoomeena'ochi ukkureena'ona tookkii echeehe.
42022005	Boonoshiyoo emiriibee gijoon biich imoyich kuxxiyeete.
42022006	Yihudiyoo boonoshich de'a iye. Ebich "Yesuusin aabichiree beshii imbate? iibee asho aalli xaa'oochaa beshiiree bi immemmi holloon qaawii beehe.
42022007	Arooba Ayihudeena'o Beshee Baaroon shalligoyich, bagoon guuraanoon boonoshi heeyaani qara kochi baaroo shaggiye.
42022008	Yesuusiyoo Pheexiroosinaa Yowannisinon " no maayemmi baaree maayoon hamiree nooch qanniibote!" iqqi wochahe.
42022009	Boonoshiyoo "Aabichi hamiree no qanniyoon shunnaa beetine?" iqqi echaheete.
42022010	Yesuusiyoo ishichiye:- "Ellabote! Katamooch hammii ittoshi giyiyee, aachi qondoon shaaggiti uroona danemmo ittoshine; hini ara uro giyimmi kexooch dabbiree gibote!
42022011	Ara kechi doonon 'Dojacho "Ta dabbeena'ona tookki Beshee Baaree maayoon ta maayemmi iibbee kexo aabichiye?" itone' getote!
42022012	Biyoo kechi toommeexi kexooch keyiree yaggee qanniti gabini xaa'oon ittoshich bekkiiyemmone; aroochaanoo qanniibote!" iye.
42022013	Boonoshiyoo hammiqqi Yesuusi gettitoomon bullin danaqqi Beshee Baaree maayoon arooch qanniiheete.
42022014	Arooba Yesuusi aaraa gutta mishiraachachina'ona tookkiqqi maayo manjeeya madoo giddatee maaya kotahe.
42022015	Biyoo "Ittoshich gettoye; Yeerichi taatittinee kexooch hini Beshee Baaree maayo manjeeyemmi aabo bi ceennimmi wottoon ebiyee damba Beshee Baaree maayoon maataachemmo taane; ebich iritoon beegaan beechi ittoshina tookkii hini baaree maayoon ta maayemmoyich oogichiqqaaniye ta qaatito" iye.
42022017	Aroochee woyinee uyoon yechiti xoofoon tiijii Yeerin gallataqqi bi dabbeena'oyich "Ittoshich gettoye; Yeeri taatittine waammi wottoon ebiyee damba hini woyinee uyoochee uyaachemmo taane. Ebich ha'ote! Ebin geechabote!" iye.
42022019	Wotta qara koshon tiijiqqi Yeerin gallatahe; tiichiqqi boonoshich immiibee, "[ittoshicha iqqa deejoon tuniiqqa ta immaa beeti] ta meeno ebine ebinoo taan shalligeechon tuniibote!]" iye.
42022020	[Ebiyoomon wotta aroobee xum maayee hillooch woyinee uyoon yechiti xoofoon tiijiqqi ishichiye:- "Hini woyinee uyo ittoshi naboyich ufemmi ta damoone; ebiyoo Yeeri neechemmi andra wogee mallatoone.]
42022021	Tunaballi taan beshiiree immemmi asho taanna tookkii madooch and geechaa maa beetone.
42022022	Ashi bushoo tawoo Yeeri shiichiqqi bi gettiti gommona ta qitoo echataachemmone; tunaballi taan beshiiree immemmi ara uroyich woowo!" iye.
42022023	Ebich bi dabbeena'o boonoshinaa boonoshina "No daggoochee ebin tuniiya ii beeto konine?" iqqi echeeheete.
42022024	Ebiyee gub, wotta "Konine no daggoochee oogo getee ceeggeeyemmo?" iqqi Yesuusichi dabbeena'o boonoshinaa boonoshina gajiteeheete.
42022025	Ebich Yesuusi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Aagateena'ochi taateena'o shawoo bullichi toommooch taataqqi areexi asho bullin hajii beetina'one; boonoshi toommooch doonjaa beetina'o wotta 'Maac de'eena'o' getteeya qaawii beetina'one.
42022026	Tunatee ittoshi daggooch ebiyoomon tunaaye! Ebich ittoshi daggoochee oogo giishachoomon, doonjato wotta bi wochee bushoochoomon tunabe!
42022027	Madooch kotaa beetonaa wochee beetonoochee konine oogo? Madooch kotaa beeto toona? Tunaballi ta ittoshi daggoochee wochee bushoomo taane.
42022028	"Wotta ittoshi ta toommooch shaggiti iritee daggooch taanna tookkii kupphaqqi beeto ittoshine.
42022029	Ebich ta nihoo taan bi taatiitoomon, ta wotta ta taatittinoochaa ta madoochee ittoshi maayemmonaa ta xoofoochee ittoshi uchemmonoyich, taatee qeenoochoo kotaree aaraa gutta Isra'eelee yoodeena'ochi toommooch ittoshi nallemmoyich and ittoshin taatiito taane" iye.
42022031	Ebichi hillooch Doono Yesuusi "Simoono! Simoono! Sheexaanoo teepphoon woqqoomon ittoshin 'Woqqibana' iqqi Yeerin qollatone;
42022032	Tunaballi ta toommooch ne mullee too'iyoon ne qayaachemmoyich Yeerin qollato taane; ebiyee gub ta waan ne wottahooba ne maneena'ochi mulloon kupphiibe!" iye.
42022033	Pheexiroosiyoo "Ta Doonocho! Neenna tookki cucheyoyichoo, qitoyichoo qannito taane" iye.
42022034	Tunaballi Yesuusi "Pheexirooso! Ibaroon eech gettoye! 'Biin ariyaan taane' getiree keeja kaalloon taan nookkataan ne beetee, hanaach baakkoo kuuhaachemmone" iye.
42022035	Wotta Yesuusi bi dabbeena'oyich " 'Gijee kojoonaa shohee kojoonon, wotta ittoshi baatooch ittoshi gedditoyee damba bara caammoon yeshaanoon shokka kishoon hambote!' iqqa ittoshin ta wochahooba ikkolla ittoshich shapita?" iqqi echahe. Boonoshiyoo "Amolla shapaanoone" iyeete.
42022036	Biyoo "Ittoshich gettoye; 'Gondeena'ona tookkii haddeehe' getee Yaafa Macaafooch kooreeto taanna ceenaanoon echataachemmone; eeha, ta toommooch tunemmi mooyo ceen bedditone. Ebich and gijee kojacho bi kojoon yeshiree hambe! Shohee kojachoo ebiyoomon wotta bi shohee kojoon yeshiree hambe! Sheefo biichi aallo bi kutoon kemiree kemabe!" iye.
42022038	Bi dabbeena'o "Doonocho! Hiniyoche, gutta sheefo beetone" iyeete. Yesuusiyoo "Mooyo beddiye illa" iye.
42022039	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi bi doyitoomon katamoyee maach kechiqqi Zayitee Michi Guudooch hammiye; bi dabbeena'oo biin dabbiqqi hammiyeete.
42022040	Ara xaa'ooch boonoshi shaggiyee, bi dabbeena'oyich "Gondoochi nihoo dachooch ittoshi giyaachemmoyich corootibote!" iye.
42022041	Biyoo boonoshiyee awur guutoon (bedoon) wokkiqqi gurataachii,
42022042	"Ta nihoocho! Ne daaggi gaata, hini xuuxee xoofoon (xuyoon) ta waanee wokkiibe! Tunatee ne daaggoo tunaballi, ta daaggoo tunaaye!" iibee corootiye.
42022043	Aree gaata ikka maraakoo shimaayoochee kindii biich bekkaqqi biin kupphiihe.
42022044	Biyoo oogichii xuuxaabee aafichoyee beshiiqqi corootiye; damoo cotoomon caajo bi achoochee shawooch cotahe.
42022045	Corootoon ciichiqqi tiyii bi dabbeena'o waan wottaqqi bi waahee, woddiiqqi boonoshi ayinitoyich taahiqqi tokkataa beetina'on danaqqi,
42022046	"Amoyichiye ittoshi tokkataa beeto? Gondoochi nihoo dachooch ittoshi giyaachemmoyich tiyiree corootibote!" iye.
42022047	Yesuusi ishin bi noonoochee bi kichiyee, bekkach aaraa gutteexi ikkoo Yihudi meeti asheena'on dabbiiqqi shaggiye; aroochee shumma iqqi Yesuus waan giddahe.
42022048	Tunaballi Yesuusi "Yihudo! Shumona ashi bushoo taan beshiiqqa immane?" iye.
42022049	Arooba bi ga'ooch beeti bi dabbeena'o ebi tunaa beeti mooyon beeggiqqi, "Doonocho! Sheefoona qeccabona?" iqqi echaheete.
42022050	Boonoshi daggoochee ikkoo qeeshee guudoochi guunon wuxiya bi daachiiti sheefo uroochi qanna waamon karii kindiihe.
42022051	Tunaballi Yesuusi "Qayote! Beddiye!" iqqi uroochi waamon yechiqqi wodiihe.
42022052	Yesuusiyoo bi waan waati qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'oyich, Yaafee Kechi qoomeena'ochi ukkureena'oyich, wotta geeneena'oyichoo "Bokkoon yeshoyich womoomon sheefoonaa yeelloonon yechiqqi waahotina?
42022053	Yaafee Kexooch bulli araddoon ittoshina tookkii ta beehooba taan yeshaano ittoshine; tunaballi and ebin ittoshich Yeeri daaggitone; ebiyoo mandaree taatoochi aaboone" iye.
42022054	Arooba waatina'o Yesuusin yechiqqi daammii, qeeshee guudoochi kexooch giijiyeete; Pheexiroosiyoo wokkiibee biin dabbii beehe.
42022055	Gayee maac asheena'o qaaqqoon shookkiqqi ikkooch kotaa boonoshi beetee, Pheexiroosiyoo giyiqqi boonoshi daggooch kotahe.
42022056	Qaaqqee bekko waan kotaa bi beetee, ikka shaajatee biin manjii ciinnaqqa, "Hini uro Yesuusina tookkii beetone" iyan.
42022057	Tunaballi Pheexiroosi tiyiqqi, "Hini ureene! Biin ariyaano taane" iqqi nookkahe.
42022058	Giishachoon yicimmiyee, wotta baroo waa Pheexiroosin beeggiqqi, "Ne wotta boonoshi maggacho neene" iye. Andoo Pheexiroosi "Hini uroocho! Ta toono taane" iqqi wochiye.
42022059	Wotta ikka saat bedoon yicimmiqqi bara ikka uro waa xiishiqqi, "Hini Galiilee shawee ashoone! Ibaroone; hini uro Yesuusina tookkii beetone" iye.
42022060	Tunaballi Pheexiroosi "Hini uroocho! Ne gettaa beeton ariyaano taane" iye. Ebin bi gettiyee, bekkach baakkoo kuukkiye.
42022061	Doono Yesuusiyoo gub wottaqqi Pheexiroosin ciinniye; Wotta "Hanaach baakkoo kuukkaahee, keeja kaalloon taan nookkemmo neene" iqqi Doono Yesuusi biich gettiti qaaro bi mullooch tiphimmiye.
42022062	Aree gaata Pheexiroosi maaxooch kechiqqi tiittaa eepiye.
42022063	Arooba Yesuusin yechiti asheena'o biin coonaabee yexxii beeheete;
42022064	Bi aafoon kaapichii tapaabee, "Konine neen tapato? Eke nooch gete!" iqqi echa beeheete.
42022065	Naagaabee bi toommooch bara meeti mooyon gettiyeete.
42022066	Shawoo hariyee, Ayihudee nallachina'o, eboshiyoo shawee geeneena'o, qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa Muusichi callee dojachina'ona ikkooch kiceeheete. Yesuusi yeshee bi waahee, "Kiristoosi neena? Eke nooch gete!" iqqi echaheete. Tunaballi aroo wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Ittoshich ta gettatee, ibariyaachotine;
42022068	Ta echateenoo, amoonolla wochaachotine.
42022069	Tunaballi hanaachin ikka getiree ashi bushoo ta giidachi Yeerichi qannooch kotemmo taane" iye.
42022070	Bi ishichiyona boonoshi bulli tiyiqqi, "Ishi gaata, ne Yeerichi Bushoo neena?" iqqi echaheete. Biyoo "Ta tunoon gettito ittoshine" iye.
42022071	Boonoshiyoo "No bi noonoochee waayato noone; illa ebiyee damba amashee miixoo nooch qaawiihe?" iyeete.
42023001	Hini ara nallachina'o bulli boonoshi kotatoochee tiyii Yihudee iraashoo Phelaaxoos waan Yesuusin daammiqqi,
42023002	"Hini uro no aagatoon hukacho tuniiya koccii bi beetee, danato noone. Wotta no asheena'on 'Roomi taatoyich qaraxoon qoccaahotine!' iqqi bajitone; ebichi toommooch 'Ta Kiristoosi getteeti taatoo taane' ii beetone" iqqi taggoon yaaqqiyeete.
42023003	Phelaaxoosiyoo Yesuusin "Ne Ayihudeena'ochi taatoo neena?" iqqi echahe. Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Newolla gettaa beetine" iye.
42023004	Phelaaxoosiyoo qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa dofee asheena'onoyich "Hini uroochi toommoochee ikka gondoonolla danataano taane" iye.
42023005	Tunaballi boonoshi mooyon manjiiqqi, "Galiilee shawooche tiijiqqi Yihudee shawoo bullinaa hini Yerusaleminooch beddaahee no asheena'oyich hukkee gommoniye bi koccii beeto" iyeete.
42023006	Tunaballi Phelaaxoosi hini ara taggachina'o "Galiilee shawoo" boonoshi gettee waayaqqi, boonoshin "Hini uro Galiilee shawee ashoona?" iqqi echahe.
42023007	boonoshi waanee Heroodisichi taatee shaweexi asho bi tunoon waayaa ariiqqi Yesuusin taatoo Heroodis waan daachiihe. Arooba Heroodisi wotta Yerusalemiye bi beeto.
42023008	Heroodisi ebiyee aaf asheena'o Yesuusichi mooyon tiijiqqi boonoshi yibbaatatee bi waayatoyich, meeti aaboon Yesuusin beegga iqqi qaatiibee, woriganikkimmi mallatoonoo bi tuniitee beegoyich gibanaa bi beetoyich, and Yesuusin beeggiqqi oogichii emiriye.
42023009	Ebich Yesuusin meeti mooyon echahe; tunaballi Yesuusi minna kanna getaanoone.
42023010	Qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa Muusichi callee dojachina'ona mooyon manjiiqqi taggaabee neexaheete.
42023011	Wotta Heroodisinaa bi ginee naayina'ona Yesuusin qallaayiqqi coonaheete; ebichi hillooch Heroodisiyoo bi ginee naayina'on "Mallatachi tahoon tajiree Phelaaxoos waan wochi daambote!" iqqi daachiihe.
42023012	Ebiyee aaf Heroodisinaa Phelaaxoosina kaarachina'one; tunaballi arooba shunaheete.
42023013	Arooba Phelaaxoosi qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'o, bara nallachina'onaa asheena'onon ikkooch ceeggiqqi
42023014	boonoshich ishichiye:- " 'No aagatoon hukkacho tuniiya koccii beetone' iqqi hini uroon ta waan deebiyotine. Ebiyoche, ittoshi aafoochaa wochii wochiqqa ta echatee, biin ittoshi taggati mooyoochee hini uroochi toommoochee ikka gondoonolla danataano taane.
42023015	Ta ikketo toonoone; Heroodisiyoo hini Yesuusichi toommoochee amee gondoonolla muccaqqi no waan wochitone. Illa qitooch biin bechemmi amashee gondoonolla hallaanoone;
42023016	Ebich sheeriree biichemmo taane" iye. [
42023017	Ebin bi gettito, hini baaree aaboona Yerusalemi asheena'o "Biichabe!" iqqi boonoshi echati cuchaton biisho biich doyoo bi tunatoyichiye.]
42023018	Tunaballi boonoshi bulli ikkooch "Hini uroon no aafoochee wokkiibe! Baribaasin nooch biishe!" iibee cookiyeete.
42023019	Ebi Baribaasi getteeti uro ebiyee aaf katamee daggooch hukkoon tiijiqqi ashoon bi wuxitoyich, Phelaaxoosi cuyee kexooch cuchiiti uroone.
42023020	Phelaaxoosiyoo Yesuusin biicha qaawiqqi wochii asheena'on echahe;
42023021	Tunaballi boonoshi "Yooddiibe! Yooddiibe!" iqqi cookiyeete.
42023022	Keejinnoon "Amoyichiye? bi gondochi amoone? 'Qitibe!' getiree ta nallemmoyich bi toommoochee ta danati gondo aalloone; ebichi sheeriree biichemmo taane" iye.
42023023	Tunaballi Yesuusin bi yooddiiyemmoyich manjiiqqi, "Yoodiibe! yoodiibe!" iibee boonoshi qaaroon oogichiqqi cookiyeete. Boonoshi cookee naboona Phelaaxoosichi mullo doojiye.
42023024	Phelaaxoosi asheena'o echati mooyon ceechoyich Yesuusichi toommooch nalliye.
42023025	Hukkee bi tiijoonaa ashoon bi wuxoonoyich cuchati, ara boonoshi echati Baribaasin bichiihe; aroochee Yesuusin Ayihudeena'o qaawitoomon yooddemmi bi ginee naayina'oyich beshiiqqi immiye.
42023026	Ebiyee gub, Phelaaxoosichi ginee naayina'o Yesuusin boonoshi yooddemmi xaa'ooch daammii boonoshi beetee, Simooni gettee beeti Qereenachi uro goyachi gafoochee Yerusalem waa bi beetee yechiqqi, "Yesuusichi hilloon dabbibee bi yooddeeyemmi masqaloon shaage!" iqqi shaaggiiheete.
42023027	Dofee asheena'oo Yesuusin dabbii beeheete; ebosichi daggooch wotta "Woowo!" iibee shooshaa eefaa beeti genneena'oo beetina'one.
42023028	Tunaballi Yesuusi gub wottaa ciinniqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Hini Yerusalemi genneena'ote! Ittoshi qelloyich, ittoshi bushiishoonoyichoo eefotalli, taach eepaahotine!
42023029	Ebiyoche, asheena'o 'Shiyii xaachii ariyaani xaafeena'o diireetina'one' boonoshi gettemmi aabo woyemmone.
42023030	Arooba asheena'o 'Guuddina'ote! No toommooch dihibote! 'Hini gepeena'ote! Noon qooxote!' gettemmina'one.
42023031	Gara aacoomi ta toommooch eechii beeti asho, quda aacoomi ittoshi toommooch aabichehe?" iye.
42023032	Bikkeena'o tunati bara gutta asheena'on wotta biinna tookkii yoodoyich daammiyeete.
42023033	"Qellee koofee xaa'oo" gettee beeti xaa'ooch shaggiyeete; aroochaa Yesuusinaa hukkachina'onon xuuree xogoona xogiqqi yooddiyeete; boonoshi yooddiyooba, hukkachina'on ikkoon Yesuusichi qanna bad, ikkoon bi yoocha bad geddiqqiniye boonoshi yoodito.
42023034	[Yesuusiyoo "Ta nihoocho! Boonoshin maaribe! Ebi boonoshi shuunaa beeton ariyaaneena'one" iye.] Ebiyee gub, bi tahoon ixo kuxxiqqi qoodeeheete.
42023035	Aroochaa meeti asheena'o neexaqqi ciinaa beeheete. Ayihudee nallachina'o wotta "Bareena'on wodiihe; eke Yeeri doonjiiti Kiristoosi bi gaata, bi qelloon wodiibe!" iibee noonoon wuuqqiibee xayisheeheete.
42023036	Ginee naayina'o wotta bi waan katinniqqi kiikkaroon daammii, "Uye!" iqqi biich giddiichii,
42023037	"Ayihudeena'ochi taatoo ne gaata, ne qelloon wodiibe!" iqqi coonaheete.
42023038	Biyee took wotta "Hini Ayihudeena'ochi taatoone" ii beeti cuufo xogeetone.
42023039	Biinna tookkiqqi yooddati hukkachina'ochi daggoochee ikkoo "Ne Kiristoosi toono neena? Amoyich neennaa noonnon wodiyaachine?" iibee naagahe.
42023040	Tunaballi bara ikkoo tiyiqqi, "Bi toommooch nalleeti qitee nalloo ne toommooch wotta nalleetone. Illa amoyich Yeerin shattaachine?
42023041	Noolla no shuunooniye no deqqaa beeto; ebich no toommooch nalleeti nalloo tatoone; tunaballi hini uro bi shuunati gonda mooyo amolla aalloone" iqqi noggahe.
42023042	Aree hillooch Yesuusin "Doono Yesuuso! Ne taatittineech ne giyiyooba, taan battiyaahine!" iye.
42023043	Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi, "Neech ibaroon gettoye; hanaach yannatooch giyiree taanna tookki kotemmo neene" iye.
42023044	Hare shiritta saat bedoone; aree gaata aabee bekko mandarahe; yiixiya saatee wottoon ara shawoo bullichi toommoochee bekko aallahe. Arooba Yaafee Kexooch tipeeti maccillaatoo gutta daggoochaa kappheeqqi keexaa kechiye.
42023046	Yesuusiyoo oogichii cookiqqi, "Ta nihoocho! Ta kasheen ne kishooch beshiiqqa immato taane" iye. Ebin bi gettiyee, bi kasho abbatahe.
42023047	Aree gaata balla ginee iraashoo ebi tunati mooyon beeggiqqi, "Hini uro ibaroon cadiqoone" iqqi Yeerin oogiihe.
42023048	Tunemmi mooyon beegoyich dofee asheena'o kiceeqqi neexaa beeheete; ara asheena'o bulli ebi mooyon beeggiqqi boonoshi getoon qicciibee kexooch wottaheete.
42023049	Tunaballi Yesuusin arii beeti asheena'o bullinaa Galiilee shawoochee biin dabbiqqi waati genneena'ona ebi mooyon beeggiibee wohooch neexaa beeheete.
42023050	Arooba Ayihudee nallachina'ochi dageexi ikkoo, Yooseefi gettee beeti de'a cadiqa uro beehe;
42023051	Ara uro nallachina'ochi koceyoonaa boonoshi shuunoonooch bacceyaani ashoone; biyoo Arimaati gettee beeti Ayihudeena'ochi katameexi ashoone; aroo Yeerichi taatittinoon quyaa beeti uroone.
42023052	Biyoo Yihudee iraashoo Phelaaxoosichi aafooch giddaqqi, "Yesuusichi cahoon taach imbe!" ii qollaqqi daaggiihe.
42023053	Aroochee hammii Yesuusichi cahoon kindiiqqi muttee tupoochee shipati kaafanoona (macawoona) kaapiye; koniyolla bat duukkataani, ebiyee aaf xaqqee guudoochee gooshiiqqi bi shuuniiti opooch daammiye.
42023054	Daammii bi beetee, Galiilee shawooche Yesuusina tookkii waati genneena'o Yooseefin dabbii hammiqqi maashee opoon beeggiyeete; wotta cahoo aabicheeqqi bi duukkato gaata beeggiyeete. Wottaqqi boonoshi qeyii beeti kexooch hammiqqi qimaamoonaa huutoonon qanniiheete. Ayihudeena'ochi qanniyee aabo bi tunatoyich, dechra boonoshi Shambatoo giyi beddiye; shawoo xumahe. Muusichi calloochaa bi getteetoomon Shambatooba kashaqqi heechiyeete.
42024001	Batti batti shabaatee aabo, oogi shambatooba genneena'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o kafee qaadooch tiyii, boonoshi qanniiti qimaamoon yechiqqi Yesuusi duukkati maashee opooch hammiyeete.
42024002	Boonoshi hammii shaggiyee, opee kellooch keppheeti xaqqee qeroo opee kellee noonoochee ikka bad gediraqqi bi wottoon beeggiyeete;
42024003	maac giyiqqi boonoshi ciinniyee, Doono Yesuusichi cahoo aallahe.
42024004	Ebichi naboyich boonoshi shaammii beetee, diqqich gutta asheena'o phaqqi beeti tahoon tahaqqi boonoshi waan waaheete.
42024005	Hini ara genneena'o keqqoona shataqqi shawooch boonoshi ciinnii beetee, ara asheena'o boonoshich ishichiyeete:- " 'Kashachon qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee amoyichiye ittoshi qaawii beeto?
42024006	Aroo hiniich aalloone;Yeeri qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee biin kechitone. Aaf Galiilee Shawooch beebee, ittoshich 'Ashi bushoo ta, axaaxachi asheena'ochi kishooch beshiiree imee, yooddaree keeja qemooba qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee ta keyo echataani mooyone' iqqi bi gettiton shalligibote!" iyeete.
42024008	Ishin boonoshi gettiyona, hini ara genneena'o Yesuusi gettiton shalligiyeete.
42024009	Ara maashoochee katamooch wottaa hammiqqi, ebi boonoshi beeggitonaa boonoshi waayato bullinon aaraa ikka Yesuusichi dabbeena'onaa biin dabbii beeti bareena'o bullinoyich gettiyeete.
42024010	Ebin mishiraachachina'oyich hammiqqi gettitina'o, Magidalachi Maariyami, Yowani, Yaaqoobichi indee Maariyaminaa boonoshina tookkii beeti bara genneena'onaniye.
42024011	Hini mooyo boonoshich daayino bi shaahitoyich, ara genneena'ochi yibbaatoon ibariyaaneena'one.
42024012	Tunaballi Pheexiroosi tiyiqqi maashee opooch wocciye; hammii shaggiqqinoo yittii bi ciinniyee, kaafano baach beehe; hini tunati mooyoyich shaammiibee mag wottaa hammiye.
42024013	Arooba Yesuusin dabbii beetina'oochee gutteena'o Yerusalemee, aaraa ikka kiilee metiroon wokkii beeti Mayoosi gettee beeti gafooch hammii beeheete;
42024014	hammiibee ebi tunati mooyo bullin tiijiqqi boonoshinaa boonoshina yibbaataa beeheete.
42024015	Yibbaataabee echee boonoshi beetee, Yesuusi bi qelloona boonoshi waan katinniqqi boonoshina tookkii gommon hammii beehe;
42024016	Tunaballi boonoshich bi tuusheetoyich, koni bi gaata ariyaaneena'one.
42024017	Yesuusi tiyiqqi "Gommon hammiibee hini ittoshi yibbaataa beeti mooyo amoone?" iqqi echahe. Ishichiqqi bi echahona, ayinoona boonoshi aafo maggaa beetee, neexaheete.
42024018	Boonoshi daggoochee Qalayoophi gettee beeti ikkoo "Yerusalem waa beeti iibbeena'oochee ne ikketo baachiya arooch shuuneeti mooyoyich dallaawoo?" iye.
42024019	Yesuusiyoo "Arochi amashoone?" iqqi echahe. Boonoshiyoo wochiqqi ishichiyeete:- "Naazireetachi Yesuusichi mooyone; biyoo Yeerinaa asho bullinochi aafooch gaakkachi shuunoon shuunatonaa kuppha qaaroon gettiti keemachonaniye;
42024020	Qeesheena'onaa bara no nallachina'ona Phelaaxoosi qitee nalloon bi toommooch nallemmoyich, 'Qitibe!' iqqi beshii immii yooddiiheete.
42024021	Tunaballi 'Isra'eeleena'on biisharee wodiiya wocheetone' iqqaaniye no gibanato. Wotta ebi mooyo bulli tunato hanaachi keeja qemoobaniye.
42024022	Wotta no daggooch beeti ikkikka genneena'o gettiti mooyo noon woriganikkiye; boonoshiyoo maaddee kafee qaadooch ara maashee opooch hammiqqi
42024023	bi cahoon muccaheete; aroochee wottaa waaqqi, ' "Yesuusi wochinnoon kashacho tunatone" iqqi gettiti shimaaji maraakeena'on beeggato noone' iyeete.
42024024	Wotta noonna tookkii beetina'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o maashee opooch hammiqqi, genneena'o gettito ibaroo bi tunoon beeggitina'one; tunaballi Yesuusin danataaneena'one" iyeete.
42024025	Yesuusiyoo "Hini mullaalleena'ote! Keemachina'o gettito bullin ibariyaanoon amoyichiye ittoshi yagii beeto?
42024026	Kiristoosi hini xuuxoon beego qaawiyaacha? Oogee yiiree xaa'ooch giyi bedaacha?" iye.
42024027	Aroyee gub Muusichi macaafoochee tiijiqqi keemachina'ochi macaafooch beddaahee kooreeti bi hajee mooyon biichiqqi boonoshich gettiye.
42024028	Hini gutta asheena'o boonoshi hammii beeti gafooch katinniyeete; tunaballi Yesuusi ara gafoon besharee hammemmo boonoshich bi shaahee,
42024029	"Noonna tookkiree qebe! Shawoo beshatone; shawoo xumatone" iqqi manjii ataalliyeete. Ebich boonoshina tookkii qeya giyiye.
42024030	Boonoshina tookkii maayoon maaya madooch kotaabee, koshon tiijiqqi Yeerin gallatahe; tiichiqqinoo boonoshich immiye.
42024031	Aree gaata boonoshi mullo qecheetee, Yesuusi bi tunoon ariiheete; biyoo bekkach boonoshi aafoochee shiwirimmiye.
42024032	Boonoshinaa boonoshina ishichiyeete:- "Gommona tookkiqqa no waa beetee, Yaafa Macaafooch kooreeton biichii nooch bi gettiyona, no mullo am shaahoon qeecciye!" iyeete.
42024033	Bekkach aree gaata hini ara gutta asheena'o tiyii Yerusalem wottaqqi, ikkooch kiceeqqi beeti aaraa ikka Yesuusichi dabbeena'onaa boonoshina tookkii beetina'onon ikkooch danaheete.
42024034	Hini kiceeti asheena'o "Ibaroon Doono qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee kechitone! Simoonich bekkatone" iyeete.
42024035	Wotta oha gutteena'oo gommona hammii boonoshi beetee tunati mooyon, wotta koshon tiijii Yeerin gallataqqi tiichii bi immiyee, bekkach biin boonoshi ariyoon gettiyeete.
42024036	Hini ara gutta asheena'o ebin yibbaataa boonoshi beetee, diqqoona Yesuusi boonoshi daggooch neexahe. Boonoshich "Diggoo ittoshich tunabe!" iye.
42024037	Tunaballi keqqoona shataheete; yoogo boonoshich bekkaton shaahiiheete.
42024038	Biyoo "Amoyichiye ittoshi keqqii beeto? Ittoshi mullo amoyichiye meeti gommooch shacaa bi beeto?
42024039	Yesuusi ta tunoon ta kishoonaa ta baatoonon beegote! Taalli, baroo toonoone; taan yeshi beegote! Ittoshi beeggii beetoomon taach meenonaa shaawishona beetone; yoogoyich meenonaa shaawishona aalloone" iye.
42024040	Ishin boonoshich gettiichii bi kishoonaa bi baatoonon bekkiihe.
42024041	Boonoshiyoo emiroochee tiyitona bi gettiti mooyon ibariyoon hakkaaneena'one. Ebich woriganaa boonoshi beetee, "Manjeeyemmi maayo ittoshi waan aalla?" iqqi echahe.
42024042	Boonoshiyoo micheeti haashee qaton immiyeete.
42024043	Aroon yechiqqi boonoshi aafoochaa maahe.
42024044	Boonoshichoo "Ebiyee aaf ittoshina tookkii beebee, 'Muusichi Callee Macaafoonaa Keemachina'ochi Macaafoonooch, Yaafa Shoddee macaafoochoo kooreeti ta mooyo bulli ceeno echataachemmi mooyone' ta ito ebiniye" iye.
42024045	Aree gaata Yaafa Macaafooch kooreeton boonoshi xiishemmoyich, boonoshi mulloon qechiye;
42024046	boonoshich ishichiye:- " 'Kiristoosi xuuxoon beeggemmone; bi keeja qemooba qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee kechemmone;
42024047	Bi wochatina'oo Yerusalemee tiijiree aagateena'o bulliichi beddaahee hamiree "Axaaxee gommoochee Yeer waan wottabote! Yeeriyoo ittoshi axaaxoon maaremmone" getiree gettemmina'one' getee kooreetone.
42024048	Ittoshiyoo ebi mooyo bullich miixoo ittoshine.
42024049	Illa ellabote! Ta nihoo Yeeri gibanikkiti gibanoon ta ittoshich deejemmo taane; ebich damba Yeer waanee giidoo ittoshi toommooch bi kindimmi wottoon Yerusalem quyabote!" iye.
42024050	Ebiyee gub, Yerusalemee Bitaani katinooch beddaahee boonoshin dabbiiqqi daammiye; aroochaanoo bi kishoon tiijiqqi boonoshin diiriibee,
42024051	boonoshiyee bariqqi shimaaj hammiye.
42024052	Boonoshiyoo aroochaa biich goyinnaachii, woddoon emiriibee Yerusalem wottaheete;
42024053	kuxaanoon Yeerin gallataabee, Yaafee Kexooch heechii beeheete.
43001001	Shawoonaa shimaayoona halleyaan beehooba, Qaaro beehe; hini Qaaro Yeer waan beehe; biyoo bi qelloona Yeerine.
43001002	Aroo bulliyee aaf Yeerina tookkii beehe.
43001003	Yeeri bulli mooyon biinna halliihe; halleetina'ochi daggoochee ikkolla bi aalloon halleeto aalloone.
43001004	Aroo bi qelloona kashachone; ara kasho ashoyich bekkoone.
43001005	Hini ara bekko mandaroon bekkii beetone; mandaroo biin qeroon hakkaanoone.
43001006	Yeer waanee wocheeti, Yowannisi gettee beeti ikka uro beehe.
43001007	Biyoo asho bulli waayaree bi mulloon bekkoochi toommooch bi too'iiyemmoyich, ara bekkeechon miixiya waahe.
43001008	Ebi bekkeechon miixiya waahalli, aroo bi qelloona ara bekko toonoone.
43001009	Ara bekko shawee toommooch waabee, asho bullich bekkii beeti ibara bekkoone.
43001010	Ara Qaaro shawee toommooch beehe; shawoonaa bi toommooch beeto bullina halleeto biinnaniye; tunatee shawee toommooch beeti asheena'o bi koni gaata ariyaaneena'one.
43001011	Bi hajee shawooch waahe; bi hajee asheena'o "Hini Yeer waanee waato toonoone" iqqi qajiyeete.
43001012	Tunaballi Yeer waanee bi womon ibariiqqi boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iitina'o bullich Yeerichi Bushiishoo tunee hakkoon immiye.
43001013	Yeerichi Bushiishoo boonoshi tunato, Yeer waanee boonoshi shiijoonalli, ashi yarooche, oohee ashi qaatooche, oohee anaamochi gaboochee shiijoona toonoone.
43001014	Ara Qaaro ashoon tunahe; Yeerichi wojoonaa ibaroona bi toommooch meettiqqi bekkaatee noonna tookkii beehe; bi Nihoyich ikka mixxa Bushoo bi tunatoyich, bi waanee bi deqqiti oogee yiiroon beeggahone.
43001015	Ebin Yowannisi bi qaaroon oogichiqqi gettiye; ishichiinoo iye:- " 'And ta hillooch waa beeto, ta shiijataan beehooba beetone; ebich tayee beshoone' iqqa ta gettato ebine" iibee miixahe.
43001016	Bi toommooch meettiqqi bekkati wojoochee no bulli wojee toommooch wojoon deqqato noone.
43001017	Yeerichi calloo Muusina kindiye; tunaballi wojoonaa ibaroona Yesuus Kiristoosina kindiye.
43001018	Yeerin bi aafoona beeggito koniyolla aalloone; tunaballi bi Nihoochi sheenooch beeti ikka bi Bushoo kindiqqi bekkiitone.
43001019	Yerusalem beeti Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o tiyiqqi qeesheena'onaa Leweena'onochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'on "Hamiree Yowannisin 'Ne koni neene?' getiree echabote!" iqqi wochaheete. Arooba wocheetina'oyich Yowannisi ishichiqqi miixahalli,
43001020	nookkataanoone; boonoshich "Kiristoosi toono taane" iqqi xallaayii gettiye.
43001021	"Ishi gaata, ne koni neene? Eliyaasi neena?" iqqi echaheete. "Ta Eliyaasi toono taane" iye. " 'Woyemmone' gettee beeti keemacho neena?" iqqi echaheete. "Toono taane" iqqi wochiye.
43001022	"Ishi gaata, ne koni neene? Noon wochatina'oyich no gettemmon nooch gete! Koni taane gettenne?" iyeete.
43001023	Biyoo wochiqqi, "Keemachi Isiyaasi gettitoomon ' "Doonochi gommon kaachi qaxxabote!" iibee barahoochaa cookii beeti ashi qaaro' taane" iye.
43001024	Arooba Fariseena'o waanee wocheetina'o
43001025	" Ishi gaata, ne Kiristoosi, oohee Eliyaasi, oohee 'Woyemmone' gettee beeti keemacho ne toonee gaata, amoyichiye asheena'on aacona ne afaallii beeto?" iqqi echaheete.
43001026	Yowannisi wochiqqi, "Ta, aacona afaallii beeto taane; tunaballi ittoshi ariyaano ittoshi daggooch neexaa beetone;
43001027	Ta bi caammee cuyoon biich ta bedaani, ta hillooch waa beeto aroone" iye.
43001028	Hini mooyo bulli bi tunato, Bitaani gafoochaananiye; Bitaani bi beeto, Yowanisi aacona afaalliibee bi echati Yooridanoosi Aacoyee beqachiye.
43001029	Bi dechara Yowannisi bi waan Yesuusichi womon beeggiqqi ishichiye:- "Ebiyoche, shawee toommooch beeti asheena'ochi axaaxoon hidi wokkiiyemmi Yeerichi Bago!
43001030	'Ikka uro ta hillooch waa beetone; aroo ta shiijoyee aaf beetone; ebich tayee beshoone' iqqa ta gettato ebine.
43001031	Tawo ameexo bi gaata arooba ariyaano taane; tunaballi Isra'eeleena'o biin boonoshi ariiyemmoyichiye aacona afaalliibee ta waato" iye.
43001032	Daakkiqqi ishichii miixahe:- "Yeerichi Ayaano bi ashittinee halloo uggechoomon tunaqqi shimaayoochee kindii bi toommooch bi kotoon beeggato taane.
43001033	Tawoo koni bi gaata arooba ariyaan beeto taane; tunaballi aacona ta afaallemmoyich shiichiqqi taan deejiti aroo 'Ayaano kindiree bi toommooch bi kotatee ne beeggemmo, Yaafa Ayaanoona afaallemmo aroone' iqqi taach gettiye.
43001034	tawoo ebin ta aafoona beeggato taane; biyoo Yeerichi Bushoo bi tunoon miixato taane" iye.
43001035	Wotta bi dechara Yowannisi gutta bi dabbeena'ona tookkii neexaa beehe.
43001036	Neexaabee, Yesuusin hammii bi beetee beeggiqqi, "Ebiyoche! Yeerichi Bago!" iye.
43001037	Gutta bi dabbeena'o Yowannisi ishichoon waayaqqi Yesuusin dabbii hammiyeete.
43001038	Biin dabbii beeti asheena'on Yesuusi gub wottaa ciinniqqi, "Amooniye ittoshi qaawii beeto?" iye. Boonoshiyoo "Rabbi! Ne beeto aabiichiye?" iqqi echaheete. "Rabbi!" geto "Dojachocho!" getone.
43001039	Yesuusi boonoshin "Waaree beegote!" iye. Boonoshiyoo hammiqqi bi beeti xaa'oon beeggiyeete. Arooba boonoshi hammito aashira saat bedoochiye. Bi waanoo xumaheete.
43001040	Yowannis waanee waayaqqi Yesuusin dabbiti gutteena'oochee ikkoo Simoon Pheexiroosichi manoo Indiriyaasine.
43001041	Biyoo Yesuus waanee kechii hammii shiichii bi hajee manoo Simoon waan shaggii, "Masiihin danato noone" iye. "Masiihi" geto "Kiristoosi" getone.
43001042	Aroochee Indiriyaasi Simoonin Yesuus waan deebiye. Yesuusiyoo beeggiqqi, "Ne Simooni neene; ne nihoochi shigo wotta Yoonine; and Keefi getee ceeggeeyemmo neene" iye. "Keefi" geto "Pheexiroosi" oohee "Xaqqo" getone.
43001043	Bi dechara Yesuusi Galiilee Shawooch hamma tiyiye; Filipphoosinoo danaqqi, "Taan dabbibe!" iye.
43001044	Filipphoosiyoo Indiriyaasinaa Pheexiroosina beeti Beteshayidi Katameexi ashoone.
43001045	Aroo Naatinaa'eelin danaqqi, "Muusi bi callee Macaafooch, keemachina'o wotta biichon boonoshi kooriti Yooseefichi bushoo, Naazireetachi Yesuusin danato noone" iye.
43001046	Naatinaa'eeliyoo "Naazireetee de'a mooyo kecheha?" iqqi echahe. Filipphoosiyoo "Waaree beege!" iye.
43001047	Naatinaa'eeli bi waan womon Yesuusi beeggiqqi ishichiye:- "Dawushoon ariyaani ibara Isra'eelee asho hinine" iye.
43001048	Naatinaa'eeli Yesuusin "Amoochaa taan ariinne?" iqqi echahe. Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi, "Filipphoosi neen ceegaan beetee, balasee michi yiirooch kotaa ne beetee, neen beeggato taane" iye.
43001049	Naatinaa'eeli wochiqqi, "Dojachocho! Ne Yeerichi Bushoo neene; ne Isra'eelee Taatoo neene" iye.
43001050	Yesuusi wochiqqi, " 'Balasee michi yiirooch kotaa ne beetee, neen beeggahoye' iqqa ta gettatoyich ibariinne? Gub ebiyee besha mooyon beeggemmo neene" iye.
43001051	"Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Shimaayoo qecheetee, Yeerichi maraakeena'o Ashi Bushoo ta toommooch keyi kindi boonoshi beetee, beeggemmo ittoshine" iye.
43002001	Keejinnee qemooba Galiilee Shawooch beeti Qaani Katamooch gaaro geddeehe. Yesuusichi indee ara gaarooch beehan.
43002002	Yesuusinaa bi dabbeena'ona wotta ara gaarooch ceeggeeqqi hammitina'one.
43002003	Woyinee uyo ciiratee, Yesuusichi indee biich "Woyinee uyo boonoshich ciiratoche!" iyan.
43002004	Yesuusiyoo "Hini ureene! Ta shuunee daggooch giyaahine! Shuunoyich ta tiyemmi saato bat bedaan beetone" iye.
43002005	Arooba Yesuusichi indee qoomachina'oyich "Ittoshich bi gettiyo bullin tuniibote!" iyan.
43002006	Ayihudeena'o ceechii beeti xallee doyoyich kotati shiritta xaqqee shareena'o (gaaneena'o) arooch beetina'one; ara shareena'oo boonoshi qelli qelloona gutta oohee keeja geetee aacon yechii beetina'one.
43002007	Yesuusiyoo qoomachina'on "Shareena'ooch aacon ceechibote!" iye. Shareena'ooch aacon cipphaayii ceechiyeete.
43002008	"And kitiree qoomachina'ochi ukkuroyich imbote!" iye. Boonoshiyoo kittiqqi immiyeete.
43002009	Ukkuroo woyinee uyo tunati aacon bi napphahee, amoochee bi waato gaata ariyaanoone; tunaballi aacon kittiti qoomachina'o arii beetina'one. Ebich qoomachina'ochi ukkuroo wo'ee kenoon ceeggiqqi,
43002010	"Asho bulli shiichiqqi bi giddii beeto shaawi wuura uyooniye; iibbeena'o uchii michitoyee gubbiye waaroon bi giddii beeto; tunaballi ebi shaawi woyinee uyoon and beddaahee asheena'oyich imaano neene" iye.
43002011	Yesuusi hini mallatoon shiichiqqi Galiilee Shawooch beeti Qaani Katamoochaa tuniihe; arooba bi oogee yiiroon bekkiihe. Ebich bi dabbeena'o boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iiheete.
43002012	Ebiyee gub Yesuusi bi inde, bi maneena'onaa bi dabbeena'ona tookkii Qifirnaahi Katamooch kindiye; aroochoo giishacha aaboon kotaheete.
43002013	Ayihudeena'ochi Beshee Baaroo katinniye. Ebich Yesuusi Yerusalem hammiye.
43002014	Yaafee Kechi kakallee daggooch gatteena'on, bageena'onaa uggeena'onon kemmii beetina'on, wotta gijoon shaddii beetina'onoo kotaa boonoshi beetee danahe.
43002015	Wodaree yaraafoon yexxiqqi (wodariqqi) bullin, bageena'onoo, gatteena'onoo, Yaafee Kechi kakalloochee kichiye; gijee shaddachina'ochi gijoon shacciye; boonoshi gafatoon yangiye;
43002016	uggoon kemmii beetina'on "Ittoshi uggoon hiniichee kichibote! Ta Nihoochi kexon giixee kexon tuniyaahotine!" iye.
43002017	Bi dabbeena'o "Ne kechi qanaato taan michemmone" getee kooreyoon shalligiyeete.
43002018	Yesuusi ebi bullin yaafee kechi kakallee daggoochaa bi tuniitoyich, Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o tiyiqqi, "Ebin tuniiya Yeer waanee ne womoyich amee mallatoo neech beete? Eke nooch bekkiibe!" iyeete.
43002019	Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Hini yaafee kexon hapibote! Ta keeja qemona wochiree haggemmo taane" iye.
43002020	Ebich Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o "Hini yaafee kexo hagee bi qannito aabbaa shiritta natonaniye; tunaballi ebin keeja qemona wochiree haggenne?" iyeete.
43002021	Arooba Yesuusi "Yaafee kexo" iqqi bi gettito, bi ashittinoonalli hini yaafee kexon toonoone.
43002022	Ebich Yeeri qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee biin bi kichitoyee gub, bi dabbeena'o ebi bi gettiton shalligiyeete; Yaafa Macaafoochoo kooreetonaa Yesuusi gettiti qaaroonon ibariiheete.
43002023	Beshee Baarooba, Yesuusi Yerusalem beebee bi tuniiti mallateena'on beeggiqqi meeti asheena'o boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iiheete.
43002024	Tunaballi Yesuusi asho bullin arii beetone; ebich boonoshin gibanataanoone.
43002025	Biyoo bi qelloona ashi mullooch beeti mooyon bi arii beetoyich, ashi mooyon biich ashi miixo amolla qaawiyaanoone.
43003001	Fariseena'ochi guuphi daggooch Ayihudeena'ochi nallacho tunati Niqoodimoosi gettee beeti ikka uro beehe.
43003002	Biyoo xumoona Yesuus waan waaqqi, "Dojachocho! Yeeri biinna tookkii tunatoyee damba, ne tunii beeti hini woriganikkiti mallateena'on tuniyoon koniyolla hakkaache. Ebich Dojacho tunaqqa Yeer waanee ne womon arii beeto noone" iye.
43003003	Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi, "Ibaroon neech gettoye:- Koniyolla bi tunatee, guttinnoon bi shiijo qayi gaata, Yeerichi taatittineen beegon hakkaachemmone" iye.
43003004	Niqoodimoosiyoo "Asho bi geenatoyee gub, aabichiree shiijoon hakkehe? Guttinnoon bi indee maacooch giyiree shiijoon hakkeha?" iqqi echahe.
43003005	Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Ibaroon neech gettoye:- Koniyolla bi tunatee, aaconaa Ayaanoonoochee bi shiijo qayi gaata, Yeerichi taatittineech gimon hakkaachemmone.
43003006	Meenona shiijato meenone; Ayaanoona shiijato ayaanoone.
43003007	'Guttinnoon shiijo ittoshich qaawiihe' ta itoyich, woriganiyaahine!
43003008	Yongo biich kaamammoochiye bi yongaa beeto; bi qaaroonoo waayahine' tunaballi amoochee bi waa beeto gaata, amooch bi hammii beeto gaatoo ariyaachine. Yeerichi Ayaanoochee shiijato bulli ebiyoomone" iye.
43003009	Niqoodimoosiyoo wochiqqi, "Ebi aabichiree tunehe?" iqqi echahe.
43003010	Yesuusi wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Ne, Isra'eeleena'ochi daggooch ooga dojacho tunaa beechaa, ebin ariyaachine?
43003011	Ibaroon neech gettoye:- No arii beeton gettahone; no beeggaton miixahone; tunaballi no miixaton ibariyaachotine.
43003012	Shaweexi mooyon ta getee, ittoshi ibariyaan gaata, shimaayeexi mooyon ta getee, aabichiree ibariiyehotine?
43003013	Shimaayoochee kinditoyee damba shimaayooch kechito koniyolla aalloone; ebiyoo Ashi Bushoo taane.
43003014	Muusi ashi kishoona halleeti dingaroon barahoochaa michi toommooch bi yoodoomon, Ashi Bushoo ta yooddeyoo taach qaawiihe;
43003015	Ebi tunemmo, bi mulloon ta toommooch too'ii beeto bulli, bulli yemeenee kashoon bi danemmoyichiye.
43003016	"Yeeri shawee toommooch beeti asheena'on oogichii bi shunnitoyich ikka bi Bushoon immiye; hini ikka bi Bushoon bi immito, bi mulloon bi toommooch too'ii beeto bulli, bulli yemeenee kashoon bi danemmonaa shiwaree qaaqqooch bi giyaachemmonoyichiye.
43003017	Yeeri bi Bushoon shawee toommooch bi deejito, arooch beeti asheena'on bi wodiiyemmoyichalli, boonoshi toommooch bi nallemmoyich toonoone.
43003018	Bi mulloon bi Bushoochi toommooch too'ii beetochi toommooch nallaachemmone; tunatee bi mulloon bi Bushoochi toommooch too'iyaano, bi mulloon ikka bi Bushoochi toommooch too'iyoo bi qajitoyich, wond bi toommooch Yeeri nallitone.
43003019	Bekko shawee toommooch waahe; tunaballi asheena'o boonoshi shuunoo gondo bi tunatoyich, bekkoyee mandaroon shunniyeete; bi nallito ebichiye.
43003020	Gonda mooyon shuunaa beeto bulli bekkoon shunnaanoone; bi gonda shuunoo bi bekkataachemmoyich, bekko beetooch keyaache;
43003021	Tunatee ibaroo tunati mooyon shuunaa beeto, Yeeri gettiton bi shuuno bekkemmoyich, bekko beetooch kechii beetone" iye.
43003022	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusinaa bi dabbeena'ona Yihudee Shawooch hammiyeete; boonoshina tookkii giishacha shabaattoon arooch kotaqqi asheena'on aacona afaallii beehe.
43003023	Arooba Yowannisi wotta Saliimee Shawee katinooch Heenoon gettee beeti xaa'ooch gabini aaco beetoyich, aroochaa asheena'on aacona afaallii beehe; asheena'oo bi waan waa beeheete; biyoo boonoshin aacona afaallii beehe.
43003024	Arooba Yowannisi bat cuyee kexooch giyaan beetone.
43003025	Yowannisichi dabbeena'onaa ikka Ayihudoonochi daggooch xalliyee doyee gajiteyoo tiyiye.
43003026	Hini bi dabbeena'o Yowannis waan waaqqi, "Dojachocho! Yooridanoosi Aacoyee beqach neenna tookkii beebee echato, newoo biichon ne miixato, ebiyoche, asheena'on aacona afaallii beetone; asho bulli bi waan hammii beetone" iyeete.
43003027	Yowannisi ishichiqqi wochiye:- "Yeeri daaggaan gaata, ebiyoomi mooyon koniyolla tuniyoon hakkaache.
43003028	'Kiristoosi toono taane; tunaballi biyee shiichii wocheeto taane' iqqa ta getoyich ta miixoo ittoshine.
43003029	Wo'e bi kenoochine; neexaqqi waayaa beeti miyaatoo wo'ee kenoochi qaaroona oogichii emirii beetone. Illa ebina ta emiroo ceennitone.
43003030	Bi oogo beshibe; ta oogo giishabe; ebi tun beda mooyone" iye.
43003031	"Damba shimaayoochee waa beeto bulliyee beshoone; dechi shawoochee tunaa beeto shaweexone; shawee toommeexi mooyoniye bi gettii beeto. Shimaayoochee waa beeto bulliyee beshoone.
43003032	Bi beeggitonaa bi waayatonon miixaa beetone; tunaballi bi miixaa beeton ibarii beeto koniyolla aalloone.
43003033	Bi miixaa beeton ibariito, Yeeri ibaroo bi tunoon miixatone.
43003034	Yeeri wochato, Yeerichi wochoon gettii beetone; Ebiyoo Yeeri bi Ayaanoon shapiiqqi biich imo bi qajitoyichiye.
43003035	Nihoo Yeeri bi Bushoon shunnii beetone; bullin biich hajiitone.
43003036	Bi mulloon bi Bushoochi toommooch too'ii beeto, bulli yemeenee kashachone; bi Bushoo getee waayataano Yeerichi kaaree shiixxee daggoochalli bi beeto, bulli yemeenee kashoon danataachemmone" iye.
43004001	Arooba Doono Yesuusi Yowannisiyee beshoon dofee asheena'on bi dabbiyoonaa aacona bi afaalloonon Fariseena'o waayaheete;
43004002	Tunaballi aacona afaallii beetina'o bi dabbeena'oalli, bi toonoone.
43004003	Yesuusi asheena'o biichon boonoshi yibbaatoonoo ariiqqi, Yihudee Shawoochee tiyii Galiilee Shawooch wottaqqi hamma tiyiye.
43004004	"Shamaaree Shawooch shagaanoon hamaache" iqqi
43004005	aroona Shamaaree Shawooch beeti Sikaari Katamooch shaggiye. Ara katamoo Yaaqoobi bi bushoo Yooseefich bi immiti shawee ga'oochiye.
43004006	Arooch Yaaqoobichi aachi opo beetone. Yesuusiyoo gommi sha'oona maraataqqi arooch kashiya aachi opee gashooch kotahe; arooba araddee shiritta saat bedoone.
43004007	Bi dabbeena'o manjeeyemmi maayoon kemiya katamooch hammiyeete. Aree hillooch ikka Shamaarachi ure aacon kitta, ara aachi opo beetooch waahan. Yesuusi ara ureen "Aacoochee kitiree taach imbe! Uyane" iye.
43004009	Shamaarachi ure wochiqqa, "Ne Ayihudee asho tunaachaa, Shamaarachi ure ta waanee aabichiqqa aacon ucha qollanne?" iyan. Ishichiqqa bi gettato, Shamaaree asheena'o kishoona boonoshi yechiti qiicoon Ayihudeena'o qeshaa beetoyichiye.
43004010	Yesuusi wochiqqi ureyich "Yeeri immii beeti wojoonaa 'Aacon taach imbe! Uyana' ii beeti ta koni ta tunoonon ne ariito gaata, ne taan qolleshi neene; tawoo kashee aacon neech immesho taane" iye.
43004011	Ure "Ta Doonocho! Ne kittemmi qiico neech aalloone; aachi opoo genjoone. Illa kashee aacon amoochee deebenne?
43004012	Hini aachi opoon nooch immito no qaabbachi nihoo Yaaqoobine; biyoo, bi bushiishoo, bi miimo bulliyoo hiniichee uchitina'one. Newochi biyee besho neena?" iyan.
43004013	Yesuusiyoo wochiqqi, "Hini aacoochee uchii beeto bulli wochinnoon shachawemmone;
43004014	Tunaballi ta immaa beeti aacoochee uchii beeto koniyolla bulli yemeenoon shachawataachemmone. Ta immaa beeti aaco bi maacooch bulli yemeenee kasho xuupphii beeti kashee tunoo tunemmone" iye.
43004015	Ure "Ta Doonocho! Ta shachawataachemmoyich, wochinnoon aacon kitta hiniich ta waataachemmoyich, ara aacon taach imbe!" iyan.
43004016	Yesuusi "Hamiree ne kenoon ceegiree deebe!" iye.
43004017	Ure wochiqqa, "Keno taach aalloone" iyan. Yesuusiyoo " 'Keno taach aalloone' ne geto ibaroone.
43004018	Ebiyee aaf uucha kenachi neene; tunaballi and neenna tookkii beeto ne keno toonoone. Ebich ne gettato ibaroone" iye.
43004019	Ure "Ta Doonocho! Keemacho ne tuno taach bekkaa beete.
43004020	No qaabbachina'o hini guudoochaa Yeerich goyinnaheete. Ayihudo ittoshiyoo 'Asho Yeerich goyinni beda xaa'oo Yerusalem ikketoalli, baroo aalloone' iyotine" iyan.
43004021	Yesuusi ureyich ishichiye:- "Hini ureene! Ta gettaa beeton ibariibe! Hini guudoochaa tunabe, Yerusalemaa tunabe, Nihoo Yeerich ittoshi goyinnataachemmi yemeeno woyemmone.
43004022	Ittoshi gaata, ittoshi ariyaanoyich goyinnaa beeto ittoshine; Yeeri Ayihudeena'ochi gommona asheena'o bullich wodoon imma bi gibanikkitoyich, Ayihudo no, no arii beetoyich goyinnaa beeto noone.
43004023	Tunaballi ibarittinoona goyinnaa beetina'o, Nihoo Yeerich Yaafa Ayaanee hakkoonaa ibarittinoona boonoshi goyinnemmi yemeeno woyemmone; andoo waatone; Nihoo Yeeri biich boonoshi goyinnemmoyich eboshiyoomina'on qaawii beetone.
43004024	Yeeriyoo ayaanoone; biich goyinnaa beetina'o Yaafa Ayaanee hakkoonaa ibarittinoona goyinno boonoshich qaawiihe" iye.
43004025	Ure "Kiristoosi gettee beeti Masiihi bi woyemmon arii beeti taane; bi waahooba bullin kaachiree nooch gettemmone" iyan.
43004026	Yesuusiyoo "And neech gettaa beeto, aroo taane" iye.
43004027	Arooba bi dabbeena'o boonoshi hammitoochee wottaa waaqqi, Yesuusi ureena tookkii bi yibbaatoyich, woriganaheete; tunaballi boonoshi daggoochee koniyolla ureen "Amoon qaawii beetine?" oohee Yesuusin "Amoyichiye ureena tookkii ne yibbaataa beeto?" ito aalloone.
43004028	Ure ara xaa'ooch aachi qondoon dupaachaa katamooch hammahan. Arooch beeti asheena'oyich
43004029	"Ta tuniito bullin taach gettiti uroon waaree beegote! Aroo Kiristoosi tuneha?" iyan.
43004030	Ebina waayatina'o katamoochee kechiqqi ara Yesuusi beetooch hammiyeete.
43004031	Ebi tunaa beetee, bi dabbeena'o "Dojachocho! Maayoon mame!" iqqi ataalliyeete.
43004032	Tunaballi aroo "Ittoshi ariyaani maayo taach beetone" iye.
43004033	Ebich bi dabbeena'o boonoshinaa boonoshina "Bi maayemmi maayoon asho biich deebito tuneha?" iyeete.
43004034	Yesuusi wochiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Taach maayo geto, taan wochatochi daaggoon ceechoonaa bi shuunoon ciichoonaniye.
43004035	Ittoshi 'Bat maayi qecoyich awudda agano echate' ii beetaachotina? Ittoshich gettoye:- Gochati maayoon manjii ciinote! Maayo qecceeya bedditone.
43004036	Andolla qeccii beeto bi caajee gatiyoon deqqii beetone; shookkachonaa qeccachona ikkooch tookkiree boonoshi emiremmoyich, qeccii beeto aafati maayoon bulli yemeenee kashoyich kicii beetone.
43004037	Ebich 'Ikkoo shookkiye; ikkoo qecciye' immi yibbaatoo ibaroo tunatone.
43004038	Tawoo ittoshi maraatataanoon ittoshi qeccemmoyich ittoshin daachiihoye. Bareena'o maraataheete; ittoshiyoo boonoshi maraataton qecciyotine" iye.
43004039	Arooba ure "Ta tuniito bullin taach gettiye" iqqa bi miixati qaaroona ara katamooch beeti Shamaaree asheena'ochi daggoochee meetina'o boonoshi mulloon Yesuusichi toommooch too'iiheete.
43004040	Shamaaree asheena'o Yesuus waan waaqqi, "no waan kotabe!" iqqi qollaheete. Yesuusiyoo arooch gutta qeyiye.
43004041	Aaf urechi noonoochee waayatina'oye, Yesuusichi noonoochee waayatina'ochi daggoochee meetina'o boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iiheete.
43004042	Ureyichoo "And no mulloon bi toommooch no too'iito, ne noonoochee no waayatoyich toonoone; no no qelloona bi noonoochee waayaqqa, ibaroon shawee toommooch beetina'o bullin Wodiyacho bi tunoon no ariitoyichiye" iyeete.
43004043	Gutta qemoyee gub Yesuusi aroochee kechiqqi Galiilee Shawooch hammiye.
43004044	Ebiyee aaf Yesuusi "Keemachon bi shiijee shaweexi asheena'o oogiyaachemmina'one" iqqi gettitone.
43004045	Galiilee Shawooch bi waahee, Galiilee Shawee asheena'o kechiqqi biin giijiyeete. Ebin boonoshi tuniito, boonoshi qelloona wotta baaroyich Yerusalem boonoshi hammiyooba Yesuusi aroochaa bi shuunato bullin boonoshi beeggitoyichiye.
43004046	Yesuusi aacon woyinee uyo bi tuniiti, Galiilee Shawooch beeti, Qaani Katamooch wochinnoon wottaqqi hammiye. Arooba Qifirnaaha bi bushoo biiyati ikka taatee naayo beehe.
43004047	Biyoo Yesuusi Yihudee Shawoochee Galiilee Shawooch bi womon waayahe; bi bushoo qitiya bi mawiitoyich Yesuus waan hammiqqi, "Ta kexooch waaree, biiyati ta bushoon wodiibe!" iqqi qollahe.
43004048	Ebich Yesuusi "Mallatoonaa woriganikkiti mooyonon ittoshi beego qayi gaata, cir ittoshi mulloon ta toommooch too'iyaachotine" iye.
43004049	Taatee naayoo "Ta Doonocho! Ta bushoo qitaan beetee, hambone" iye.
43004050	Yesuusiyoo "Hambe! Ne bushoo woditone" iye. Uroo Yesuusichi qaaroon ibariiqqi hammiye.
43004051	Aroo hammii bi beetee, bi aafee bushiisheena'o gommoochaa biinna danaqqi, "Ne bushoo woditone" iyeete.
43004052	Biyoo "Ambicha saatoochiye ta bushoo wodito?" iqqi echahe. Boonoshiyoo "Yiich shabaatta saatoochiye bi achee gaamoo aqqato" iyeete.
43004053	Nihoo "Ne bushoo woditone" Yesuusi ito aree gaata bi tunoon shalligiye. Ebich biinnaa bi kechi asheena'o bullina boonoshi mulloon Yesuusichi toommooch too'iiheete.
43004054	Ebiyoo Yesuusi Yihudee Shawoochee Galiilee Shawooch wottaa waaqqi bi tuniiti guttinnee mallatoone.
43005001	qEbiyee gub, Ayihudeena'ochi baaroo bi tunatoyich Yesuusi Yerusalem hammiye.
43005002	Yerusalemi guudoona gayeeti gayoochee bageena'o giyii beeti kellee ga'ooch Hibiree noonoona Betesidi gettee beeti ikka kota aaco beehe; uucha bashee yambaaro bi guudoona beehe.
43005003	Eboshichi daggooch meeti biiyachina'o, aaf doogeena'o, baata yesheena'o, boonoshi ashittino qititina'oo qeyii beeheete.
43005004	Arooch shaashaa shimmitta naton biiyati ikka uro beehe.
43005006	Yesuusi hini qeyii beeti uroon ciinniqqi, and beddaahee wodda naton eechiqqi bi beemon ariiqqi, "Wodoon qaawii beetine?" iqqi echahe.
43005007	Biiyati uroo "Ta doonocho! Aaco shuuriyee, aacooch taan giijemmi asho aalloone; ta giya iyee, baroo tayee shiichii giyiye" iqqi wochiye.
43005008	Yesuusiyoo "Tiyi ne yeebboon qodi shaagiree hambe!" iye.
43005009	Bekkach aroochee uro wodiye; bi yeebboonoo qoddii shaaggiqqi hammiye. Ara aabo Shambatoone.
43005010	Ebich Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o woditi uroon "Hanaach Shambatoone; Shambatoona yeebboon qoddii shaagon no calloo daaggaanoone" iyeete.
43005011	Tunatee uro wochiqqi, "Taan wodiiti uro 'Ne yeebboon qodi shaagiree hambe!' iqqi taach gettitone" iye.
43005012	Boonoshiyoo " 'Ne yeebboon qodi shaagiree hambe!' iqqi neech gettiti uro aabine?" iqqi echaheete.
43005013	Tunaballi arooch beeti asho meeto bi tunatoyich, wotta Yesuusi asheena'ochi daggoona arichataanoon beshaa bi hammitoyich, woditi uro koni biin wodiito gaata ariyoon hakkaanoone.
43005014	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi uroon Yaafee Kexoochaa danaqqi, "And wodito neene; ebiyee besha mooyo ne toommooch bi waataachemmoyich, ebiyee bek axaaxoon shuuniyaahine!" iye.
43005015	Uro hammiqqi Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'oyich "Taan wodiito Yesuusine" iqqi gettiye.
43005016	Ebich Shambatooba eboshin bi shuunatoyich, Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o Yesuusin du'ii beeheete.
43005017	Tunatee boonoshich Yesuusi "Ta Nihoo hanaach beddaahee shuunaa beetone; tawoo ta qelloona shuunaa beeto taane" iqqi gettiye.
43005018	Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o Shambatoon bi shaaddatoyich baach tunataanoon, bi qelloon Yeerina tachiqqi, "Yeeri ta Nihoone" bi itoyich, biin beshoon wuxiya qaawiyeete.
43005019	Ebich Yesuusi wochiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Nihoo Yeeri tunii beeto bullin bi Bushoo wotta biichoomon tunii beetone; ebich Nihoo Yeeri tuniitee bi beeggitonalli, Bushoo bi qelloona amoonolla shuunoon hakkaache.
43005020	Ebiyoo Nihoo Yeeri bi Bushoon shunnii bi beetoyichiye; wotta bi shuunaa beeto bullin biich bekkii bi beetoyichiye; ittoshiyoo ittoshi woriganemmoyich ebiyee besha shuunoon biich bekkiiyemmone.
43005021	Nihoo Yeeri qititina'on opoochee kichiqqi kashoon bi imoomon, ebiyoomon bi Bushoo wotta imma bi qaawitina'oyich kashoon immemmone.
43005022	Wotta Nihoo Yeeri ikka ashi toommoocholla nallaachemmone; asheena'o bulli Nihoo Yeerin boonoshi oogii beetoomon ebiyoomon bi Bushoon boonoshi oogiiyemmoyich, nalloo bullin bi Bushoyich immitone; ebich bi Bushoon oogiyaano biin deejiti bi Nihoo Yeerin oogiyaanoone.
43005024	"Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Ta qaaroon waayaa beeto, taanoo deejiti Yeerichi toommooch bi mulloon too'ii beeto, bulli yemeenee kashachone; qitoochee wodooch kimmitalli, nalloo bi toommooch kindaachemmone.
43005025	Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Qititina'o Yeerichi Bushoo qaaroon boonoshi waayemmi aabo woyemmone; ebiyoo andiye; waayammina'o kashoon danemmina'one.
43005026	Ebiyoo Nihoo Yeeri bi qelloona asheena'on kashacho bi tuniyoomon ebiyoomon wotta bi Bushoo asheena'on kashacho bi tuniiyemmoyich bi immitoyichiye.
43005027	Biyoo Ashi Bushoo bi tunatoyich, 'Nallibe' iqqi Nihoo Yeeri biin doonjiitone.
43005028	Qitii duukkatina'o bulli bi qaaroon boonoshi waayemmi aabo woyemmone; de'oon shuunatina'o kashoona boonoshi beeyemmoyich, gondoon shuunatina'oo boonoshi toommooch bi nalleeyemmoyich opoochee kechemmina'one. Ebich woriganiyaahotine!" iye.
43005030	Yesuusi daakkiqqi ishichiye:- "Ta, ta qelloona ikka mooyonolla tuniyoon hakkaano taane; Yeer waanee ta waayatoniye ta nallii beeto; ebich ta nalloo tatoone; Ebiyoo taan deejitochi daaggoonalli, ta daaggoon qaawaano ta qajatoyichiye.
43005031	"Ta wochiqqa ta qellichon ta miixa gaata, ta miixoon ibariiyemmo aalloone.
43005032	Taachon miixaa beeti baroo beetone; biyoo taachon miixaa bi beeti miixo ibaroo bi tunoon arii beeto taane.
43005033	"Ittoshiyoo Yowannis waan wochato ittoshine; biyoo taachon bi miixato ibaroone.
43005034	Ishichii ta ii beeto, ittoshi wodemmoyichalli, ta, ta qelloona ashi miixoon qaawaache.
43005035	Yowannisi micciibee aaxxaa beeti bekkoone; ittoshiyoo giishacha yemeenoon bi bekkoona emiriya shunnito ittoshine.
43005036	"Tunatee Yowannisi miixatoyee beshoon miixaa beeto taach beetone. Ebi ta tunii beeti shuunoo Nihoo Yeeri ta ciichemmoyich bi immitone. Biyoo Nihoo Yeeri taan bi deejoon taachon miixaa beetone.
43005037	Wotta taan wochati Nihoo Yeeri taachon miixatone; tunaballi bi qaaroon cir waayataano ittoshine; bi aafoonoo beegaano ittoshine.
43005038	Bi wochaton ittoshi ibariyoo qajitoyich, bi qaaro ittoshi mullooch aalloone.
43005039	Ittoshiyoo 'Yaafa Macaafeena'oochee bulli yemeenee kashoon danemmo noone' iibee, galliqqi boonoshi daggooch qaawiyotine; boonoshiyoo taachon miixaa beetina'one.
43005040	Tunaballi kashoon danoyich ta waan womoyich shunnaachotine.
43005041	"Ta, ta qelloona asho taan bi oogiiyemmoyich qaawaache.
43005042	Tunaballi Yeerin ittoshi mulloona ittoshi shunni qayon ariito taane.
43005043	Ta, ta Nihoochi yakkiracho tunaqqa bi waanee wocheeqqa waato taane; tunaballi ta yibbaatoon ibariyaachotine. Baroo waaqqi bi qellichon bi geti gaata, bi yibbaatoon ibariihotine.
43005044	Ittoshi, ittoshi qelli qelli oogoon daniya qaawiyotine; tunaballi bi ikketo tunati Yeer waanee danemmi oogoon qaawaachotine. Illa aabichiree taan ibariyoon hakkemmotine?
43005045	"Taan 'Nihoo Yeer waan hamiree noon taggemmone' getiree gabiyaahotine! Ittoshin taggemmo beetone; aroo ittoshi gibanaa beeti Muusine.
43005046	Aroo taachon kooritone; ebich biin ittoshi ibariito gaata, taan ibariiyesho ittoshine.
43005047	Bi kooriti Macaafeena'on ibariyaanoon ittoshi qajitoye, ta yibbaatoon aabichiree ibariiyehotine?" iye.
43006001	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi Galiilee Baharoyee beqach kimmiye; biyoo Xibaaridoosee Baharoone.
43006002	Biiyachina'ochi toommooch bi bekkiiti woriganikkiti mallateena'on boonoshi beeggitoyich dofee asheena'o biin dabbiyeete.
43006003	Yesuusi gepooch kechiqqi arooch bi dabbeena'ona tookkii kotahe.
43006004	Ayihudeena'o baarii beeti Beshee Baaroo katinniye.
43006005	Yesuusi kaama wottaa bi ciinniyee, bi waan waa beeti dofee asheena'on beeggiye. Ebich Filipphoosin "Eboshi bulli maayemmi koshon amoochee kemehone?" iye.
43006006	Ishin bi gettito Filipphoosichi noonoochee waayoyichalli, amoon bi shuunemmo gaata arii beetone.
43006007	Filipphoosi "Boonoshi qelli qelloona giishi giishacheenolla boonoshi maa gaata, wodda balla birawoona kosho kematee boonoshich bedaache" iqqi wochiye.
43006008	Bi dabbeena'ochi daggoochee ikkoo, Simoon Pheexiroosichi manoo Indiriyaasi tiyiqqi,
43006009	"Uucha gishiishi xekee sheqee koshonaa gutta haashoonon yechiti bushoo hiniich beetone; tunaballi hinin shaaha asheena'oyich ebi amoon hallehe?" iye.
43006010	Yesuusi bi dabbeena'oyich "Asheena'on kotiibote!" iye. Ara xaa'oo mocachi gabini xaa'oone. Asheena'oo kotaheete; anaamina'ochi haddoo uucha hum bedoone.
43006011	Yesuusiyoo uucha xekee koshon tiijiqqi Yeerin gallatahe; arooch kotati asheena'oyichoo bechiye. Ebiyoomon wotta haashoocheenoo boonoshi qaawiti wottoon bechiye.
43006012	Asheena'o bulli maaqqi michitoyee gub, bi dabbeena'on "Duubiyaanoon gaawichiree echati ooyoon maci kicibote!" iye.
43006013	Ebina asheena'o maati Uucha sheqee koshoochee echati ooyoon kiciqqii aaraa gutta ogooga mokkoona ceechiyeete.
43006014	Arooch beeti asheena'o Yesuusi tuniiti mallatoon beeggiqqi, "Ibaroon hini uro 'Shawee toommooch woyemmone' getteeti keemachone" iyeete.
43006015	Ebichi naboona asheena'o bi waan waaree biin yeshi taatiiya boonoshi gaboon Yesuusi ariiqqi, boonoshi waanee bariqqi wochinnoon gepooch bi ikketo hammiye.
43006016	Shawoo xumahee, Yesuusichi dabbeena'o baharo beetooch hammiyeete;
43006017	marikabooch giyiqqi baharoyee beqach Qifirnaaha wottaqqi hammii beeheete. Aree gaata shawoo mandaroone. Yesuusi bat boonoshi waan waataan beetone.
43006018	Giidachi yongo yongatoyich, baharee aaco oogichii shuuriye.
43006019	Uucha oohee shiritta kiilee metiroon marikabee boojatoona yopaabee boonoshi hammitoyee gub, Yesuusi baharee aachi toommona sha'aabee marikabo waan bi katinee beeggiqqi keqqoona qitiyeete.
43006020	Tunaballi aroo "Taane; shattaahotine!" iye.
43006021	Ebina marikabooch bi giyemmoyich qaawiyeete. Bi giyitoyee gub bekkach marikaboona boonoshi hammii beeti shawooch shaggiyeete.
43006022	Dechara baharoyee haqach echati dofee asheena'o neexaa beeheete; boonoshiyoo bi dabbeena'o ikketo hamonalli Yesuusi boonoshina tookkii marikabooch bi gimi qayon, wotta arooch ikka marikaboyee damba bara marikabo aallo bi tunoon ariiheete.
43006023	Tunaballi [Doono gallatatee] koshon boonoshi maati xaa'ee ga'ooch beeti Xibaaridoosi Katamoochee bara marikabeena'ona hammiyeete.
43006024	Arooba asheena'o Yesuusinaa bi dabbeena'onon arooch muccaqqi tiyii marikabeena'ooch giyiqqi Yesuusin qaawoyich Qifirnaaha hammiyeete.
43006025	Asheena'o baharoyee beqach Qifirnaahaa Yesuusin danaqqi, "Dojachocho! Hiniich ne waato aatoobaniye?" iyeete.
43006026	Yesuusi wochiqqi ishichiye:- "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Taan ittoshi qaawii beeto, koshon maaqqi ittoshi michitoyichalli, mallatoon ittoshi beeggitoyich toonoone.
43006027	Bulli yemeenee kashoon immemmi maayoyich shuunabotalli, aallemmi maayoyich shuuniyaahotine! Hini beshataani koshon ittoshich immemmo Ashi Bushoo taane; Ebiyoo Nihoo Yeeri taanna bi emiroon bi miixatoyichiye" iye.
43006028	Ebich asheena'o "Yeeri qaawii beeti shuunoon no shuunemmoyich aabichibona?" iqqi echaheete.
43006029	Yesuusi wochiqqi, "Yeeri qaawii beeti shuunoo, ittoshi mulloon bi wochaa deejitochi toommooch ittoshi too'iyooniye" iye.
43006030	Boonoshiyoo "Illa beegiree neen no ibariiyemmoyich, amee mallatoon bekkiiyenne? Amoon shuuna bekkiiyenne?
43006031	'Boonoshi maayemmoyich shimaayoochee koshon boonoshich immiye' getee bi kooreetoomon, no qaabbachina'o barahooch beebee 'mannoo' getteeti maayoon maatina'one" iyeete.
43006032	Yesuusiyoo "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye. Shimaayoochee ittoshich koshon immito, Muusi toonoone; tunaballi shimaayoochee ibara koshon ittoshich immii beeto Yeeri ta Nihoone.
43006033	Ebiyoo Yeeri immii beeti kosho, shimaayoochee kinddiqqi shawee toommooch beeti asheena'oyich kashoon immii bi beetoyichiye" iyee.
43006034	Ebich asheena'o "Doonocho! Hini koshon bulli aaboon nooch imbe!" iyeete.
43006035	Yesuusi ishichiqqi boonoshich wochiye:- "Kashee kosho taane; ta waan waa beeto cir shaacataachemmone; bi mulloon ta toommooch too'ii beeto, bulli yemeenoon cir shachawataachemmone.
43006036	Tunaballi ta ittoshich gettatoomon [taan] beeggito ittoshine; tunaballi ittoshi mulloon ta toommooch too'iyaachotine.
43006037	Shimaayoochee ta kindito, taan wochati Yeerichi daaggoon tuniyoyichalli, ta daaggoon tuniyoyich toonoone. Ebich ta Nihoo Yeeri taach immito bulli ta waan woyemmone; ta waan waammo bullin cir maaxooch kichi dufaachemmo taane.
43006039	Taan wochati ta Nihoo qaawii beeto, taach bi immitoochee ikkoonolla ta aalliyaachemmonaa ciireexi aabooba qitii bi duukkatoochee ta kichemmonoyichiye.
43006040	Yeerichi Bushoo taan ariiqqi bi mulloon ta toommooch too'ii beeto bulli, bulli yemeenee kashoon bi danemmoyich ta Nihoochi daaggoo ebine; tawoo ciireexi aabooba qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee biin kichemmo taane" iye.
43006041	Arooba Yesuusi "Shimaayoochee kinditi kosho taane" bi itoyich, Ayihudeena'o bi toommooch guruuxeebee,
43006042	"Hini bi nihoonaa bi indeenon no arii beeti Yooseefichi bushoo Yesuusi toona? Ishi gaata, aabichiqqi 'Shimaayoochee kindito taane' iye?" iyeete.
43006043	Yesuusi tiyiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ittoshinaa ittoshina xuuqqisheyaahotine!
43006044	Taan wochati Nihoo Yeeri yeepphitoyee beshatee, ta waan womon hakkemmo koniyolla aalloone; tawoo ciireexi aabooba qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee biin kichemmo taane.
43006045	'Boonoshi bulli Yeer waanee ariitina'o tunemmina'one' getee Keemachina'ochi Macaafooch kooreetone. Illa Nihoo Yeer waanee waayaqqi arii beeto bulli ta waan woyemmone.
43006046	Yeer waanee kinditoyee damba, Nihoo Yeerin beeggito koniyolla aalloone; bi ikketo baachiye Nihoo Yeerin beeggito.
43006047	Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Bi mulloon ta toommooch too'ii beeto, bulli yemeenee kashachone.
43006048	Kashee kosho taane.
43006049	Ittoshi qaabbachina'o barahooch beebee 'mannoo' getteeti maayoon maatina'one; tunaballi qititina'one.
43006050	Hini ta gettaa beeti kosho shimaayoochee kinditone; aroochee maammo koniyolla qitaachemmone.
43006051	Shimaayoochee kinditi bulli yemeenee kashee kosho taane. Asho hini koshoochee bi maa gaata, bulli yemeenoon beeyemmone. Shawee toommooch beetina'o kashoon boonoshi danemmoyich ta immemmi kosho ta meenone" iye.
43006052	Ebich Ayihudeena'o "Hini uro bi meenon aabichiree nooch maanjoon hakkehe?" iqqi boonoshinaa boonoshina hayaheete.
43006053	Ebich Yesuusi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ibaroon ittoshich gettoye:- Ashi Bushoo ta meenon ittoshi mamo qayi gaata, ta damoonoo ittoshi uyo qayi gaata, ittoshi qelloona kasho ittoshich aalloone.
43006054	Ta meeno ibara maayo, ta damoo ibara uyo bi tunatoyich, ta meenon maa beeto, ta damoonoo uchii beeto, bulli yemeenee kashachone; tawoo ciireexi aabooba qitii duukkatina'ochi daggoochee biin kichemmo taane.
43006056	Ta meenon maa beeto, ta damoonoo uchii beeto taanna tookkii beetone; tawoo biinna tookkii beeto taane.
43006057	Beeyachi Nihoo Yeeri taan wochatone; tawoo bi naboona beeyacho taane. Ebiyoomon taan maa beeto, ta naboona kashacho tunaree beeyemmone.
43006058	Illa shimaayoochee kinditi kosho ebine; ittoshi qaabbachina'o ara koshon maaqqi boonoshi qititoomon toonoone. Hini koshon maa beeto, bulli yemeenoon beeyemmone" iye.
43006059	Qifirnaaha beeti Ayihudeena'o kicee beeti kexoochaa ishichiqqi dojii beehe.
43006060	Yesuusin dabbitina'oochee meetina'o ishin waayaqqi, "Hini ashoon giirii beeti yibbaatoone; hinin waayoon hakkemmo konine?" iyeete.
43006061	Tunatee Yesuusi biin dabbitina'o ebi mooyoyich boonoshi guruuxoon bi mulloona ariiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ebi ittoshich xugoona?
43006062	Illa Ashi Bushoo ta, aaf ta waati xaa'ooch wottaree ta keyee ittoshi beegi gaata, ama gettehotine?
43006063	Kashoon immii beeto Yeerichi Ayaanoone; ashi giidoo amoonolla hallaache. Ta ittoshich gettati qaaro ayaanoonaa kashoonaniye.
43006064	Tunaballi ittoshi daggoochee ebin ibariyaaneena'o beetina'one" iye. Yesuusi bi ishichito, boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iyaaneena'o aaboshi gaata, biin beshiiree immemmo aabi gaata, shiichiqqi bi arii beetoyichiye.
43006065	Daakkiqqi ishichiye:- "Ebich ishichiyoye:- 'Nihoo Yeeri biich hakkoon imaan gaata, ta waan womon hakkemmo aalloone' " iye.
43006066	Ebichi naboona biin dabbitina'ochi daggoochee meetina'o gub wottaheete; aroyee gub biin dabbaaneena'one.
43006067	Ebich Yesuusi aaraa gutta bi dabbeena'oyich "Ittoshi wotta hamma qaawii beetotina?" iye.
43006068	Simoon Pheexiroosi wochiqqi, "Ta Doonocho! Koni waaniye no hammeho? Bulli yemeenee kashee qaaro ne waaniye bi beeto.
43006069	Noo, Yeerichi Yaafoo ne tunoon ibariito noone; ariinoo ito noone" iye.
43006070	Yesuusi boonoshich "Ta, aaraa guttoo ittoshin kaacaachota? Tunatee ittoshi daggeexi ikkoo Daabiloosine" iqqi wochiye.
43006071	Bi gettito, Asqorootachi Simoonichi bushoo Yihudichoniye; Ebiyoo aaraa gutta bi dabbeena'ochi daggoochee ikkoo tunato biin beshiiree immemmo bi tunatoyichiye.
43007001	Ebiyee gub, Yesuusi Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o biin wuxiya boonoshi qaawii beetoyich, Yihudee Shawoona sha'oon shunnaanoone; ebich Galiilee Shawoona sha'aa beehe.
43007002	Ayihudeena'ochi Bashee Yambaaree Baaroo katinnii giishacha aabo echahe.
43007003	Ebich Yesuusichi maneena'o biich "Ne tunii beeti mooyon neen dabbii beetina'o boonoshi beeggemmoyich, hiniichee tiyiree Yihudee Shawooch hambe!
43007004	Bi qelloon arichiyoo qaawii beeti asho aashoona shuunataanoone. Hini mooyina'on ne tunii beeto bullich, ne qelloon shawee toommooch beetina'o bullich arichiibe!" iyeete.
43007005	Bi maneena'o boonoshi ishichito, boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iyoo boonoshi qajitoyichiye.
43007006	Yesuusi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Arooch ta hammemmi aabo battiye; tunaballi amee aabolla bi tunatee, ittoshich kaamoone.
43007007	Yeerich de'a getaani hini shawee toommeexi asheena'o ittoshin boonoshi shixxemmi naboo aalloone; tunatee boonoshi shuunoo gondo bi tunoon ta miixaa beetoyich, taan shixxiyeete.
43007008	Ittoshi hini baarooch hambote! Ta hammemmi aabo battiye. Ebich hini baarooch and hamaache" iye.
43007009	Ishichiqqi boonoshich gettiichii Galiilee Shawooch echahe.
43007010	Tunaballi bi maneena'o baarooch boonoshi hammitoyee gub, Yesuusi wotta xalla bekkataanoon aashoona ara baarooch hammiye.
43007011	Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o "aroo aaye?" iibee ara baaree xaa'oochaa qaawii beeheete.
43007012	Dofee asheena'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o bi toommooch oogichii guruuxii beeheete. Ikkikkeena'o "Gaawa uroone" iyeete; tunaballi bareena'o wotta "Gaawataanoone; asheena'on muricii beetone" ii beeheete.
43007013	Tunatee Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'on boonoshi shattitoyich, koniyolla biichon xalla kichii yibbaatataanoone.
43007014	Baaree shabaattee daggooch Yesuusi Yaafee Kexooch hammiqqi asheena'oyich dojooch giyiye.
43007015	Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o "Asho biich dojaanoon, hini uro eboshi bullin aabichiqqi ariihe?" iqqi woriganaa beeheete.
43007016	Ebich Yesuusi tiyiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ta dojii beeti mooyo taan wochato waaneenalli ta waanee toonoone.
43007017	Koniyolla Yeeri shunniton tuniyoyich bi qaawi gaata, aroo hini ta dojii beeto Yeer waanee bi tunoon oohee ta, ta qelloona ta geton ariiyemmone.
43007018	Bi qellee gaboona gettii beeto, ashi waanee oogoon qaawii beeti uroone; tunatee biin wochaton oogiiya qaawii beeto, aroo ibara moochachone; xummittino bi mullooch aalloone.
43007019	Muusi Yeerichi calloon ittoshich imaacha? Tunaballi ittoshi daggoochee ara calloon quyaa beeto ikkolla aalloone. Taan wuxoyich akkiya qaawii beetotine?" iye.
43007020	Asheena'o wochiqqi, "Yinno ne toommooch beetone. Konine neen wuxoyich qaawii beeto?" iyeete.
43007021	Yesuusi wochiqqi boonoshich ishichiye:- "Ikka shuunoon shuunahoye; ittoshi bulli aroon woriganahotine.
43007022	Ittoshich, Shambatooba bushiishoon dokirii beeto ittoshine. Ebiyoo Muusi dokiriyee doyoon ittoshich bi immitoyichiye; tunatee hini doyoon ittoshich immitina'o, ittoshi qaabbachina'oalli Muusi toonoone.
43007023	Muusichi calloon quyoyich ittoshi bushiishoon Shambatooba dokirii beeto ittoshi tuna gaata, ashoon ceeni bi ashittinoon Shambatooba ta wodiitoyich, amoyich taan kaarahotine?
43007024	Kaachiree nallibotalli shafoona nalliyaahotine!" iye.
43007025	Arooba Yerusalemee asheena'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o ishichiyeete:- "No ukkureena'o wuxiya boonoshi qaawii beeto, hini uroon toona?
43007026	Ebiyoche! Kaacha gettii beehe amoone! Boonoshiyoo amoonolla getaacheete amoone! Ibaroon ukkureena'o hini uro Kiristoosi bi tunoon ariiqqi tuneha?
43007027	Tunaballi hini amoochee gaata ariito noone; tunatee Kiristoosi waahooba, bi woyemmo amoochee gaata koniyolla ariyaachemmone" iyeete.
43007028	Ebich Yesuusi Yaafee Kexoochaa dojiibee bi qaaroon oogichiqqi ishichiye:- "Taanoo arii beeto ittoshine; amoochee ta waato gaata arii beeto ittoshine. Ta, ta qelloona waataano taane; tunaballi taan wochato gibaneetone; ittoshi biin ariyaano ittoshine;
43007029	Tunatee ta bi waanee waato taane; biyoo taan wochatone; ebich biin arii beeto taane" iye.
43007030	Ebich asheena'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o biin yecha qaawii beeheete; tunatee bi yecheeyemmi aabo bat shago bi qajitoyich koniyolla biin yeshaanoone.
43007031	Tunatee asheena'ochi daggoochee meetina'o boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iiqqi, "Kiristoosi waahooba, hini Yesuusi bekkiiti mallateena'oyee beshoon bekkiiyeha?" iyeete.
43007032	Asheena'o Yesuusichi mooyon tiijii ishichiqqi boonoshi guruuxee beetee, Fariseena'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o waayaheete. Ebich qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'o, Fariseena'oo biin yechiiya Yaafee Kechi qoomeena'on wochaheete.
43007033	Yesuusiyoo "Bat giishacha aaboon ittoshina tookki kotemmo taane; aroochee taan wochato waan hammemmo taane.
43007034	Ittoshiyoo taan qaawemmo ittoshine; tunaballi danataachemmo ittoshine; ta beetoochoo womon hakkaachotine" iye.
43007035	Ebich Ayihudeena'ochi ukkureena'o boonoshinaa boonoshina "No biin danataachemmoyich, hini uro amooch hammaniye bi ii beeto? No asheena'o shacaqqi beeti Giriikkeena'ochi gafeena'ooch hamiree Giriikkee asheena'oyich arichiyoyich tuneha?
43007036	Biyoo 'Taan qaawemmo ittoshine; tunaballi danataachemmo ittoshine; ta beetoochoo womon hakkaachemmo ittoshine' bi ii beeti hini bi yibbaatoo amoone?" iqqi yibbaataheete.
43007037	Baaree ciiroochee qaabba aabooba Yesuusi neexaa bi qaaroon oogichiqqi, "Koniyolla shachawato bi bee gaata, ta waan waaree uye.
43007038	Bi mulloon ta toommooch too'ii beeto, Yaafa Macaafoochaa bi getteetoomon, 'Kashee aachi tunoo bi maacoochee xuupphemmone' "iye.
43007039	Ishin bi gettito, boonoshi mulloon bi toommooch too'iitina'o bat boonoshi danemmi Yaafa Ayaaneechoniye; ebiyoo Yesuusi oogoyich bat shimaaj keyaan bi beetoyich, Yaafa Ayaano kindaano bi tunatoyichiye.
43007040	Ebich dofee asheena'ochi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o hini bi yibbaatoon waayaqqi, "Ibaroon hini uro quyaa no beeti keemachone" iyeete.
43007041	Bareena'o "Hini uro Kiristoosine" iyeete. Tunatee bareena'o "Kiristoosi Galiilee Shawoochee waataachemmone.
43007042	Yaafa Macaafoochaa 'Kiristoosi Taatoo Daawiti yaroochee, Daawiti dicciti katamoo Betelemee kechemmone' getteyaacha?" iyeete.
43007043	Ebich Yesuusichi naboona asheena'ochi daggooch shaaco tunahe;
43007044	Boonoshi daggoochee ikkikkeena'o biin yecha qaawiyeete; tunaballi koniyolla yeshon hakkaanoone.
43007045	Yaafee Kechi qoomeena'o wottaqqi qeesheena'ochi ukkureena'onaa Fariseena'ona waan boonoshi waahee, "Amoyich yechiqqi deebaachotine?" iyeete.
43007046	Qoomeena'oo "Hini uroochoomon koniyolla yibbaatatee beeggaa ariyaano noone" iqqi wochiyeete.
43007047	Ebich Fariseena'o "Ittoshi wotta dacheetotina?
43007048	Ayihudee nallachina'o oohee Fariseena'ochi daggoochee ikkolla bi waan wottato beeta?
43007049	Tunaballi Muusichi calloon ariyaani hini asho Yeerina upatone" iqqi wochiyeete.
43007050	Arooch beeti Fariseena'ochi daggoochee ikkoo xumoona shiichiqqi Yesuus waan waati Niqoodimoosi
